translation.en: How long does it take for malware to infect your brand-new computer?
translation.zh: 恶意软件感染您的新电脑需要多长时间？
translation.source: How long does it take for malware to infect your brand-new computer?
translation.medium: 恶意软件感染你的新电脑需要多长时间?
translation.reference: 恶意软件感染您的新电脑需要多长时间？

translation.en: If you use free or other inferior security software, maybe not long at all.
translation.zh: 如果您使用免费的或者其他安全软件，可能不需要太久。
translation.source: If you use free or other inferior security software, maybe not long at all.
translation.medium: 如果您使用免费或其他劣质的安全软件,
translation.reference: 如果您使用免费的或者其他安全软件，可能不需要太久。

translation.en: Cyber-criminals are more sophisticated than ever before, and they use a diverse arsenal of tools to gain access to your information.
translation.zh: 网络犯罪分子越来越狡猾，他们使用各种各样的工具来获取您的信息。
translation.source: Cyber-criminals are more sophisticated than ever before, and they use a diverse arsenal of tools to gain access to your information.
translation.medium: 网络罪犯比以往任何时候都更复杂, 他们使用各种各样的工具来获取您的信息.
translation.reference: 网络犯罪分子越来越狡猾，他们使用各种各样的工具来获取您的信息。

translation.en: Other security solutions just don’t have the resources to keep up with new threats as they emerge.
translation.zh: 其他安全解决方案没有资源来应对新出现的威胁。
translation.source: Other security solutions just don’t have the resources to keep up with new threats as they emerge.
translation.medium: 其他安全解决方案根本没有足够的资源来应对新出现的威胁.
translation.reference: 其他安全解决方案没有资源来应对新出现的威胁。

translation.en: As the threats get worse, we just keep getting better.
translation.zh: 但我们不一样，威胁越来越严重，我们也会越来越好。
translation.source: As the threats get worse, we just keep getting better.
translation.medium: 随着威胁变得越来越严重,
translation.reference: 但我们不一样，威胁越来越严重，我们也会越来越好。

translation.en: Our teams of security experts are constantly analyzing new threats and devising new ways to protect your devices from them.
translation.zh: 因为我们的安全专家团队会不断分析新的威胁，并设计新的方法来保护您的设备免受威胁。
translation.source: Our teams of security experts are constantly analyzing new threats and devising new ways to protect your devices from them.
translation.medium: 我们的安全专家团队不断分析新的威胁, 设计新的方法来保护您的设备免受威胁.
translation.reference: 因为我们的安全专家团队会不断分析新的威胁，并设计新的方法来保护您的设备免受威胁。

translation.en: We focus exclusively on security & are the best at it
translation.zh: 我们致力于打造最优秀的安全产品
translation.source: We focus exclusively on security & are the best at it
translation.medium: 我们专注于安全,
translation.reference: 我们致力于打造最优秀的安全产品

translation.en: Our concentrated combination of dedication and expertise benefits our customers.
translation.zh: 我们以高度凝结的敬业精神和专业知识为我们服务。
translation.source: Our concentrated combination of dedication and expertise benefits our customers.
translation.medium: 我们的专注和专业知识的结合有利于我们的客户.
translation.reference: 我们以高度凝结的敬业精神和专业知识为我们服务。

translation.en: Norton has been outperforming the competition in many reputable head-to-head tests, and only Norton has won the PC Magazine Editors’ Choice Award 34 times, including 11 years in a row – more than any other security company.
translation.zh: 诺顿在许多信誉良好的直接测试中都胜过了竞争对手，只有诺顿获得过 PC 杂志编辑选择奖 34 次，而且有一次连续 11 年获得此奖，这是任何其他安全公司都无法比拟的。
translation.source: Norton has been outperforming the competition in many reputable head-to-head tests, and only Norton has won the PC Magazine Editors’ Choice Award 34 times, including 11 years in a row – more than any other security company.
translation.medium: 诺顿在许多知名的对抗测试中表现优于竞争对手, 只有诺顿赢得了PC杂志编辑选择奖34次, 包括连续11年胜其他任何一家安全公司.
translation.reference: 诺顿在许多信誉良好的直接测试中都胜过了竞争对手，只有诺顿获得过 PC 杂志编辑选择奖 34 次，而且有一次连续 11 年获得此奖，这是任何其他安全公司都无法比拟的。

translation.en: What does that mean for you?
translation.zh: 这对您意味着什么？
translation.source: What does that mean for you?
translation.medium: 这对你来说意味着什么?
translation.reference: 这对您意味着什么？

translation.en: When you buy Norton Security, you’re getting one of the best security products on the market today.
translation.zh: 这意味着，在您购买 Norton Security 后，您就得到了当今市场上最好的安全产品之一。
translation.source: When you buy Norton Security, you’re getting one of the best security products on the market today.
translation.medium: 当您购买诺顿安全时, 您将获得目前市场上最好的安全产品之一.
translation.reference: 这意味着，在您购买 Norton Security 后，您就得到了当今市场上最好的安全产品之一。

translation.en: We include a protection promise only Norton can make
translation.zh: 我们提供的保护承诺只有诺顿才能做到
translation.source: We include a protection promise only Norton can make
translation.medium: 我们包括一个保护诺言只有诺顿可以做
translation.reference: 我们提供的保护承诺只有诺顿才能做到

translation.en: We’re so confident in our ability to keep you secure, we offer refund assurance:
translation.zh: 我们有信心保证您的安全，我们提供退款保证：
translation.source: We’re so confident in our ability to keep you secure, we offer refund assurance:
translation.medium: 我们对您的安全充满信心, 我们提供退款保证:
translation.reference: 我们有信心保证您的安全，我们提供退款保证：

translation.en: If your PC or Mac gets a virus our Norton experts cannot remove, we’ll give you a refund*
translation.zh: 如果您的电脑或 Mac 电脑感染了诺顿专家无法清除的病毒，我们会给您退款*
translation.source: If your PC or Mac gets a virus our Norton experts cannot remove, we’ll give you a refund*
translation.medium: 如果您的PC或Mac感染了Norton专家无法删除的病毒,我们将退款给您*
translation.reference: 如果您的电脑或 Mac 电脑感染了诺顿专家无法清除的病毒，我们会给您退款*

translation.en: With Norton Security Deluxe, you can secure your device quickly and easily.
translation.zh: 有了 Norton Security Deluxe，您可以快速、方便地保护您的设备。
translation.source: With Norton Security Deluxe, you can secure your device quickly and easily.
translation.medium: 使用Norton Security Deluxe,您可以快速轻松地保护您的设备.
translation.reference: 有了 Norton Security Deluxe，您可以快速、方便地保护您的设备。

translation.en: Norton Security Deluxe provides a simple view detailing the protection status of your device.
translation.zh: Norton Security Deluxe 在一个简单的视图中详述了您的设备的防护状态。
translation.source: Norton Security Deluxe provides a simple view detailing the protection status of your device.
translation.medium: 提供一个简单的视图,详细说明您的设备的保护状态.
translation.reference: Norton Security Deluxe 在一个简单的视图中详述了您的设备的防护状态。

translation.en: From a single dashboard, you can monitor your security and identity protection settings, and even view the history of files scanned and downloads analyzed.
translation.zh: 您可在一个仪表板上监控安全性和身份保护设置，甚至可以查看扫描文件和分析下载的历史记录。
translation.source: From a single dashboard, you can monitor your security and identity protection settings, and even view the history of files scanned and downloads analyzed.
translation.medium: 从一个单一的仪表板, 您可以监控您的安全和身份保护设置, 甚至查看扫描的文件历史记录和下载分析.
translation.reference: 您可在一个仪表板上监控安全性和身份保护设置，甚至可以查看扫描文件和分析下载的历史记录。

translation.en: All our comics are sent bagged as standard.
translation.zh: 我们所有的漫画都按标准装袋邮寄。
translation.source: All our comics are sent bagged as standard.
translation.medium: 我们所有的漫画都被包装在袋子里.
translation.reference: 我们所有的漫画都按标准装袋邮寄。

translation.en: In addition, the older items are usually boarded as well.
translation.zh: 此外，我们也经常邮寄旧商品。
translation.source: In addition, the older items are usually boarded as well.
translation.medium: 另外, 旧的物品通常也被装上了木板.
translation.reference: 此外，我们也经常邮寄旧商品。

translation.en: The newer items are bagged only.
translation.zh: 较新的商品只装袋。
translation.source: The newer items are bagged only.
translation.medium: 只有新的物品被包装在袋子里.
translation.reference: 较新的商品只装袋。

translation.en: In addition to the above item, we have over 250,000 comics in stock, including both back issues and new items.
translation.zh: 除了上述商品，我们还有超过 25 万本库存漫画，既有旧书，也有新品。
translation.source: In addition to the above item, we have over 250,000 comics in stock, including both back issues and new items.
translation.medium: 除了上述项目, 我们有超过25万漫画在库存, 包括旧问题和新项目.
translation.reference: 除了上述商品，我们还有超过 25 万本库存漫画，既有旧书，也有新品。

translation.en: All our comics are supplied from our real world store enabling us to offer a huge range of comics via auction.
translation.zh: 我们所有的漫画均由实体店供应，因此我们能够通过拍卖提供种类繁多的漫画书。
translation.source: All our comics are supplied from our real world store enabling us to offer a huge range of comics via auction.
translation.medium: 我们所有的漫画都来自我们的现实世界商店, 使我们能够通过拍卖提供各种各样的漫画.
translation.reference: 我们所有的漫画均由实体店供应，因此我们能够通过拍卖提供种类繁多的漫画书。

translation.en: We've probably got what you're looking for!
translation.zh: 这里可能有您要找的东西！
translation.source: We've probably got what you're looking for!
translation.medium: 我们可能有你想要的东西!
translation.reference: 这里可能有您要找的东西！

translation.en: (If placing multiple orders, please request an invoice for the correct amount BEFORE paying.)
translation.zh: （如有多个订单，请在付款前索要发票以保证金额正确。)
translation.source: (If placing multiple orders, please request an invoice for the correct amount BEFORE paying.)
translation.medium: (如果订单多次,请在付款前要求正确金额的发票.
translation.reference: （如有多个订单，请在付款前索要发票以保证金额正确。)

translation.en: This item is an original American comic and is in English!
translation.zh: 此商品是美国原创的英文漫画！
translation.source: This item is an original American comic and is in English!
translation.medium: 这是一本原创的美国漫画,
translation.reference: 此商品是美国原创的英文漫画！

translation.en: Please note that all our comics in every grade (EVEN POOR) will be complete unless stated otherwise in the listing!
translation.zh: 请注意，我们每个等级（甚至比较差的等级）的漫画都完整无缺，除非在商品页面中另有说明！
translation.source: Please note that all our comics in every grade (EVEN POOR) will be complete unless stated otherwise in the listing!
translation.medium: 请注意,除非在列表中另有说明,否则我们每年级 (EVEN POOR) 的所有漫画都将完整!
translation.reference: 请注意，我们每个等级（甚至比较差的等级）的漫画都完整无缺，除非在商品页面中另有说明！

translation.en: Please take the time to review both the attached cover scan and detailed grade description above to ensure that this particular comic is in the condition you require.
translation.zh: 请花点时间查看附件中的封面扫描和其中详细的等级描述，以确保它符合您的要求。
translation.source: Please take the time to review both the attached cover scan and detailed grade description above to ensure that this particular comic is in the condition you require.
translation.medium: 请花点时间查看附加的封面扫描和上面详细的等级描述, 确保这本特别的漫画是你需要的条件.
translation.reference: 请花点时间查看附件中的封面扫描和其中详细的等级描述，以确保它符合您的要求。

translation.en: Most of our listings offer Multi-Buy discounts.
translation.zh: 我们的大多数产品页面都提供 Multi-Buy 折扣。
translation.source: Most of our listings offer Multi-Buy discounts.
translation.medium: 我们的大部分产品都提供多重购买折扣.
translation.reference: 我们的大多数产品页面都提供 Multi-Buy 折扣。

translation.en: Usually starting at 3 or more items to gain the discount.
translation.zh: 通常 3 件及 3 件以上的商品可以获得折扣。
translation.source: Usually starting at 3 or more items to gain the discount.
translation.medium: 通常从3个或更多的项目开始以获得折扣.
translation.reference: 通常 3 件及 3 件以上的商品可以获得折扣。

translation.en: The items can be ANY combination of ANY ITEMS included in the Multi-Buy.
translation.zh: 此处所说的商品可以是 Multi-Buy 中任何商品的任意组合，
translation.source: The items can be ANY combination of ANY ITEMS included in the Multi-Buy.
translation.medium: 这些物品可以是多重购买中包含的任何物品的任何组合.
translation.reference: 此处所说的商品可以是 Multi-Buy 中任何商品的任意组合，

translation.en: They DO NOT have to be multiple copies of the same item.
translation.zh: 不必是同样的商品。
translation.source: They DO NOT have to be multiple copies of the same item.
translation.medium: 它们不一定是同一物品的多个副本.
translation.reference: 不必是同样的商品。

translation.en: Just pick the required total quantity and you'll automatically be given the discount on all of them!
translation.zh: 只要选择所需的总数量，就能自动获得所有商品的折扣！
translation.source: Just pick the required total quantity and you'll automatically be given the discount on all of them!
translation.medium: 只需选择所需的总数, 您将自动获得所有商品的折扣!
translation.reference: 只要选择所需的总数量，就能自动获得所有商品的折扣！

translation.en: Some of our items include the option to place a best offer.
translation.zh: 我们的一些商品包括提供最佳报价的选项。
translation.source: Some of our items include the option to place a best offer.
translation.medium: 我们的一些产品包括最优惠的选项.
translation.reference: 我们的一些商品包括提供最佳报价的选项。

translation.en: If there is a Best Offer option, we'll consider any reasonable offer.
translation.zh: 如果有“最佳报价”选项，我们会考虑任何合理的报价。
translation.source: If there is a Best Offer option, we'll consider any reasonable offer.
translation.medium: 如果有"最佳报价"选项, 我们会考虑任何合理的报价.
translation.reference: 如果有“最佳报价”选项，我们会考虑任何合理的报价。

translation.en: We do not list ANY comics as Mint condition.
translation.zh: 我们不会将任何漫画列为 Mint 条件。
translation.source: We do not list ANY comics as Mint condition.
translation.medium: 我们不列出任何漫画作为薄荷条件.
translation.reference: 我们不会将任何漫画列为 Mint 条件。

translation.en: In our view, this grade does not exist.
translation.zh: 我们认为，这个等级并不存在。
translation.source: In our view, this grade does not exist.
translation.medium: 在我们看来,这个等级不存在.
translation.reference: 我们认为，这个等级并不存在。

translation.en: Comic books are mass produced paper items, handled many times often with little care before even reaching the shop or newsstand to be offered for sale.
translation.zh: 漫画书是大量生产的纸制品，在进入商店或报摊出售之前，一般会不那么小心地处理过很多次。
translation.source: Comic books are mass produced paper items, handled many times often with little care before even reaching the shop or newsstand to be offered for sale.
translation.medium: 漫画书是批量生产的纸质产品,在到达商店或报摊出售之前,
translation.reference: 漫画书是大量生产的纸制品，在进入商店或报摊出售之前，一般会不那么小心地处理过很多次。

translation.en: EVERY COMIC, even a brand new one, will have some form of minor defect if you get out a magnifying glass and look closely enough.
translation.zh: 因此，每一本漫画，即使是全新的，如果拿着放大镜仔细看，都能发现各种小缺陷。
translation.source: EVERY COMIC, even a brand new one, will have some form of minor defect if you get out a magnifying glass and look closely enough.
translation.medium: 每个漫画,即使是全新的漫画,如果拿出放大镜仔细看,也会有一些小缺陷.
translation.reference: 因此，每一本漫画，即使是全新的，如果拿着放大镜仔细看，都能发现各种小缺陷。

translation.en: If you are intent on finding comic book perfection, or CGC guaranteed results, it would probably be best to view the comics in person at our store before bidding!
translation.zh: 如果您想找到完美的漫画书，或有 CGC 保证的结果，那么最好在出价之前亲临本店购买！
translation.source: If you are intent on finding comic book perfection, or CGC guaranteed results, it would probably be best to view the comics in person at our store before bidding!
translation.medium: 如果您打算找到完美的漫画, 或CGC保证的结果,
translation.reference: 如果您想找到完美的漫画书，或有 CGC 保证的结果，那么最好在出价之前亲临本店购买！

translation.en: We can try a manual reset
translation.zh: 我们可以尝试手动重置
translation.source: We can try a manual reset
translation.medium: 我们可以尝试手动重置
translation.reference: 我们可以尝试手动重置

translation.en: Connect your eReader to a power source by doing one of the following:
translation.zh: 执行以下操作之一，将您的电子阅读器连接到电源：
translation.source: Connect your eReader to a power source by doing one of the following:
translation.medium: 通过以下方法之一将您的电子阅读器连接到电源:
translation.reference: 执行以下操作之一，将您的电子阅读器连接到电源：

translation.en: - Turn on your computer and connect the included USB power cord to your computer first, and then your eReader.
translation.zh: - 打开电脑，把随附的 USB 线先连接到电脑，再连接到电子阅读器。
translation.source: - Turn on your computer and connect the included USB power cord to your computer first, and then your eReader.
translation.medium: - 打开您的计算机并将附带的USB电源线连接到您的计算机,然后连接到您的电子书阅读器.
translation.reference: - 打开电脑，把随附的 USB 线先连接到电脑，再连接到电子阅读器。

translation.en: - Plug the wall charger (not included) to a power outlet, and then connect your eReader to the wall charger.
translation.zh: - 把充电器（未提供）插到插座上，再把电子阅读器连接到充电器。
translation.source: - Plug the wall charger (not included) to a power outlet, and then connect your eReader to the wall charger.
translation.medium: - 将壁充电器 (不包括在内) 连接到电源插座,然后将您的电子阅读器连接到壁充电器.
translation.reference: - 把充电器（未提供）插到插座上，再把电子阅读器连接到充电器。

translation.en: Press and hold the power button until the power light on the top-right corner of your eReader turns off.
translation.zh: 按住电源按钮，直到电子阅读器右上方的电源灯灭掉。
translation.source: Press and hold the power button until the power light on the top-right corner of your eReader turns off.
translation.medium: 按住电源按,直到电子阅读器右上角的电源灯关闭.
translation.reference: 按住电源按钮，直到电子阅读器右上方的电源灯灭掉。

translation.en: You'll see a 'Powered off' screen when your eReader is turned off.
translation.zh: 在电子阅读器关闭时，您将看到“关机”按钮。
translation.source: You'll see a 'Powered off' screen when your eReader is turned off.
translation.medium: 当您的电子阅读器关闭时,您将看到一个"关机"屏幕.
translation.reference: 在电子阅读器关闭时，您将看到“关机”按钮。

translation.en: Release the power button.
translation.zh: 松开电源按钮。
translation.source: Release the power button.
translation.medium: 放开电源按.
translation.reference: 松开电源按钮。

translation.en: Press and hold the power button on your eReader for 30 seconds.
translation.zh: 按住电子阅读器上的电源按钮 30 秒。
translation.source: Press and hold the power button on your eReader for 30 seconds.
translation.medium: 按住电子阅读器的启动按30秒.
translation.reference: 按住电子阅读器上的电源按钮 30 秒。

translation.en: Wait for the Restore screen to appear.
translation.zh: 等待“恢复”屏幕出现。
translation.source: Wait for the Restore screen to appear.
translation.medium: 等待恢复屏幕出现.
translation.reference: 等待“恢复”屏幕出现。

translation.en: Release the power button.
translation.zh: 松开电源按钮。
translation.source: Release the power button.
translation.medium: 放开电源按.
translation.reference: 松开电源按钮。

translation.en: Your eReader screen will turn black and begin the restoring process.
translation.zh: 您的电子阅读器屏幕将变黑，并开始恢复过程。
translation.source: Your eReader screen will turn black and begin the restoring process.
translation.medium: 您的电子阅读器屏幕将变成黑色并开始恢复过程.
translation.reference: 您的电子阅读器屏幕将变黑，并开始恢复过程。

translation.en: Change your font settings with the menu at the bottom:
translation.zh: 使用底部的菜单更改字体设置：
translation.source: Change your font settings with the menu at the bottom:
translation.medium: 在底部的菜单中更改字体设置:
translation.reference: 使用底部的菜单更改字体设置：

translation.en: Adjust font style: Tap the dropdown menu beside ‘Font Face’ to select from a list of available fonts.
translation.zh: 调整字体样式：点击“字体面板”旁边的下拉菜单，从可用字体列表中进行选择。
translation.source: Adjust font style: Tap the dropdown menu beside ‘Font Face’ to select from a list of available fonts.
translation.medium: 调整字体风格:点击"字体面"旁的下拉菜单,从可用字体列表中进行选择.
translation.reference: 调整字体样式：点击“字体面板”旁边的下拉菜单，从可用字体列表中进行选择。

translation.en: Adjust font size: Drag thecircle icon beside ‘Font Size’ to change the size of the text.
translation.zh: 调整字体大小：拖动“字体大小”旁边的圆圈图标，可以改变文本的大小。
translation.source: Adjust font size: Drag thecircle icon beside ‘Font Size’ to change the size of the text.
translation.medium: 调整字体大小:将圆形图标拖动到"字体大小"旁边,以改变文本的大小.
translation.reference: 调整字体大小：拖动“字体大小”旁边的圆圈图标，可以改变文本的大小。

translation.en: Adjust line spacing: Drag thecircle icon beside ‘Line Spacing’ to increase or decrease the space between the lines of type.
translation.zh: 调整行间距：拖动“行间距”旁边的圆形图标可增加或减少字体行之间的间距。
translation.source: Adjust line spacing: Drag thecircle icon beside ‘Line Spacing’ to increase or decrease the space between the lines of type.
translation.medium: 调整行间距:将圆形图标拖动到"行间距"旁边,以增加或减少字体行间距.
translation.reference: 调整行间距：拖动“行间距”旁边的圆形图标可增加或减少字体行之间的间距。

translation.en: Adjust margins: Drag the slider beside Margins to make the margins bigger or smaller.
translation.zh: 调整页边距：拖动“页边距”旁边的滑块，可增加或减少页边距。
translation.source: Adjust margins: Drag the slider beside Margins to make the margins bigger or smaller.
translation.medium: 调整边缘:将滑块拖动到边缘旁边,使边缘变大或变小.
translation.reference: 调整页边距：拖动“页边距”旁边的滑块，可增加或减少页边距。

translation.en: Set the text justification:  Beside ‘Justification’, select your choice of justification.
translation.zh: 设置文本对齐方式： 在“对齐方式”旁边，选择对齐方式。
translation.source: Set the text justification:  Beside ‘Justification’, select your choice of justification.
translation.medium: 设置文本理由:在"理由"旁边,选择您的理由.
translation.reference: 设置文本对齐方式： 在“对齐方式”旁边，选择对齐方式。

translation.en: When you change the way text looks, your eReader remembers your preferred size and style, and applies it to other books you’re reading.
translation.zh: 在更改文本的外观时，电子阅读器会记住您喜欢的大小和风格，并将其应用到您要阅读的其他书籍上。
translation.source: When you change the way text looks, your eReader remembers your preferred size and style, and applies it to other books you’re reading.
translation.medium: 当您改变文本的外观时,您的电子阅读器会记住您的首选尺寸和风格,并将其应用于您正在阅读的其他书籍.
translation.reference: 在更改文本的外观时，电子阅读器会记住您喜欢的大小和风格，并将其应用到您要阅读的其他书籍上。

translation.en: If you’re reading a PDF, you can’t change the size or style of the text.
translation.zh: 如果您阅读的是 PDF 文件，则无法改变文本的大小或样式。
translation.source: If you’re reading a PDF, you can’t change the size or style of the text.
translation.medium: 如果您正在阅读PDF文件,则无法更改文本的尺寸或风格.
translation.reference: 如果您阅读的是 PDF 文件，则无法改变文本的大小或样式。

translation.en: If this is not working, please now, sign out and sign in back from your ereader
translation.zh: 如果这个方法不管用，请从电子阅读器注销并重新登录
translation.source: If this is not working, please now, sign out and sign in back from your ereader
translation.medium: 如果这不起作用,请现在,登记退出并从您的eReader登记回来
translation.reference: 如果这个方法不管用，请从电子阅读器注销并重新登录

translation.en: Sign out of your #PRS_ORG#
translation.zh: 注销您的 #PRS_ORG#
translation.source: Sign out of your #PRS_ORG#
translation.medium: 在您的 #PRS_ORG# 中退出
translation.reference: 注销您的 #PRS_ORG#

translation.en: Go to your Home screen.
translation.zh: 进入主屏幕。
translation.source: Go to your Home screen.
translation.medium: 进入主屏幕.
translation.reference: 进入主屏幕。

translation.en: More icon at the bottom of the screen.
translation.zh: 点击屏幕底部的“更多”图标。
translation.source: More icon at the bottom of the screen.
translation.medium: 点击屏幕底部的更多图标.
translation.reference: 点击屏幕底部的“更多”图标。

translation.en: Tap Settings.
translation.zh: 点击“设置”。
translation.source: Tap Settings.
translation.medium: 点击"设置".
translation.reference: 点击“设置”。

translation.en: Tap Accounts.
translation.zh: 点击“帐户”。
translation.source: Tap Accounts.
translation.medium: 在"账户"页面上点击"账户".
translation.reference: 点击“帐户”。

translation.en: Under #PRS_ORG#, tap Sign out.
translation.zh: 在 #PRS_ORG# 下，点击“注销”。
translation.source: Under #PRS_ORG#, tap Sign out.
translation.medium: 在#PRS_ORG#下,点击退出.
translation.reference: 在 #PRS_ORG# 下，点击“注销”。

translation.en: A confirmation screen will appear.
translation.zh: 将出现确认屏幕。
translation.source: A confirmation screen will appear.
translation.medium: 一个确认屏幕将出现.
translation.reference: 将出现确认屏幕。

translation.en: Thank you for the information.
translation.zh: 感谢您提供的信息。
translation.source: Thank you for the information.
translation.medium: 谢谢你的信息.
translation.reference: 感谢您提供的信息。

translation.en: I will be more than happy to assist you.
translation.zh: 我很高兴能帮到您。
translation.source: I will be more than happy to assist you.
translation.medium: 我很乐意协助你.
translation.reference: 我很高兴能帮到您。

translation.en: Please allow me a moment to verify the account.
translation.zh: 请您稍候，我先验证帐户。
translation.source: Please allow me a moment to verify the account.
translation.medium: 请给我一分钟的时间来验证账户.
translation.reference: 请您稍候，我先验证帐户。

translation.en: Thanks for waiting
translation.zh: 感谢您的耐心等候
translation.source: Thanks for waiting
translation.medium: 谢谢你的等待
translation.reference: 感谢您的耐心等候

translation.en: I am sorry that you are experiencing this issue, I will do my best to assist you.
translation.zh: 很抱歉给您带来问题，我会尽我最大的努力帮助您。
translation.source: I am sorry that you are experiencing this issue, I will do my best to assist you.
translation.medium: 我很抱歉你遇到这个问题, 我会尽我所能帮助你.
translation.reference: 很抱歉给您带来问题，我会尽我最大的努力帮助您。

translation.en: Please let me know what is your #PRS_ORG# model
translation.zh: 请把您的 #PRS_ORG# 型号告诉我
translation.source: Please let me know what is your #PRS_ORG# model
translation.medium: 请让我知道你的#PRS_ORG#模式是什么
translation.reference: 请把您的 #PRS_ORG# 型号告诉我

translation.en: Changing the address on the order is not possible, however this can be deliver to the new address.
translation.zh: 订单上的地址无法更改，但可以送到新地址。
translation.source: Changing the address on the order is not possible, however this can be deliver to the new address.
translation.medium: 不可能更改订单上的地址,但可以将其交付到新的地址.
translation.reference: 订单上的地址无法更改，但可以送到新地址。

translation.en: You can call the rider once he sis near to the address place on this order using the call rider function on the app.
translation.zh: 您可以在骑手快到达订单上的地点时，使用 App 的功能呼叫他。
translation.source: You can call the rider once he sis near to the address place on this order using the call rider function on the app.
translation.medium: 您可以通过应用程序中的"呼叫乘客"功能打电话给乘客,
translation.reference: 您可以在骑手快到达订单上的地点时，使用 App 的功能呼叫他。

translation.en: Family pays tribute to "energetic" 18-year-old stabbed to death in Birmingham
translation.zh: 家人称赞伯明翰被捅死的 18 岁年轻人“精力充沛”
translation.source: Family pays tribute to "energetic" 18-year-old stabbed to death in Birmingham
translation.medium: 家庭向在伯明翰被刺死的"充满活力的"18岁少年致敬
translation.reference: 家人称赞伯明翰被捅死的 18 岁年轻人“精力充沛”

translation.en: The family of a teenager who was stabbed to death in Birmingham have described him as a "young, energetic 18-year-old" who dreamed of being a digital marketing specialist.
translation.zh: 伯明翰一名少年被刺死，其家人称他才 18 负，“年轻、精力充沛，他的梦想是成为一名数字营销专家。
translation.source: The family of a teenager who was stabbed to death in Birmingham have described him as a "young, energetic 18-year-old" who dreamed of being a digital marketing specialist.
translation.medium: 一名在伯明翰被刺死的青少年的家人将他描述为一个"年轻,充满活力的18岁少年",
translation.reference: 伯明翰一名少年被刺死，其家人称他才 18 负，“年轻、精力充沛，他的梦想是成为一名数字营销专家。

translation.en: Yahya Sharif was found seriously injured in Coventry Road, Small Heath, just before 5.30pm on Friday, West Midlands Police said.
translation.zh: 西米德兰兹郡警方称，周五下午 5 点半之前，叶海亚·谢里夫 (Yahya Sharif) 在小希斯的考文垂路被发现受了重伤。
translation.source: Yahya Sharif was found seriously injured in Coventry Road, Small Heath, just before 5.30pm on Friday, West Midlands Police said.
translation.medium: 据西米德兰警方称, 雅哈·沙里夫在周五下午5点30分前在科文特里路, 斯莫尔希斯被发现严重受伤.
translation.reference: 西米德兰兹郡警方称，周五下午 5 点半之前，叶海亚·谢里夫 (Yahya Sharif) 在小希斯的考文垂路被发现受了重伤。

translation.en: Police were called to the scene by the ambulance service.
translation.zh: 救护车叫来了警察。
translation.source: Police were called to the scene by the ambulance service.
translation.medium: 警方被救护车叫到现场.
translation.reference: 救护车叫来了警察。

translation.en: Despite the best efforts of paramedics, Yahya, from Nechells, was confirmed dead at the scene.
translation.zh: 尽管医护人员尽了最大努力，来自 Nechells 的叶海亚还是被证实当场死亡。
translation.source: Despite the best efforts of paramedics, Yahya, from Nechells, was confirmed dead at the scene.
translation.medium: 尽管救护人员尽了最大努力, 来自内切尔斯的雅希亚在现场被确认死亡.
translation.reference: 尽管医护人员尽了最大努力，来自 Nechells 的叶海亚还是被证实当场死亡。

translation.en: A post-mortem revealed he died from a stab wound to the chest.
translation.zh: 尸检显示他死于胸部刺伤。
translation.source: A post-mortem revealed he died from a stab wound to the chest.
translation.medium: 尸检显示他死于胸部的刺伤.
translation.reference: 尸检显示他死于胸部刺伤。

translation.en: A statement released on behalf of his family said: "We cannot believe that Yahya has disappeared from our eyes.
translation.zh: 代表其家人发表的一份声明称：“我们不敢相信叶海亚已经离开这个世界了。
translation.source: A statement released on behalf of his family said: "We cannot believe that Yahya has disappeared from our eyes.
translation.medium: 他的家人发表声明说:"我们无法相信雅希已经从我们的视线中消失了.
translation.reference: 代表其家人发表的一份声明称：“我们不敢相信叶海亚已经离开这个世界了。

translation.en: We still don't know the reason he was killed.
translation.zh: 我们还不知道他被杀的原因。
translation.source: We still don't know the reason he was killed.
translation.medium: 我们仍然不知道他被杀的原因.
translation.reference: 我们还不知道他被杀的原因。

translation.en: A young, energetic 18-year-old, his dream was to be a digital marketing specialist.
translation.zh: 他才 18 岁，年轻、精力充沛，他的梦想是成为一名数字营销专家。
translation.source: A young, energetic 18-year-old, his dream was to be a digital marketing specialist.
translation.medium: 他的梦想是成为一名数字营销专家.
translation.reference: 他才 18 岁，年轻、精力充沛，他的梦想是成为一名数字营销专家。

translation.en: The whole community are shocked.
translation.zh: 整个社区都感到震惊。
translation.source: The whole community are shocked.
translation.medium: 整个社区都感到震惊.
translation.reference: 整个社区都感到震惊。

translation.en: May God be with the family he left behind, especially his parents."
translation.zh: 愿上帝保佑他的家人，尤其是他的父母。”
translation.source: May God be with the family he left behind, especially his parents."
translation.medium: 愿上帝保佑他留下的家人, 尤其是他的父母.
translation.reference: 愿上帝保佑他的家人，尤其是他的父母。”

translation.en: Detectives have been gathering CCTV and other evidence as they try to piece together what happened and identify and trace who stabbed the teenager.
translation.zh: 警察一直在收集闭路电视和其他证据，试图拼凑出事情的过程，确定并追踪谁捅死了这名青年。
translation.source: Detectives have been gathering CCTV and other evidence as they try to piece together what happened and identify and trace who stabbed the teenager.
translation.medium: 侦探们一直在收集摄像机和其他证据,
translation.reference: 警察一直在收集闭路电视和其他证据，试图拼凑出事情的过程，确定并追踪谁捅死了这名青年。

translation.en: Detective Inspector Hannah Whitehouse, from the homicide unit, said: "Yahya was just 18 and with his life ahead of him.
translation.zh: 凶案组的汉娜·怀特豪斯探长说：“叶海亚只有 18 岁，他的人生还很长。
translation.source: Detective Inspector Hannah Whitehouse, from the homicide unit, said: "Yahya was just 18 and with his life ahead of him.
translation.medium: 侦探检查员汉娜·怀特豪斯 (Hannah Whitehouse) 说:"雅哈只有18岁,还有一生要过.
translation.reference: 凶案组的汉娜·怀特豪斯探长说：“叶海亚只有 18 岁，他的人生还很长。

translation.en: This has now been taken away in the most tragic of circumstances.
translation.zh: 现在，这一切都被无情的夺走了。
translation.source: This has now been taken away in the most tragic of circumstances.
translation.medium: 现在在最悲剧的环境下被夺走了.
translation.reference: 现在，这一切都被无情的夺走了。

translation.en: There is no clear motive for the attack and we're working round the clock to identify and trace who was responsible.
translation.zh: 目前我们还没有找到明确的袭击动机，我们正在夜以继日地寻找凶手。
translation.source: There is no clear motive for the attack and we're working round the clock to identify and trace who was responsible.
translation.medium: 没有明确的攻击动机, 我们正在全天候工作以确定和追踪谁是责任人.
translation.reference: 目前我们还没有找到明确的袭击动机，我们正在夜以继日地寻找凶手。

translation.en: We've spoken to a number of witnesses but we still need to hear from anyone with information who can help us.
translation.zh: 我们和一些目击者谈过了，但还是希望知情人士提供信息给我们。
translation.source: We've spoken to a number of witnesses but we still need to hear from anyone with information who can help us.
translation.medium: 我们已经与许多目击者交谈, 但我们仍然需要听到任何有信息的人可以帮助我们.
translation.reference: 我们和一些目击者谈过了，但还是希望知情人士提供信息给我们。

translation.en: I'd appeal for those who were there at the time to do the right thing, come and speak to us and tell us exactly what happened and why.
translation.zh: 我恳请当时在场的人来找我们，告诉我们到底发生了什么，原因是什么。
translation.source: I'd appeal for those who were there at the time to do the right thing, come and speak to us and tell us exactly what happened and why.
translation.medium: 我会呼吁那些当时在场的人做正确的事情, 来和我们交谈并告诉我们确切发生了什么以及为什么.
translation.reference: 我恳请当时在场的人来找我们，告诉我们到底发生了什么，原因是什么。

translation.en: It's the least Yahya's family deserve."
translation.zh: 这是我们应该为叶海亚的家人做的。”
translation.source: It's the least Yahya's family deserve."
translation.medium: 这才是雅希亚的家人应得的最低限度.
translation.reference: 这是我们应该为叶海亚的家人做的。”

translation.en: Anyone with any information should call 101, quoting reference number 3643 10/12/21.
translation.zh: 有任何信息请拨打 101，并说明编号 3643 10/12/21。
translation.source: Anyone with any information should call 101, quoting reference number 3643 10/12/21.
translation.medium: 任何有任何信息的人请拨打101号, 引用参考号码3643 10/12/21.
translation.reference: 有任何信息请拨打 101，并说明编号 3643 10/12/21。

translation.en: An Alamo location in California pulled a similar scam on me.
translation.zh: 我在加州阿拉莫也遇到了同样的欺诈手段。
translation.source: An Alamo location in California pulled a similar scam on me.
translation.medium: 一个位于加利福尼亚的阿拉莫的地点对我进行了类似的骗局.
translation.reference: 我在加州阿拉莫也遇到了同样的欺诈手段。

translation.en: When I returned the car, the agent found scratches under the car (which I did not cause).
translation.zh: 在我还车的时候，代理人在车下发现了划痕（不是我造成的）。
translation.source: When I returned the car, the agent found scratches under the car (which I did not cause).
translation.medium: 当我把车送回来时, 警方发现车子下面有划痕 (我没有造成这些划痕).
translation.reference: 在我还车的时候，代理人在车下发现了划痕（不是我造成的）。

translation.en: Had to sign to acknowledge the “damage”.
translation.zh: 我必须签字承认“损坏”。
translation.source: Had to sign to acknowledge the “damage”.
translation.medium: 必须签名承认"损害".
translation.reference: 我必须签字承认“损坏”。

translation.en: I also had videos and photos which didn’t cover the bottom of the car.
translation.zh: 我有一些视频和照片，但没有照到车底。
translation.source: I also had videos and photos which didn’t cover the bottom of the car.
translation.medium: 我还有一些视频和照片,
translation.reference: 我有一些视频和照片，但没有照到车底。

translation.en: A few weeks after I returned home, I received a letter listing a bunch of other damage I’d be charged for as well—including scratches to the door which supposedly required repainting the rear of the car a few days after I returned my rental.
translation.zh: 回家几周后，我收到了一封信，上面列出了我需要赔偿的其他一些损坏，包括门上的划痕和车后部可能需要重新喷漆的损坏，这些都是我还车几天后出现的。
translation.source: A few weeks after I returned home, I received a letter listing a bunch of other damage I’d be charged for as well—including scratches to the door which supposedly required repainting the rear of the car a few days after I returned my rental.
translation.medium: 在回家几周后, 我收到了一封信,
translation.reference: 回家几周后，我收到了一封信，上面列出了我需要赔偿的其他一些损坏，包括门上的划痕和车后部可能需要重新喷漆的损坏，这些都是我还车几天后出现的。

translation.en: None of that damage was visible to me (or the agent when I returned the vehicle).
translation.zh: 因为我没有看到这些损坏（我还车时，代理人也没发现这些损坏)。
translation.source: None of that damage was visible to me (or the agent when I returned the vehicle).
translation.medium: 没有任何损坏是可见的我 (或代理当我返回车辆).
translation.reference: 因为我没有看到这些损坏（我还车时，代理人也没发现这些损坏)。

translation.en: None of it was visible on the photos I took when I returned the car so I disputed the claim.
translation.zh: 在我还车时拍的照片上，都没看到这些损坏，所以我对索赔提出了异议。
translation.source: None of it was visible on the photos I took when I returned the car so I disputed the claim.
translation.medium: 在我返回车辆时拍摄的照片上没有任何可见的东西, 所以我对索赔提出了质疑.
translation.reference: 在我还车时拍的照片上，都没看到这些损坏，所以我对索赔提出了异议。

translation.en: They denied the dispute and demanded immediate payment for the damage.
translation.zh: 他们否认了这一争议，并要求立即赔偿损失。
translation.source: They denied the dispute and demanded immediate payment for the damage.
translation.medium: 他们否认有争议,并要求立即支付损失.
translation.reference: 他们否认了这一争议，并要求立即赔偿损失。

translation.en: Since it was a work trip, I turned my photos over to our legal department.
translation.zh: 因为我是出差租车，所以我把照片交给了公司的法律部门。
translation.source: Since it was a work trip, I turned my photos over to our legal department.
translation.medium: 因为这是一个工作之旅, 我把照片交给了我们的法律部门.
translation.reference: 因为我是出差租车，所以我把照片交给了公司的法律部门。

translation.en: I received a letter from Alamo a short while later saying that they were going to waive the charges in the interest of customer satisfaction.
translation.zh: 不久之后，我收到了一封来自阿拉莫的信，信中说为了提高客户满意度，他们将免除这些费用。
translation.source: I received a letter from Alamo a short while later saying that they were going to waive the charges in the interest of customer satisfaction.
translation.medium: 我收到了阿拉莫公司的一封信,
translation.reference: 不久之后，我收到了一封来自阿拉莫的信，信中说为了提高客户满意度，他们将免除这些费用。

translation.en: If I had been on my own, I certainly would have wound up paying the bill for damage which I am certain didn’t happen while the car was in my care.
translation.zh: 如果我是个人租车，肯定要为还车后发生的损坏买单了。
translation.source: If I had been on my own, I certainly would have wound up paying the bill for damage which I am certain didn’t happen while the car was in my care.
translation.medium: 如果我独自一人, 我肯定会最终支付损坏的账单, 我确信这辆车在我照顾的时候没有发生.
translation.reference: 如果我是个人租车，肯定要为还车后发生的损坏买单了。

translation.en: I see, may I have your eReader software version
translation.zh: 明白了，请把您的电子阅读器软件版本告诉我
translation.source: I see, may I have your eReader software version
translation.medium: 我看到了,我可以得到你的eReader软件版本
translation.reference: 明白了，请把您的电子阅读器软件版本告诉我

translation.en: To find your eReader's software version:
translation.zh: 以下是查找电子阅读器软件版本的步骤：
translation.source: To find your eReader's software version:
translation.medium: 要查找您的电子阅读器的软件版本:
translation.reference: 以下是查找电子阅读器软件版本的步骤：

translation.en: 1)Go to your Home screen.
translation.zh: 1)进入主屏幕。
translation.source: 1)Go to your Home screen.
translation.medium: 1) 进入您的首页.
translation.reference: 1)进入主屏幕。

translation.en: 2)Tap the More icon at the bottom right of the screen.
translation.zh: 2)点击屏幕右下方的“更多”图标。
translation.source: 2)Tap the More icon at the bottom right of the screen.
translation.medium: 2) 点击屏幕右下方的"更多"图标.
translation.reference: 2)点击屏幕右下方的“更多”图标。

translation.en: 3)Tap Settings.
translation.zh: 3)点击“设置”。
translation.source: 3)Tap Settings.
translation.medium: 3) 点击"设置".
translation.reference: 3)点击“设置”。

translation.en: 4)Tap Device information.
translation.zh: 4)点击“设备信息”。
translation.source: 4)Tap Device information.
translation.medium: 4) 点击设备信息.
translation.reference: 4)点击“设备信息”。

translation.en: 5)Beside 'Software version', you'll see your eReader's version number.
translation.zh: 5)在“软件版本”旁边，显示了您的电子阅读器的版本号。
translation.source: 5)Beside 'Software version', you'll see your eReader's version number.
translation.medium: 5) 在"软件版本"旁,您将看到电子阅读器的版本号.
translation.reference: 5)在“软件版本”旁边，显示了您的电子阅读器的版本号。

translation.en: Thank you for sending the photo.
translation.zh: 谢谢您发送的照片。
translation.source: Thank you for sending the photo.
translation.medium: 谢谢你发送的照片.
translation.reference: 谢谢您发送的照片。

translation.en: Let me check this further for you.
translation.zh: 我再查一下。
translation.source: Let me check this further for you.
translation.medium: 让我为你进一步检查一下.
translation.reference: 我再查一下。

translation.en: Checking on this again, it appears here that there is only one piece for the Shrimp Dumpling.
translation.zh: 再检查后发现，看起来只有一个虾饺。
translation.source: Checking on this again, it appears here that there is only one piece for the Shrimp Dumpling.
translation.medium: 检查一下, 这里只有一块蛋糕.
translation.reference: 再检查后发现，看起来只有一个虾饺。

translation.en: Just sign in to your account and wait till the sync is completed,  the books will be load on the #PRS_ORG# automatically.
translation.zh: 请登录帐户，同步完成后，图书将自动加载到 #PRS_ORG#。
translation.source: Just sign in to your account and wait till the sync is completed,  the books will be load on the #PRS_ORG# automatically.
translation.medium: 只需登录您的帐户并等到同步完成, 书籍将自动加载在#PRS_ORG#.
translation.reference: 请登录帐户，同步完成后，图书将自动加载到 #PRS_ORG#。

translation.en: That is all.
translation.zh: 这样就行了。
translation.source: That is all.
translation.medium: 这就是全部.
translation.reference: 这样就行了。

translation.en: Is there anything else I can help you with?
translation.zh: 还有什么需要我帮忙的吗？
translation.source: Is there anything else I can help you with?
translation.medium: 还有什么我可以帮忙的吗?
translation.reference: 还有什么需要我帮忙的吗？

translation.en: Are you there?
translation.zh: 您还在吗？
translation.source: Are you there?
translation.medium: 你还在吗?
translation.reference: 您还在吗？

translation.en: I am sorry, due to quality purposes I will have to close this chat if I don’t receive a response in 2 minutes.
translation.zh: 很抱歉，为了提高服务质量，如果您在 2 分钟内没有回应，我将结束本次聊天。
translation.source: I am sorry, due to quality purposes I will have to close this chat if I don’t receive a response in 2 minutes.
translation.medium: 我很抱歉,由于质量原因, 如果我在2分钟内没有收到回复, 我将不得不关闭这个聊天.
translation.reference: 很抱歉，为了提高服务质量，如果您在 2 分钟内没有回应，我将结束本次聊天。

translation.en: I will close this chat now since no response has been received.
translation.zh: 由于一直没有收到您的回复，我将结束本次聊天。
translation.source: I will close this chat now since no response has been received.
translation.medium: 由于没有收到任何回复,
translation.reference: 由于一直没有收到您的回复，我将结束本次聊天。

translation.en: I will gladly continue assisting you via email, or you can contact us again at a more convenient time for you.
translation.zh: 您可以通过电子邮件或者找一个方便的时间联系我们，我很乐意继续为您服务。
translation.source: I will gladly continue assisting you via email, or you can contact us again at a more convenient time for you.
translation.medium: 我很乐意通过电子邮件继续协助您,或者您可以在更方便的时间再次与我们联系.
translation.reference: 您可以通过电子邮件或者找一个方便的时间联系我们，我很乐意继续为您服务。

translation.en: Your Bought Item will be sent via Royal Mail or a national couriers company.
translation.zh: 您购买的商品将通过英国皇家邮政或国家快递公司运输。
translation.source: Your Bought Item will be sent via Royal Mail or a national couriers company.
translation.medium: 您购买的物品将通过皇家邮政或国家快递公司发送.
translation.reference: 您购买的商品将通过英国皇家邮政或国家快递公司运输。

translation.en: We try to post the item the same or next working day depending on the purchase time after the payment has been received.
translation.zh: 我们会在您购买当日或第二个工作日寄出商品，具体取决于收到付款的时间。
translation.source: We try to post the item the same or next working day depending on the purchase time after the payment has been received.
translation.medium: 我们试图在收到付款后的同一天或下一个工作日发送商品, 取决于购买时间.
translation.reference: 我们会在您购买当日或第二个工作日寄出商品，具体取决于收到付款的时间。

translation.en: 12.00 mid-day is the cut-off time.
translation.zh: 以中午 12 点为分界线。
translation.source: 12.00 mid-day is the cut-off time.
translation.medium: 中午12点是截止时间.
translation.reference: 以中午 12 点为分界线。

translation.en: There is no order processing or dispatching on public holidays or weekends.
translation.zh: 公众假期或周末不处理订单、不发货。
translation.source: There is no order processing or dispatching on public holidays or weekends.
translation.medium: 在公共假日或周末没有订单处理或发送.
translation.reference: 公众假期或周末不处理订单、不发货。

translation.en: We dispatch all orders accordingly but at some point, it could be possible that your bought item might be out of stock.
translation.zh: 一般情况下，我们会及时发货，如果未能及时发货，可能是您购买的商品库存不足。
translation.source: We dispatch all orders accordingly but at some point, it could be possible that your bought item might be out of stock.
translation.medium: 但在某些时候, 您购买的物品可能会缺货.
translation.reference: 一般情况下，我们会及时发货，如果未能及时发货，可能是您购买的商品库存不足。

translation.en: In this case, we will notify/contact you either when the item is back in stock ready for us to dispatch or to give you an alternative option.
translation.zh: 遇到这种情况，我们将通知/联系您，您可以选择有货时再发货，也可以换选其他商品。
translation.source: In this case, we will notify/contact you either when the item is back in stock ready for us to dispatch or to give you an alternative option.
translation.medium: 在这种情况下,我们将通知/联系您,无论是当物品在库存中准备好我们发送或给你一个替代选择.
translation.reference: 遇到这种情况，我们将通知/联系您，您可以选择有货时再发货，也可以换选其他商品。

translation.en: You will have the right to cancel the order if you wish.
translation.zh: 您也有权取消订单。
translation.source: You will have the right to cancel the order if you wish.
translation.medium: 如果您愿意,您有权取消订单.
translation.reference: 您也有权取消订单。

translation.en: eBay gives an estimated delivery date which does not include any supposed delay by Royal Mail/Couriers.
translation.zh: eBay 估算了交货日期，但此估算未考虑到皇家邮政/快递的延误。
translation.source: eBay gives an estimated delivery date which does not include any supposed delay by Royal Mail/Couriers.
translation.medium: eBay给出了估计的交付日期,其中不包括皇家邮政/快递公司可能推迟的交付日期.
translation.reference: eBay 估算了交货日期，但此估算未考虑到皇家邮政/快递的延误。

translation.en: This can include bad weather, system breakdown or staff strikes etc.
translation.zh: 延误的原因可能包括天气恶劣、系统故障或员工罢工等。
translation.source: This can include bad weather, system breakdown or staff strikes etc.
translation.medium: 这可能包括恶劣天气,系统故障或员工罢工等.
translation.reference: 延误的原因可能包括天气恶劣、系统故障或员工罢工等。

translation.en: These issues are not in our control so please keep this in mind.
translation.zh: 这些问题不在我们的控制范围内，敬请理解。
translation.source: These issues are not in our control so please keep this in mind.
translation.medium: 所以请记住这一点.
translation.reference: 这些问题不在我们的控制范围内，敬请理解。

translation.en: We dispatch items with the expectation of a service being provided by the couriers, but sometimes they do disappoint and this can't be our fault.
translation.zh: 我们发货时当然是希望您尽快收到商品，但快递服务有时难免不尽如人意，这不是我们的错。
translation.source: We dispatch items with the expectation of a service being provided by the couriers, but sometimes they do disappoint and this can't be our fault.
translation.medium: 但有时他们会让人失望, 这不能是我们的错.
translation.reference: 我们发货时当然是希望您尽快收到商品，但快递服务有时难免不尽如人意，这不是我们的错。

translation.en: If the courier is unable to deliver, a card should be left by the relevant delivery company instructing how to organise a re-delivery or where the parcel has been left for you to collect.
translation.zh: 如果快递公司投递不成功，应该会留下一张卡片，说明将再次安排投递或您可从何处取件。
translation.source: If the courier is unable to deliver, a card should be left by the relevant delivery company instructing how to organise a re-delivery or where the parcel has been left for you to collect.
translation.medium: 如果快递员无法交付,应由相关交付公司留下一张卡,说明如何组织重新交付或包裹已留在哪里,以便您收取.
translation.reference: 如果快递公司投递不成功，应该会留下一张卡片，说明将再次安排投递或您可从何处取件。

translation.en: If the parcel has been returned to the courier's depot, then they will allow a certain time for you to collect.
translation.zh: 如果包裹已经退回到快递公司的仓库，他们会给您留出取件的时间。
translation.source: If the parcel has been returned to the courier's depot, then they will allow a certain time for you to collect.
translation.medium: 如果包裹已经返回快递商的仓库, 那么他们会给你一定的时间来收取.
translation.reference: 如果包裹已经退回到快递公司的仓库，他们会给您留出取件的时间。

translation.en: If it is not collected within this time, the parcel will be returned to us.
translation.zh: 如果您逾期未取，包裹将被退回给我们。
translation.source: If it is not collected within this time, the parcel will be returned to us.
translation.medium: 如果在这个时间内没有收到, 包裹将返回给我们.
translation.reference: 如果您逾期未取，包裹将被退回给我们。

translation.en: We would then require you to repay the postage cost for us to re-send the parcel back to you.
translation.zh: 这种情况下，在您支付邮费后，我们才会将包裹重新寄回给您。
translation.source: We would then require you to repay the postage cost for us to re-send the parcel back to you.
translation.medium: 我们将要求您偿还邮费,以便我们将包裹发回您.
translation.reference: 这种情况下，在您支付邮费后，我们才会将包裹重新寄回给您。

translation.en: If the item is no longer required, a refund will be issued less the postage amount.
translation.zh: 如果此时您不想再要购买的商品，我们将从退款金额中扣除邮资。
translation.source: If the item is no longer required, a refund will be issued less the postage amount.
translation.medium: 如果货物不再需要,退款将减去邮费金额.
translation.reference: 如果此时您不想再要购买的商品，我们将从退款金额中扣除邮资。

translation.en: If for any reason you are not satisfied with your purchase, you can return the item for a refund within 30 days.
translation.zh: 如果您出于任何原因对您购买的商品不满意，可以在 30 天内退货并退款。
translation.source: If for any reason you are not satisfied with your purchase, you can return the item for a refund within 30 days.
translation.medium: 如果出于任何原因您对购买的产品不满意,您可以在30天内退回产品以获得退款.
translation.reference: 如果您出于任何原因对您购买的商品不满意，可以在 30 天内退货并退款。

translation.en: Returns are accepted only if the item is in its original re-sellable condition, which means items must not be used, worn, marked, have no scent, no pet hair or be in a condition that it can't be sold again.
translation.zh: 退回的商品必须不影响二次销售，也就说不能有用过的痕迹、磨损、印记、气味、宠物毛发或其他影响二次销售的痕迹。
translation.source: Returns are accepted only if the item is in its original re-sellable condition, which means items must not be used, worn, marked, have no scent, no pet hair or be in a condition that it can't be sold again.
translation.medium: 只有当物品处于原来的可再销售状态时才会被收回, 这意味着物品不能被使用,磨损,标记,没有气味,没有物毛或处于无法再销售的状态.
translation.reference: 退回的商品必须不影响二次销售，也就说不能有用过的痕迹、磨损、印记、气味、宠物毛发或其他影响二次销售的痕迹。

translation.en: Items must be returned in their original packaging with all product tags attached.
translation.zh: 商品必须以原包装退回，并附有所有产品标签。
translation.source: Items must be returned in their original packaging with all product tags attached.
translation.medium: 产品必须在原始包装中返回,并附上所有产品标签.
translation.reference: 商品必须以原包装退回，并附有所有产品标签。

translation.en: Please be careful when clothing is tried on that make up is not worn, or hair products, fragrances, deodorant or other creams or substances which mark or damage the product.
translation.zh: 试穿衣物时，请注意不要沾染上化妆品、护发产品、香水、除臭剂或其他会留下印记或损坏商品的膏类或物质。
translation.source: Please be careful when clothing is tried on that make up is not worn, or hair products, fragrances, deodorant or other creams or substances which mark or damage the product.
translation.medium: 请小心试着没有化品的衣服,发型产品,香水,除臭剂或其他或损伤产品的物质.
translation.reference: 试穿衣物时，请注意不要沾染上化妆品、护发产品、香水、除臭剂或其他会留下印记或损坏商品的膏类或物质。

translation.en: This will only result in your returned item not being accepted by us for a refund.
translation.zh: 否则，我们将不予退款。
translation.source: This will only result in your returned item not being accepted by us for a refund.
translation.medium: 这只会导致您返回的物品被我们拒绝退款.
translation.reference: 否则，我们将不予退款。

translation.en: We will require a postage payment by you for us to return the item to you.
translation.zh: 我们将要求您支付邮费，将商品退回给您。
translation.source: We will require a postage payment by you for us to return the item to you.
translation.medium: 我们将要求您支付邮费,以便我们将物品返还给您.
translation.reference: 我们将要求您支付邮费，将商品退回给您。

translation.en: We will keep or await postage payment for the item for a maximum of 30 days, and after this the item will be disposed of.
translation.zh: 我们将保留邮资待付的商品，最多 30 天，逾期将处理此商品。
translation.source: We will keep or await postage payment for the item for a maximum of 30 days, and after this the item will be disposed of.
translation.medium: 我们将保留或等待邮费支付的物品最多30天,此后该物品将被处置.
translation.reference: 我们将保留邮资待付的商品，最多 30 天，逾期将处理此商品。

translation.en: Items must be returned within 30 days of receipt.
translation.zh: 如需退货，必须在收货后 30 天内退回。
translation.source: Items must be returned within 30 days of receipt.
translation.medium: 这些物品必须在收到后的30天内返回.
translation.reference: 如需退货，必须在收货后 30 天内退回。

translation.en: If the item has arrived faulty or we have sent the wrong item, then we shall pay for the return of the item.
translation.zh: 如果收到时商品破损或我们邮寄了错误的商品，将由我们支付退货所需的邮资。
translation.source: If the item has arrived faulty or we have sent the wrong item, then we shall pay for the return of the item.
translation.medium: 如果物品有缺陷或我们发送错误的物品,那么我们将支付物品的退货费用.
translation.reference: 如果收到时商品破损或我们邮寄了错误的商品，将由我们支付退货所需的邮资。

translation.en: The easiest way would be to open a returns request via eBbay.
translation.zh: 最简单的方法是通过 ebay 申请退货。
translation.source: The easiest way would be to open a returns request via eBbay.
translation.medium: 最简单的方式是通过eBay开启退货请求.
translation.reference: 最简单的方法是通过 ebay 申请退货。

translation.en: Once received, we will examine the item and refund your account.
translation.zh: 退回的商品经检查没有问题，将向您退款。
translation.source: Once received, we will examine the item and refund your account.
translation.medium: 一旦收到,我们将检查物品并退还您的账户.
translation.reference: 退回的商品经检查没有问题，将向您退款。

translation.en: Items becoming faulty after/during wearing will be subject to an inspection of the item when returned to us.
translation.zh: 如果您在穿戴后/穿戴过程中发现商品有问题，我们将对退回的商品进行检查。
translation.source: Items becoming faulty after/during wearing will be subject to an inspection of the item when returned to us.
translation.medium: 在使用后/使用期间出现缺陷的物品将在返回给我们时接受检查.
translation.reference: 如果您在穿戴后/穿戴过程中发现商品有问题，我们将对退回的商品进行检查。

translation.en: If the fault is considered a genuine factory fault, then you will be refunded.
translation.zh: 如果是厂家的责任，我们将向您退款。
translation.source: If the fault is considered a genuine factory fault, then you will be refunded.
translation.medium: 如果故障被认为是真正的工厂故障,那么您将获得退款.
translation.reference: 如果是厂家的责任，我们将向您退款。

translation.en: If it is not a factory fault, the item will be returned back to you after the postage cost to return the item has been paid.
translation.zh: 如果不是厂家的责任，我们将在您支付邮资后将商品重新邮寄给您。
translation.source: If it is not a factory fault, the item will be returned back to you after the postage cost to return the item has been paid.
translation.medium: 如果不是工厂故障,该物品将在支付返回物品的邮费后返回给您.
translation.reference: 如果不是厂家的责任，我们将在您支付邮资后将商品重新邮寄给您。

translation.en: Again we will wait 30 days for this payment to be made, after which the item will be disposed of.
translation.zh: 同样的，如果您未在 30 天内支付邮资，我们将自行处理您的商品。
translation.source: Again we will wait 30 days for this payment to be made, after which the item will be disposed of.
translation.medium: 我们将再次等待30天的付款,
translation.reference: 同样的，如果您未在 30 天内支付邮资，我们将自行处理您的商品。

translation.en: The easiest way would be to return the item for a refund via Ebay returns, and then simply purchase the size or colour required back from us.
translation.zh: 最简单的方法是通过 Ebay 退回要退款的商品，然后按照所需的尺码或颜色重新购买。
translation.source: The easiest way would be to return the item for a refund via Ebay returns, and then simply purchase the size or colour required back from us.
translation.medium: 最简单的方法是通过eBay退货退货,然后简单地从我们那里购买所需的尺寸或颜色.
translation.reference: 最简单的方法是通过 Ebay 退回要退款的商品，然后按照所需的尺码或颜色重新购买。

translation.en: ALL RETURNS ARE THE RESPONSIBILITY OF THE SENDER UNTIL THEY ARRIVE TO US
translation.zh: 退回的商品在邮寄期间是寄件人的责任，直到我们收到
translation.source: ALL RETURNS ARE THE RESPONSIBILITY OF THE SENDER UNTIL THEY ARRIVE TO US
translation.medium: 所有退货都是发货人的责任,直到它们到达我们.
translation.reference: 退回的商品在邮寄期间是寄件人的责任，直到我们收到

translation.en: Please obtain Proof Of Postage from the Post Office Clerk
translation.zh: 请向邮局职员索取邮资证明
translation.source: Please obtain Proof Of Postage from the Post Office Clerk
translation.medium: 请从邮政办公室公务员那里获得邮票证明.
translation.reference: 请向邮局职员索取邮资证明

translation.en: Positive feedback is always appreciated, but if for whatever reason there is a problem with your purchase, please give us the chance to resolve the issue.
translation.zh: 我们希望得到您的好评，但如果您对收到的商品不是很满意，请给我们一个帮您解决问题的机会。
translation.source: Positive feedback is always appreciated, but if for whatever reason there is a problem with your purchase, please give us the chance to resolve the issue.
translation.medium: 积极的反总是值得的, 但如果出于任何原因有问题与您的购买, 请给我们机会解决问题.
translation.reference: 我们希望得到您的好评，但如果您对收到的商品不是很满意，请给我们一个帮您解决问题的机会。

translation.en: Hopefully, you will find our customer service very satisfactory.
translation.zh: 希望您对我们的客户服务感到满意。
translation.source: Hopefully, you will find our customer service very satisfactory.
translation.medium: 希望我们的客户服务能让您满意.
translation.reference: 希望您对我们的客户服务感到满意。

translation.en: > Decoupling will need them to make sure their apps work on all different iOS versions.
translation.zh: > 要想脱钩，他们需要确保自己的应用程序能够在所有不同的 iOS 版本上运行。
translation.source: > Decoupling will need them to make sure their apps work on all different iOS versions.
translation.medium: 需要他们确保他们的应用程序在所有不同的iOS版本上都能运行.
translation.reference: > 要想脱钩，他们需要确保自己的应用程序能够在所有不同的 iOS 版本上运行。

translation.en: This isn't even necessarily true.
translation.zh: 也不一定非得这样。
translation.source: This isn't even necessarily true.
translation.medium: 这甚至不一定是真的.
translation.reference: 也不一定非得这样。

translation.en: Just put a cap on the versions of iOS that the app supports and only push out updates for devices with the latest compatible versions of iOS.
translation.zh: 只需为应用程序支持的 iOS 版本设置上限，并只针对安装了 iOS 最新兼容版本的设备推出更新。
translation.source: Just put a cap on the versions of iOS that the app supports and only push out updates for devices with the latest compatible versions of iOS.
translation.medium: 只需限制应用程序支持的 iOS 版本, 并只推出最新兼容 iOS 版本的设备的更新.
translation.reference: 只需为应用程序支持的 iOS 版本设置上限，并只针对安装了 iOS 最新兼容版本的设备推出更新。

translation.en: That's how most apps work now.
translation.zh: 现在，大多数应用程序通过这种机制发挥作用。
translation.source: That's how most apps work now.
translation.medium: 现在大多数应用程序都是这样工作的.
translation.reference: 现在，大多数应用程序通过这种机制发挥作用。

translation.en: > Also, since Apple can release new iOS and macOS versions frequently.
translation.zh: > 此外，苹果可以频繁发布新的 iOS 和 macOS 版本。
translation.source: > Also, since Apple can release new iOS and macOS versions frequently.
translation.medium: 另外,因为果可以经常发布新的iOS和macOS版本.
translation.reference: > 此外，苹果可以频繁发布新的 iOS 和 macOS 版本。

translation.en: Isn't the problem that this still isn't frequently enough?
translation.zh: 问题不是在于还不够频繁吗？
translation.source: Isn't the problem that this still isn't frequently enough?
translation.medium: 问题不在于这种情况还不够频繁吗?
translation.reference: 问题不是在于还不够频繁吗？

translation.en: It also makes for some terrible UX.
translation.zh: 这也会带来一些糟糕的用户体验。
translation.source: It also makes for some terrible UX.
translation.medium: 这也造成了可怕的用户体验.
translation.reference: 这也会带来一些糟糕的用户体验。

translation.en: Even if Apple upped the rate of OS updates to account for minor bug fixes in a handful of apps, why does the user need to perform *a full OS upgrade* every time?
translation.zh: 即使苹果提高了操作系统更新的速度，以弥补少数应用程序中的小错误，为什么用户每次都需要执行“完整的操作系统升级”？
translation.source: Even if Apple upped the rate of OS updates to account for minor bug fixes in a handful of apps, why does the user need to perform *a full OS upgrade* every time?
translation.medium: 即使果提高了操作系统更新的速度以解决少数应用程序中的小错误, 为什么用户每次都需要进行*完整的操作系统升级*?
translation.reference: 即使苹果提高了操作系统更新的速度，以弥补少数应用程序中的小错误，为什么用户每次都需要执行“完整的操作系统升级”？

translation.en: And what does "the developers can be confident that their patch/feature will get pushed out in the new release" even mean?
translation.zh: “开发者确信将在新版本中推出补丁/功能”是什么意思？
translation.source: And what does "the developers can be confident that their patch/feature will get pushed out in the new release" even mean?
translation.medium: "开发者可以确信他们的补丁/功能会在新版本中被推出"意味着什么呢?
translation.reference: “开发者确信将在新版本中推出补丁/功能”是什么意思？

translation.en: > This is in contrast to Google.
translation.zh: > 谷歌正好相反。
translation.source: > This is in contrast to Google.
translation.medium: 这与谷歌相反.
translation.reference: > 谷歌正好相反。

translation.en: Google had to delink because there were a lot of Android versions in the wild, each with a huge market share.
translation.zh: 谷歌不得不与 Android 平台脱钩，因为市面上有很多 Android 版本，每个版本都拥有巨大的市场份额。
translation.source: Google had to delink because there were a lot of Android versions in the wild, each with a huge market share.
translation.medium: 谷歌不得不解开链接, 因为有很多Android版本, 每个都有很大的市场份额.
translation.reference: 谷歌不得不与 Android 平台脱钩，因为市面上有很多 Android 版本，每个版本都拥有巨大的市场份额。

translation.en: I can say without a doubt that if Android versions on phones were consistent like iOS, Google would never have done the releases with OS releases for these apps.
translation.zh: 我可以毫无迟疑地说，如果手机上的 Android 版本像 iOS 一样一致，谷歌永远不会为这些应用提供 OS 版本的产品。
translation.source: I can say without a doubt that if Android versions on phones were consistent like iOS, Google would never have done the releases with OS releases for these apps.
translation.medium: 我可以毫不怀疑地说, 如果手机上的Android版本和iOS一样一致,
translation.reference: 我可以毫无迟疑地说，如果手机上的 Android 版本像 iOS 一样一致，谷歌永远不会为这些应用提供 OS 版本的产品。

translation.en: That's a bold claim, but either way it still doesn't explain how bundling app updates as OS updates is "better" for the developers, or the end user.
translation.zh: 这个说法有点大胆，但无论如何，它仍然不能解释为什么将应用程序更新与操作系统更新捆绑在一起对开发者或最终用户“更好”。
translation.source: That's a bold claim, but either way it still doesn't explain how bundling app updates as OS updates is "better" for the developers, or the end user.
translation.medium: 这是一个大胆的说法, 但无论如何它仍然不能解释如何捆绑应用程序更新作为操作系统更新是"更好"的开发人员, 或最终用户.
translation.reference: 这个说法有点大胆，但无论如何，它仍然不能解释为什么将应用程序更新与操作系统更新捆绑在一起对开发者或最终用户“更好”。

translation.en: Gabba's double power failure explained and why it could happen again
translation.zh: 加巴体育馆双重停电事件足以说明以后还会再停电
translation.source: Gabba's double power failure explained and why it could happen again
translation.medium: 解释了Gabba的双重电源故障以及为什么它可能再次发生
translation.reference: 加巴体育馆双重停电事件足以说明以后还会再停电

translation.en: Risks of power failure inherent in the Gabba's broadcast compound set-up are unlikely to be improved before the next Ashes series, as cricket authorities await more detail on plans for the stadium's major upgrade to host the 2032 Olympic Games.
translation.zh: 在下一届灰烬杯系列赛之前，加巴广播场地固有的停电风险不太可能得到改善，因为板球管理机构尚在等待这座体育馆为举办 2032 年奥运会而进行的重大升级计划的更多细节。
translation.source: Risks of power failure inherent in the Gabba's broadcast compound set-up are unlikely to be improved before the next Ashes series, as cricket authorities await more detail on plans for the stadium's major upgrade to host the 2032 Olympic Games.
translation.medium: 由于板球当局等待有关2032年奥运会主办体育场重大升级计划的更多细节, 不太可能在下一届灰赛之前改善加巴广播综合体设置固有的电源故障风险.
translation.reference: 在下一届灰烬杯系列赛之前，加巴广播场地固有的停电风险不太可能得到改善，因为板球管理机构尚在等待这座体育馆为举办 2032 年奥运会而进行的重大升级计划的更多细节。

translation.en: Sources have told The Age and The Sydney Morning Herald that the Gabba is the only major stadium in Australian cricket where the mains power supply at the ground is not sufficient to fire up the vast array of broadcast trucks and devices needed to beam pictures around the world.
translation.zh: 有消息人士告诉《时代报》和《悉尼先驱晨报》，加巴体育馆是澳大利亚唯一一个地面电源供应不足的大型板球体育馆，无法让大量的广播车和设备向世界各地传送图片。
translation.source: Sources have told The Age and The Sydney Morning Herald that the Gabba is the only major stadium in Australian cricket where the mains power supply at the ground is not sufficient to fire up the vast array of broadcast trucks and devices needed to beam pictures around the world.
translation.medium: 消息人士告诉"时代报"和"悉尼晨报",
translation.reference: 有消息人士告诉《时代报》和《悉尼先驱晨报》，加巴体育馆是澳大利亚唯一一个地面电源供应不足的大型板球体育馆，无法让大量的广播车和设备向世界各地传送图片。

translation.en: Primary and backup generators powering the global broadcast of the Gabba Test went down for about 25 minutes on day four.
translation.zh: 为加巴体育馆测试赛的全球广播工作供电的主发电机和备用发电机在第四天关闭了大约 25 分钟。
translation.source: Primary and backup generators powering the global broadcast of the Gabba Test went down for about 25 minutes on day four.
translation.medium: 主要和备用发电机为Gabba测试的全球广播提供动力在第四天停机了大约25分钟.
translation.reference: 为加巴体育馆测试赛的全球广播工作供电的主发电机和备用发电机在第四天关闭了大约 25 分钟。

translation.en: That's because the base power in the precinct is required to supply the Gabba's light towers - one of which infamously went down during a Big Bash League match in 2019 - and the ground itself.
translation.zh: 这是因为该区域的基础电力系统需要同时为地面和加巴灯塔供电，也就是在 2019 年的一场 Big Bash League 比赛中倒塌的灯塔。
translation.source: That's because the base power in the precinct is required to supply the Gabba's light towers - one of which infamously went down during a Big Bash League match in 2019 - and the ground itself.
translation.medium: 这是因为该地区的基地电力需要为加巴的灯塔提供电力 - 其中一个在2019年的一场大满贯联赛比赛中臭名昭著地倒塌了 - 以及球场本身.
translation.reference: 这是因为该区域的基础电力系统需要同时为地面和加巴灯塔供电，也就是在 2019 年的一场 Big Bash League 比赛中倒塌的灯塔。

translation.en: As a result, broadcasters draw their primary power supply from a huge, diesel-fuelled generator hired for the Test match, with back-up power meant to be derived from a back-up generator.
translation.zh: 因此，广播公司从一台为测试赛租用的大型柴油发电机中获取主要电力供应，而备用电力则来自一台备用发电机。
translation.source: As a result, broadcasters draw their primary power supply from a huge, diesel-fuelled generator hired for the Test match, with back-up power meant to be derived from a back-up generator.
translation.medium: 因此,广播公司的主要电源来自为测试比赛租用的大型柴油发电机,备用电源来自备用发电机.
translation.reference: 因此，广播公司从一台为测试赛租用的大型柴油发电机中获取主要电力供应，而备用电力则来自一台备用发电机。

translation.en: However, on day four of the Test match, the failure of the primary generator fused with the back-up generator, causing both to go down simultaneously and resulting in the total or partial loss of broadcast pictures and DRS for nearly 30 minutes.
translation.zh: 但在测试赛的第 4 天，主发电机发生故障，备用发电机保险丝熔断，两台发电机同时关闭，导致广播画面全部或部分丢失，DRS 中断近 30 分钟。
translation.source: However, on day four of the Test match, the failure of the primary generator fused with the back-up generator, causing both to go down simultaneously and resulting in the total or partial loss of broadcast pictures and DRS for nearly 30 minutes.
translation.medium: 然而,在测试比赛的第四天,主发电机的故障与备用发电机融合,导致两者同时关闭,导致广播图片和DRS在近30分钟内完全或部分丢失.
translation.reference: 但在测试赛的第 4 天，主发电机发生故障，备用发电机保险丝熔断，两台发电机同时关闭，导致广播画面全部或部分丢失，DRS 中断近 30 分钟。

translation.en: NEP, the company that provides the outside broadcast trucks and other facilities to Fox and Seven, has sought an explanation from the company that provided the generators.
translation.zh: 向 Fox 和 Seven 提供外部广播车和其他设施的 NEP 公司要求提供发电机的公司做出解释。
translation.source: NEP, the company that provides the outside broadcast trucks and other facilities to Fox and Seven, has sought an explanation from the company that provided the generators.
translation.medium: 提供外部广播卡车和其他设施给福克斯和七号的NEP公司向提供发电机的公司寻求解释.
translation.reference: 向 Fox 和 Seven 提供外部广播车和其他设施的 NEP 公司要求提供发电机的公司做出解释。

translation.en: All other grounds to be used for the Ashes - Adelaide Oval, the MCG, the SCG and Bellerive Oval in Hobart - will provide mains power as the primary supply for broadcasters, leaving a diesel-powered generator as the back-up.
translation.zh: 灰烬杯的其他所有场地——Adelaide Oval、MCG、SCG 和霍巴特的 Bellerive Oval——将为广播公司提供供电网作为主要电源，柴油发电机作为备用电源。
translation.source: All other grounds to be used for the Ashes - Adelaide Oval, the MCG, the SCG and Bellerive Oval in Hobart - will provide mains power as the primary supply for broadcasters, leaving a diesel-powered generator as the back-up.
translation.medium: 所有其他用于灰比赛的场地 - 阿德莱德圆球场,霍巴特的MCG,SCG和Bellerive圆球场 - 将为广播公司提供主电源,而柴油发电机则作为备用.
translation.reference: 灰烬杯的其他所有场地——Adelaide Oval、MCG、SCG 和霍巴特的 Bellerive Oval——将为广播公司提供供电网作为主要电源，柴油发电机作为备用电源。

translation.en: This difference, which has caused considerable anxiety for the host broadcaster Fox Cricket in the past, was exacerbated during the Ashes Test by the vastly reduced crew of production and technical staff able to keep tabs on the myriad metaphorical balls being kept in the air throughout the match.
translation.zh: 这种差异在过去曾让主播机构 Fox Cricket 感到相当焦虑，而在灰烬杯测试赛期间，由于制作人员和技术人员的大幅减少，这种差异更加明显，因为他们能够在比赛期间密切关注在空中盘旋的无数个球。
translation.source: This difference, which has caused considerable anxiety for the host broadcaster Fox Cricket in the past, was exacerbated during the Ashes Test by the vastly reduced crew of production and technical staff able to keep tabs on the myriad metaphorical balls being kept in the air throughout the match.
translation.medium: 这种差异在过去给主播福克斯板球带来了相当大的焦虑, 在灰赛期间, 由于生产人员和技术人员的数量大大减少,
translation.reference: 这种差异在过去曾让主播机构 Fox Cricket 感到相当焦虑，而在灰烬杯测试赛期间，由于制作人员和技术人员的大幅减少，这种差异更加明显，因为他们能够在比赛期间密切关注在空中盘旋的无数个球。

translation.en: Cricket Australia were warned by Fox over several months that on a technical basis it would be safer to play the match elsewhere, but if it remained at the Gabba there would be "huge risks" inherent in the skeleton crew allowed into Queensland.
translation.zh: 几个月来，福克斯一直警告澳大利亚板球协会，从技术角度来看，在其他地方进行比赛会更安全，但如果比赛继续在加巴举行，允许进入昆士兰的主要工作人员将面临“巨大风险”。
translation.source: Cricket Australia were warned by Fox over several months that on a technical basis it would be safer to play the match elsewhere, but if it remained at the Gabba there would be "huge risks" inherent in the skeleton crew allowed into Queensland.
translation.medium: 澳大利亚板球队在几个月内被福克斯警告说,在技术基础上,在其他地方进行比赛会更安全,但如果它留在加巴,那么被允许进入昆士兰州的骨架船员将存在"巨大的风险".
translation.reference: 几个月来，福克斯一直警告澳大利亚板球协会，从技术角度来看，在其他地方进行比赛会更安全，但如果比赛继续在加巴举行，允许进入昆士兰的主要工作人员将面临“巨大风险”。

translation.en: For your information, I will be sending you a transcript of our conversation.
translation.zh: 我将把我们的聊天记录发送给您，供您参考。
translation.source: For your information, I will be sending you a transcript of our conversation.

translation.zh: 如果您有任何其他疑问或担忧，您可以随时回复邮件，我们很乐意继续帮助您。

translation.reference: 如果您有任何其他疑问或担忧，您可以随时回复邮件，我们很乐意继续帮助您。

translation.zh: 我们的骑手不小心把您订的餐弄洒了。

translation.reference: 我们的骑手不小心把您订的餐弄洒了。

translation.source: We will only send you a new order.
translation.medium: 我们只会发送新的订单.
translation.reference: 我们已为您重新下单。

translation.medium: 餐厅正在准备您的再送货.

translation.zh: 您的订单将在 #NUMBER# 分钟内送到，请您耐心等候。
translation.source: I kindly ask for your patience and wait for your order to be delivered within #NUMBER# minutes.
translation.medium: 我请大家耐心等待您的订单在#NUMBER#分钟内到达.
translation.reference: 您的订单将在 #NUMBER# 分钟内送到，请您耐心等候。

translation.en: There was nothing Von so long delivery time on your website
translation.zh: 网站显示的送货时间可没这么长
translation.source: There was nothing Von so long delivery time on your website
translation.medium: 在您的网站上没有任何Von如此长的交付时间
translation.reference: 网站显示的送货时间可没这么长

translation.en: Upon ordering it is to the lead time quoted.
translation.zh: 订购后才会提供交货期。
translation.source: Upon ordering it is to the lead time quoted.
translation.medium: 在订购时,它是引述的领先时间.
translation.reference: 订购后才会提供交货期。

translation.reference: 备货期如网站上所示。

translation.en: As we do not carry stock then all items are made to order, shipped on to us here at #URL# and then sent onto yourselves.
translation.zh: 因为我们没有库存，所有商品均为定做，运到我们这里 (#URL#)，再邮寄给您。
translation.source: As we do not carry stock then all items are made to order, shipped on to us here at #URL# and then sent onto yourselves.

translation.reference: 因为我们没有库存，所有商品均为定做，运到我们这里 (#URL#)，再邮寄给您。

translation.en: The dog that would not stop barking and how I got him to stop.
translation.zh: 犬吠不断，如何止之。
translation.source: The dog that would not stop barking and how I got him to stop.
translation.medium: 那只不停吠叫的狗,以及我如何让它停止吠叫.
translation.reference: 犬吠不断，如何止之。

translation.en: My neighbors got a dog about three years ago.
translation.zh: 我的邻居三年前买了只狗。
translation.source: My neighbors got a dog about three years ago.
translation.medium: 我的邻居大约三年前买了一只狗.
translation.reference: 我的邻居三年前买了只狗。

translation.en: These neighbors and I share a fence.
translation.zh: 我们的后院挨着，
translation.source: These neighbors and I share a fence.
translation.medium: 这些邻居和我共享一个.
translation.reference: 我们的后院挨着，

translation.en: It separates our back yards.
translation.zh: 仅一篱笆之隔。
translation.source: It separates our back yards.
translation.medium: 它把我们的后院分开.
translation.reference: 仅一篱笆之隔。

translation.en: Well, this dog snarls and barks and tries to bite me through the fence the entire time I'm out in the backyard.
translation.zh: 只要我进入后院，这只狗就一直篱笆的那边狂吠，好像想咬我似的。
translation.source: Well, this dog snarls and barks and tries to bite me through the fence the entire time I'm out in the backyard.
translation.medium: 这只狗叫,吠叫, 试图通过咬我整个时间我在后院.
translation.reference: 只要我进入后院，这只狗就一直篱笆的那边狂吠，好像想咬我似的。

translation.en: I've tried to ignore it, talk softly, etc.
translation.zh: 视若无睹、轻声抚慰，这些我都试过。
translation.source: I've tried to ignore it, talk softly, etc.
translation.medium: 我试图忽略它,轻声说话,等等.
translation.reference: 视若无睹、轻声抚慰，这些我都试过。

translation.en: but this dog is insane.
translation.zh: 但这只狗跟疯了似的，这些招数一概没用。
translation.source: but this dog is insane.
translation.medium: 但这只狗是疯狂的.
translation.reference: 但这只狗跟疯了似的，这些招数一概没用。

translation.en: The maintenance guys are afraid of it.
translation.zh: 上门来维修的人都很怕它。
translation.source: The maintenance guys are afraid of it.
translation.medium: 维护人员害怕它.
translation.reference: 上门来维修的人都很怕它。

translation.en: So I went and did the neighborly thing and asked them to help me figure out how to get this dog to chill.
translation.zh: 所以，秉承邻里友好的原则，我去跟邻居交涉，问他们怎样能让狗安静下来。
translation.source: So I went and did the neighborly thing and asked them to help me figure out how to get this dog to chill.
translation.medium: 所以我去做好邻居的事情, 要求他们帮我弄清楚如何让这只狗冷静下来.
translation.reference: 所以，秉承邻里友好的原则，我去跟邻居交涉，问他们怎样能让狗安静下来。

translation.en: I can't even use my yard at this point.
translation.zh: 要知道那只狗整天叫个不停，没完没了，
translation.source: I can't even use my yard at this point.
translation.medium: 我甚至不能使用我的院子在这一点上.
translation.reference: 要知道那只狗整天叫个不停，没完没了，

translation.en: That dog is outside all day long, snarling and yapping non-stop.
translation.zh: 我都不能进院子了。
translation.source: That dog is outside all day long, snarling and yapping non-stop.
translation.medium: 这只狗一整天都在外面,不停地叫,叫.
translation.reference: 我都不能进院子了。

translation.en: I asked if I could give it healthy treats through the fence.
translation.zh: 我问邻居，我能不能隔着篱笆给它投喂健康的食物，
translation.source: I asked if I could give it healthy treats through the fence.
translation.medium: 我问如果我可以通过给它健康的处理.
translation.reference: 我问邻居，我能不能隔着篱笆给它投喂健康的食物，

translation.en: Owner says no.
translation.zh: 他们说不行。
translation.source: Owner says no.
translation.medium: 业主说没有.
translation.reference: 他们说不行。

translation.en: I asked if we could go in halves on a non-shock bark collar.
translation.zh: 我又说，我愿意平摊狗项圈的费用。
translation.source: I asked if we could go in halves on a non-shock bark collar.
translation.medium: 我问如果我们可以在一半不冲击树皮项圈.
translation.reference: 我又说，我愿意平摊狗项圈的费用。

translation.en: Owner says no.
translation.zh: 他们说不要。
translation.source: Owner says no.
translation.medium: 业主说没有.
translation.reference: 他们说不要。

translation.en: (Edit to say I asked the neighbor at least three times to help her dog.)
translation.zh: （我至少三次请求邻居管管它的狗了。）
translation.source: (Edit to say I asked the neighbor at least three times to help her dog.)
translation.medium: 我要求邻居至少三次帮助她的狗.
translation.reference: （我至少三次请求邻居管管它的狗了。）

translation.en: Frustrated but not willing to call animal control or anything yet, I hatched a plan.
translation.zh: 我很沮丧，但还不想打电话给动物控制中心或其他机构，于是我想出了一个计划。
translation.source: Frustrated but not willing to call animal control or anything yet, I hatched a plan.
translation.medium: 我还没有打电话给动物控制局,
translation.reference: 我很沮丧，但还不想打电话给动物控制中心或其他机构，于是我想出了一个计划。

translation.en: I bought a very nice portable speaker that is *loud*.
translation.zh: 我买了一个好用的便携式扬声器，声音很*大*。
translation.source: I bought a very nice portable speaker that is *loud*.
translation.medium: 我买了一个很好的便携式扬声器,
translation.reference: 我买了一个好用的便携式扬声器，声音很*大*。

translation.en: Like, I saved and invested in this.
translation.zh: 为了买这个扬声器，我可是存了一阵子钱的。
translation.source: Like, I saved and invested in this.
translation.medium: 就像,我储蓄和投资在这里.
translation.reference: 为了买这个扬声器，我可是存了一阵子钱的。

translation.en: Now, every time I go to my backyard, I bring my speaker.
translation.zh: 现在，我每次进后院都会带上它。
translation.source: Now, every time I go to my backyard, I bring my speaker.
translation.medium: 现在,每次我走到后院, 我都会带着扬声器.
translation.reference: 现在，我每次进后院都会带上它。

translation.en: There is no daytime noise ordinance here, I checked.
translation.zh: 我查过了，此地没有日间噪音条例。
translation.source: There is no daytime noise ordinance here, I checked.
translation.medium: 这里没有白天噪音条例,我检查了.
translation.reference: 我查过了，此地没有日间噪音条例。

translation.en: When the dog begins its snarling barking attacking the fence thing, my neighbors (all of them) get to enjoy a little Lamb of God or Rotting Christ or some other great music turned all the way up.
translation.zh: 当狗吠叫着要冲过篱笆的时候，我就给我的邻居们（他们所有人）播放上帝羔羊乐队或腐烂的基督乐队的音乐以及一些其他经典音乐。
translation.source: When the dog begins its snarling barking attacking the fence thing, my neighbors (all of them) get to enjoy a little Lamb of God or Rotting Christ or some other great music turned all the way up.
translation.medium: 我的邻居们 (他们中的所有人) 都能享受一首小小的"上帝之羔羊"或"腐烂的基督"或其他一些很棒的音乐.
translation.reference: 当狗吠叫着要冲过篱笆的时候，我就给我的邻居们（他们所有人）播放上帝羔羊乐队或腐烂的基督乐队的音乐以及一些其他经典音乐。

translation.en: My speaker shakes the table.
translation.zh: 扬声器声音大的把桌子都震的动了起来。
translation.source: My speaker shakes the table.
translation.medium: 我的发言人动摇了桌子.
translation.reference: 扬声器声音大的把桌子都震的动了起来。

translation.en: It didn't take the neighbors long to put two and two together.
translation.zh: 我的邻居没过多久就明白过来了。
translation.source: It didn't take the neighbors long to put two and two together.
translation.medium: 邻居们很快就把两个和两个放在一起了.
translation.reference: 我的邻居没过多久就明白过来了。

translation.en: The dog is now kept mostly inside and when it does come out, it's quick or the owner goes out with it.
translation.zh: 那只狗现在大部分时间都被关在家里，即使出来，也只是一小会儿，或者有主人陪着。
translation.source: The dog is now kept mostly inside and when it does come out, it's quick or the owner goes out with it.
translation.medium: 这只狗现在大部分时间都在室内, 当它出来时,
translation.reference: 那只狗现在大部分时间都被关在家里，即使出来，也只是一小会儿，或者有主人陪着。

translation.en: The neighborhood is wonderfully quiet nowadays.
translation.zh: 现在，附近一带非常安静。
translation.source: The neighborhood is wonderfully quiet nowadays.
translation.medium: 邻里现在非常安静.
translation.reference: 现在，附近一带非常安静。

translation.en: Edit some grammar errors
translation.zh: 编辑一些语法错误
translation.source: Edit some grammar errors
translation.medium: 编辑一些语法错误
translation.reference: 编辑一些语法错误

translation.en: Edit again: PSA DO NOT GIVE DOGS ANY TYPE OF HUMAN MEDICATION, LIKE LAXITIVES OR NYQUIL.
translation.zh: 编后语：不要给狗投喂任何种类的人造药物，如泻药或奈奎尔。
translation.source: Edit again: PSA DO NOT GIVE DOGS ANY TYPE OF HUMAN MEDICATION, LIKE LAXITIVES OR NYQUIL.
translation.medium: 不会给狗任何类型的人类药物,
translation.reference: 编后语：不要给狗投喂任何种类的人造药物，如泻药或奈奎尔。

translation.en: This can seriously harm and even kill an animal.
translation.zh: 这会严重伤害甚至杀死动物。
translation.source: This can seriously harm and even kill an animal.
translation.medium: 这可能会严重伤害甚至杀死动物.
translation.reference: 这会严重伤害甚至杀死动物。

translation.en: Also, the speaker is a portable pa system from JYX, if anyone is interested.
translation.zh: 另外，这个扬声器是 JYX 的便携式 PA 系统，如果有人感兴趣的话。
translation.source: Also, the speaker is a portable pa system from JYX, if anyone is interested.
translation.medium: 另外,如果有人感兴趣的话, 扬声器是来自JYX的便携式PA系统.
translation.reference: 另外，这个扬声器是 JYX 的便携式 PA 系统，如果有人感兴趣的话。

translation.en: It was under $200, but I'm poor so I had to save for a bit.
translation.zh: 不到 200 美元，但我很穷，所以不得不存上一阵子。
translation.source: It was under $200, but I'm poor so I had to save for a bit.
translation.medium: 它不到200美元,但我很穷,所以我不得不储蓄一点.
translation.reference: 不到 200 美元，但我很穷，所以不得不存上一阵子。

translation.en: It sounds great for the money, though.
translation.zh: 虽然听起来很划算。
translation.source: It sounds great for the money, though.
translation.medium: 这听起来很好,虽然.
translation.reference: 虽然听起来很划算。

translation.en: I'm impressed and so are my neighbors.
translation.zh: 这件事让我印象深刻，相信我的邻居也是如此。
translation.source: I'm impressed and so are my neighbors.
translation.medium: 我印象深刻,我的邻居也是.
translation.reference: 这件事让我印象深刻，相信我的邻居也是如此。

translation.zh: 进入主屏幕。
translation.source: Go to your Home screen.
translation.medium: 进入主屏幕.
translation.reference: 进入主屏幕。

translation.en: Tap the More icon (three horizontal lines) at the bottom of the screen.
translation.zh: 点击屏幕底部的“更多”图标（3 条横线）。
translation.source: Tap the More icon (three horizontal lines) at the bottom of the screen.
translation.medium: 点击屏幕底部的更多图标 (三条水平线).
translation.reference: 点击屏幕底部的“更多”图标（3 条横线）。

translation.zh: 点击“设置”
translation.source: Tap Settings
translation.medium: 点击"设置"
translation.reference: 点击“设置”

translation.en: Tap Device information.
translation.zh: 点击“设备信息”。
translation.source: Tap Device information.
translation.medium: 点击"设备信息".
translation.reference: 点击“设备信息”。

translation.en: Beside 'Repair your #PRS_ORG# account', tap Repair.
translation.zh: 在“修复您的 #PRS_ORG# 帐户”旁边，点击“修复”。
translation.source: Beside 'Repair your #PRS_ORG# account', tap Repair.

translation.reference: 在“修复您的 #PRS_ORG# 帐户”旁边，点击“修复”。

translation.en: Tap Repair now.
translation.zh: 点击“立即修复”。
translation.source: Tap Repair now.
translation.medium: 现在点击"修复".
translation.reference: 点击“立即修复”。

translation.en: The account repair process will begin.
translation.zh: 帐户修复过程将开始。
translation.source: The account repair process will begin.
translation.medium: 账户修复过程将开始.
translation.reference: 帐户修复过程将开始。

translation.en: If you have a lot of books, it may take a while.
translation.zh: 如果您有很多书，可能需要一点时间。
translation.source: If you have a lot of books, it may take a while.
translation.medium: 如果你有很多书,可能需要一段时间.
translation.reference: 如果您有很多书，可能需要一点时间。

translation.en: Checking here again,  I can see here that the rider accidentally marked the order as delivered.
translation.zh: 我这里再检查了一次，发现是骑手不小心把订单标记为已送达了。
translation.source: Checking here again,  I can see here that the rider accidentally marked the order as delivered.
translation.medium: 我再次检查, 我可以在这里看到, 骑手不小心标记订单作为交付.
translation.reference: 我这里再检查了一次，发现是骑手不小心把订单标记为已送达了。

translation.en: We currently do not have the exact information on what happened to the rider as well as to your order.
translation.zh: 我们现在也不知道骑手和您订的餐发生了什么事。
translation.source: We currently do not have the exact information on what happened to the rider as well as to your order.
translation.medium: 我们目前还没有准确的信息关于骑手以及您的订单发生了什么.
translation.reference: 我们现在也不知道骑手和您订的餐发生了什么事。

translation.en: We are now investigating this for you.
translation.zh: 我们正在调查此事。
translation.source: We are now investigating this for you.
translation.medium: 我们现在正在为您调查此事.
translation.reference: 我们正在调查此事。

translation.en: Here's what I can do.
translation.zh: 请您耐心等待。
translation.source: Here's what I can do.
translation.medium: 这就是我能做的.
translation.reference: 请您耐心等待。

translation.en: Is the screen grayed out and you see a book cover?
translation.zh: 屏幕变灰了吗，您看到书的封面了吗？
translation.source: Is the screen grayed out and you see a book cover?
translation.medium: 屏幕是灰色的, 你看到的是一本书的封面?
translation.reference: 屏幕变灰了吗，您看到书的封面了吗？

translation.en: To turn the device completely please leave your finger pressing the power button per 30 seconds

translation.reference: 要完全重置设备，请按住电源按钮 30 秒

translation.zh: 利兹·特拉斯 (Liz Truss) 在 G7 会议上承诺再向阿富汗提供 7500 万英镑的援助
translation.source: Liz Truss pledges another £75m in aid to Afghanistan at G7 meeting
translation.medium: 利兹·特拉斯在G7会议上承诺向阿富汗提供另外7500万英的援助
translation.reference: 利兹·特拉斯 (Liz Truss) 在 G7 会议上承诺再向阿富汗提供 7500 万英镑的援助
