translation.en: Various computer screens, operating systems, and even different web browsers have different coloor characteristics, so it's almost impossible to get a given coloor to look the same on every screen.
translation.zh: 不同的电脑屏幕、操作系统，甚至是不同的 Web 浏览器呈现的颜色不尽相同，因此几乎不可能没有色差。
translation.source: Various computer screens, operating systems, and even different web browsers have different coloor characteristics, so it's almost impossible to get a given coloor to look the same on every screen.
translation.medium: 不同的计算机屏幕,操作系统,甚至不同的网页浏览器都有不同的颜色特性,所以几乎不可能让给定的颜色在每一个屏幕上看起来都是一样的.
translation.reference: 不同的电脑屏幕、操作系统，甚至是不同的 Web 浏览器呈现的颜色不尽相同，因此几乎不可能没有色差。

translation.en: If the colours of the posters don't fit your expectation, please send us a message.
translation.zh: 如果海报的颜色不符合您的期望，请告诉我们。
translation.source: If the colours of the posters don't fit your expectation, please send us a message.
translation.medium: 如果海报的颜色不符合您的期望,请发信给我们.
translation.reference: 如果海报的颜色不符合您的期望，请告诉我们。

translation.en: In most cases, we can change it to satisfy your needs.
translation.zh: 大多数情况下，我们可以根据您的需要进行修改。
translation.source: In most cases, we can change it to satisfy your needs.
translation.medium: 在大多数情况下, 我们可以改变它以满足您的需求.
translation.reference: 大多数情况下，我们可以根据您的需要进行修改。

translation.en: This is a different issue.
translation.zh: 这是另一个问题。
translation.source: This is a different issue.
translation.medium: 这是一个不同的问题.
translation.reference: 这是另一个问题。

translation.en: Disabled people in America just aren't treated right, full stop.
translation.zh: 在美国，残疾人就是没有得到合理的待遇，仅此而已。
translation.source: Disabled people in America just aren't treated right, full stop.
translation.medium: 美国的残疾人没有得到正确的对待.
translation.reference: 在美国，残疾人就是没有得到合理的待遇，仅此而已。

translation.en: It doesn't have anything to do with income or living alone.
translation.zh: 这与收入或独自生活没有任何关系。
translation.source: It doesn't have anything to do with income or living alone.
translation.medium: 这与收入或单身生活无关.
translation.reference: 这与收入或独自生活没有任何关系。

translation.en: Services and consideration for the disabled (as well as the poor) just aren't close to where they should be.
translation.zh: 面向残疾人（以及穷人）的服务和关怀远没有达到应有的水平。
translation.source: Services and consideration for the disabled (as well as the poor) just aren't close to where they should be.
translation.medium: 服务和对残疾人 (以及穷人) 的考虑,
translation.reference: 面向残疾人（以及穷人）的服务和关怀远没有达到应有的水平。

translation.en: We treat the disabled like crap.
translation.zh: 我们视残疾人如草芥，
translation.source: We treat the disabled like crap.
translation.medium: 我们把残疾人当作废物.
translation.reference: 我们视残疾人如草芥，

translation.en: We treat the poor like crap.
translation.zh: 对待穷人像对待垃圾一样。
translation.source: We treat the poor like crap.
translation.medium: 我们把穷人当作废物.
translation.reference: 对待穷人像对待垃圾一样。

translation.en: Everyone in the US should be ashamed.
translation.zh: 每个美国人都应该为此感到羞耻。
translation.source: Everyone in the US should be ashamed.
translation.medium: 每个美国人都应该感到羞愧.
translation.reference: 每个美国人都应该为此感到羞耻。

translation.en: You're correct that our society needs to value human life more.
translation.zh: 你说得对，我们的社会应该更尊重人的生命。
translation.source: You're correct that our society needs to value human life more.
translation.medium: 我们的社会需要更重视人类生命.
translation.reference: 你说得对，我们的社会应该更尊重人的生命。

translation.en: If we did, we'd see these mass gun shootings go down.
translation.zh: 做到这一点，大规模枪击事件就会平息，
translation.source: If we did, we'd see these mass gun shootings go down.
translation.medium: 如果我们这样做, 我们会看到这些大规模枪击事件发生.
translation.reference: 做到这一点，大规模枪击事件就会平息，

translation.en: We'd see fewer traffic accidents and deaths.
translation.zh: 交通事故和死亡事件就会减少。
translation.source: We'd see fewer traffic accidents and deaths.
translation.medium: 我们会看到更少的交通事故和死亡.
translation.reference: 交通事故和死亡事件就会减少。

translation.en: Health care and child care would be affordable and much easier access, and so on.
translation.zh: 医疗护理和儿童保健不再是沉重的负担，也更容易获得，有诸多好处。
translation.source: Health care and child care would be affordable and much easier access, and so on.
translation.medium: 医疗保健和儿童保育将会更便宜,更容易获得,等等.
translation.reference: 医疗护理和儿童保健不再是沉重的负担，也更容易获得，有诸多好处。

translation.en: Unfortunately, American society has "accepted" the statistics of hardship, deaths and other casualties as just "a way of life"...in exchange for "freedom" or some such BS.
translation.zh: 不幸的是，美国社会已经“接受”了困难、死亡和其他伤亡的统计数字，只是“一种生活方式”……以换取“自由”或诸如此类的东西。
translation.source: Unfortunately, American society has "accepted" the statistics of hardship, deaths and other casualties as just "a way of life"...in exchange for "freedom" or some such BS.
translation.medium: 不幸的是, 美国社会已经"接受"困难,死亡和其他伤亡的统计数据,
translation.reference: 不幸的是，美国社会已经“接受”了困难、死亡和其他伤亡的统计数字，只是“一种生活方式”……以换取“自由”或诸如此类的东西。

translation.en: I see your comment about being disabled and not being supported as just another example of how America just doesn't support people.
translation.zh: 我认为你提出的关于残疾人和人民没有获得支持的说法就是美国没有爱护人民的另一个例证。
translation.source: I see your comment about being disabled and not being supported as just another example of how America just doesn't support people.
translation.medium: 我认为你关于残疾和没有支持的评论只是美国如何不支持人们的另一个例子.
translation.reference: 我认为你提出的关于残疾人和人民没有获得支持的说法就是美国没有爱护人民的另一个例证。

translation.en: It's in the same vein as the author's point, not a conflict.
translation.zh: 这与作者的观点一致，并无冲突。
translation.source: It's in the same vein as the author's point, not a conflict.
translation.medium: 这与作者的观点是一致的,
translation.reference: 这与作者的观点一致，并无冲突。

translation.en: I can see here that there is no rider assigned yet to your order.
translation.zh: 我这里看到您的订单还没有指派骑手。
translation.source: I can see here that there is no rider assigned yet to your order.
translation.medium: 我可以看到这里还没有骑士分配给你的命令.
translation.reference: 我这里看到您的订单还没有指派骑手。

translation.en: However I will note this on the records.
translation.zh: 我会把这一点记录下来。
translation.source: However I will note this on the records.
translation.medium: 然而我会在记录中注明这一点.
translation.reference: 我会把这一点记录下来。

translation.en: You can also use the app to call or chat them, once they are nearby the location you will have an option to contact the rider.
translation.zh: 您也可以使用这个 App 打电话或使用聊天功能，在骑手到达附近位置时与骑手联系。
translation.source: You can also use the app to call or chat them, once they are nearby the location you will have an option to contact the rider.
translation.medium: 你也可以使用应用程序来打电话或聊天, 一旦他们在附近的位置, 你将有一个选择联系骑手.
translation.reference: 您也可以使用这个 App 打电话或使用聊天功能，在骑手到达附近位置时与骑手联系。

translation.en: Organisations on high alert as techs race to fix software flaw
translation.zh: 技术人员竞相修复软件缺陷，企业处于高度戒备状态
translation.source: Organisations on high alert as techs race to fix software flaw
translation.medium: 随着技术人员争相修复软件漏洞, 组织处于高度警戒状态
translation.reference: 技术人员竞相修复软件缺陷，企业处于高度戒备状态

translation.en: A critical vulnerability in a widely used software tool - one quickly exploited in the online game Minecraft - is rapidly emerging as a major threat to organizations around the world.
translation.zh: 一款广泛使用的软件工具中的一个关键漏洞正在迅速成为世界各地组织的主要威胁，在线游戏《我的世界》(Minecraft) 也因此漏洞遭到大量攻击。
translation.source: A critical vulnerability in a widely used software tool - one quickly exploited in the online game Minecraft - is rapidly emerging as a major threat to organizations around the world.
translation.medium: 一个被广泛使用的软件工具中的一个关键漏洞 - - 一个在线游戏"Minecraft"中迅速被利用的漏洞 - - 正迅速成为全球各个组织的重大威胁.
translation.reference: 一款广泛使用的软件工具中的一个关键漏洞正在迅速成为世界各地组织的主要威胁，在线游戏《我的世界》(Minecraft) 也因此漏洞遭到大量攻击。

translation.en: "The internet's on fire right now," said Adam Meyers, senior vice president of intelligence at the cybersecurity firm Crowdstrike.
translation.zh: 网络安全公司 Crowdstrike 高级情报副总裁亚当·迈耶斯 (Adam Meyers) 说:“互联网现在着火了。”
translation.source: "The internet's on fire right now," said Adam Meyers, senior vice president of intelligence at the cybersecurity firm Crowdstrike.
translation.medium: 网络安全公司Crowdstrike的情报高级副总裁Adam Meyers说:"互联网正在燃烧.
translation.reference: 网络安全公司 Crowdstrike 高级情报副总裁亚当·迈耶斯 (Adam Meyers) 说:“互联网现在着火了。”

translation.en: "People are scrambling to patch," he said, "and all kinds of people scrambling to exploit it."
translation.zh: “有人在着急忙慌地修补漏洞，”他说，“有人在争先恐后地利用漏洞。”
translation.source: "People are scrambling to patch," he said, "and all kinds of people scrambling to exploit it."
translation.medium: 他表示:"人们正在争先恐后地寻求补丁, 各种人也在争先恐地利用它.
translation.reference: “有人在着急忙慌地修补漏洞，”他说，“有人在争先恐后地利用漏洞。”

translation.en: He said Friday morning that in the 12 hours since the bug's existence was disclosed that it had been "fully weaponised," meaning malefactors had developed and distributed tools to exploit it.
translation.zh: 他在周五上午表示，自该漏洞被披露以来的 12 个小时内，它已被“完全武器化”，这意味着不法分子已经开发并分发了利用该漏洞的工具。
translation.source: He said Friday morning that in the 12 hours since the bug's existence was disclosed that it had been "fully weaponised," meaning malefactors had developed and distributed tools to exploit it.
translation.medium: 他周五早上说, 自从漏洞存在以来的12个小时内, 它已经"完全武器化", 这意味着恶意分子已经开发和分发了利用它的工具.
translation.reference: 他在周五上午表示，自该漏洞被披露以来的 12 个小时内，它已被“完全武器化”，这意味着不法分子已经开发并分发了利用该漏洞的工具。

translation.en: The flaw may be the worst computer vulnerability discovered in years.
translation.zh: 该漏洞可能是多年来发现的最严重的计算机漏洞。
translation.source: The flaw may be the worst computer vulnerability discovered in years.
translation.medium: 这个漏洞可能是多年来发现的最严重的计算机漏洞.
translation.reference: 该漏洞可能是多年来发现的最严重的计算机漏洞。

translation.en: It was uncovered in a utility that's ubiquitous in cloud servers and enterprise software used across industry and government.
translation.zh: 该漏洞出自一个实用程序，而该实用程序在云服务器和各行各业及政府使用的企业软件中无处不在。
translation.source: It was uncovered in a utility that's ubiquitous in cloud servers and enterprise software used across industry and government.
translation.medium: 在云服务器和企业软件中无处不在的应用程序中被发现.
translation.reference: 该漏洞出自一个实用程序，而该实用程序在云服务器和各行各业及政府使用的企业软件中无处不在。

translation.en: Unless it is fixed, it grants criminals, spies and programming novices alike easy access to internal networks where they can loot valuable data, plant malware, erase crucial information and much more.
translation.zh: 除非修复该漏洞，否则罪犯、间谍和编程新手都能轻松进入内部网络，窃取有价值的数据、植入恶意软件、删除关键信息等等。
translation.source: Unless it is fixed, it grants criminals, spies and programming novices alike easy access to internal networks where they can loot valuable data, plant malware, erase crucial information and much more.
translation.medium: 犯罪分子,间和编程新手都能轻松进入内部网络,
translation.reference: 除非修复该漏洞，否则罪犯、间谍和编程新手都能轻松进入内部网络，窃取有价值的数据、植入恶意软件、删除关键信息等等。

translation.en: Cyber attacks are now seen as the biggest threat to financial stability.
translation.zh: 如今，网络攻击被视为金融稳定的最大威胁。
translation.source: Cyber attacks are now seen as the biggest threat to financial stability.
translation.medium: 网络攻击现在被视为对金融稳定的最大威胁.
translation.reference: 如今，网络攻击被视为金融稳定的最大威胁。

translation.en: "I'd be hard-pressed to think of a company that's not at risk," said Joe Sullivan, chief security officer for Cloudflare, whose online infrastructure protects websites from malicious actors.
translation.zh: Cloudflare 首席安全官乔•沙利文 (Joe Sullivan) 表示:“我很难想象有哪家公司没有风险，”Cloudflare 的在线基础设施可保护网站免受恶意行为的攻击。
translation.source: "I'd be hard-pressed to think of a company that's not at risk," said Joe Sullivan, chief security officer for Cloudflare, whose online infrastructure protects websites from malicious actors.
translation.medium: "我很难想象一家不面临风险的公司", Cloudflare 的首席安全官乔·沙利文 (Joe Sullivan) 说, 这家公司的在线基础设施保护网站免受恶意攻击.
translation.reference: Cloudflare 首席安全官乔•沙利文 (Joe Sullivan) 表示:“我很难想象有哪家公司没有风险，”Cloudflare 的在线基础设施可保护网站免受恶意行为的攻击。

translation.en: Untold millions of servers have it installed, and experts said the fallout would not be known for several days.
translation.zh: 有数以百万计的服务器安装了该软件，专家表示，其后果要过几天才能知道。
translation.source: Untold millions of servers have it installed, and experts said the fallout would not be known for several days.
translation.medium: 专家们表示, 影响将在几天后才会被知晓.
translation.reference: 有数以百万计的服务器安装了该软件，专家表示，其后果要过几天才能知道。

translation.en: Amit Yoran, CEO of the cybersecurity firm Tenable, called it "the single biggest, most critical vulnerability of the last decade" - and possibly the biggest in the history of modern computing.
translation.zh: 网络安全公司 Tenable 的首席执行官阿米特·约兰 (Amit Yoran) 称其为“过去十年中最大、最关键的漏洞”——可能是现代计算机史上最大的漏洞。
translation.source: Amit Yoran, CEO of the cybersecurity firm Tenable, called it "the single biggest, most critical vulnerability of the last decade" - and possibly the biggest in the history of modern computing.
translation.medium: 网络安全公司Tenable的首席执行官阿米特·约兰 (Amit Yoran) 称它是"过去十年中最大,最关键的漏洞" - - 也可能是现代计算机历史上最大的漏洞.
translation.reference: 网络安全公司 Tenable 的首席执行官阿米特·约兰 (Amit Yoran) 称其为“过去十年中最大、最关键的漏洞”——可能是现代计算机史上最大的漏洞。

translation.en: The vulnerability, dubbed "Log4Shell," was rated 10 on a scale of one to 10 the Apache Software Foundation, which oversees development of the software.
translation.zh: 这个被称为“Log4Shell”的漏洞被其所属的阿帕奇软件基金会 (Apache Software Foundation) 评为 10 级（1 到 10 级）。
translation.source: The vulnerability, dubbed "Log4Shell," was rated 10 on a scale of one to 10 the Apache Software Foundation, which oversees development of the software.
translation.medium: 该漏洞被命名为"Log4Shell",
translation.reference: 这个被称为“Log4Shell”的漏洞被其所属的阿帕奇软件基金会 (Apache Software Foundation) 评为 10 级（1 到 10 级）。

translation.en: Anyone with the exploit can obtain full access to an unpatched computer that uses the software.
translation.zh: 任何人都可以利用该漏洞完全访问使用该软件且未打补丁的计算机。
translation.source: Anyone with the exploit can obtain full access to an unpatched computer that uses the software.
translation.medium: 任何使用该漏洞的人都可以完全访问使用该软件的未修补的计算机.
translation.reference: 任何人都可以利用该漏洞完全访问使用该软件且未打补丁的计算机。

translation.en: Experts said the extreme ease with which the vulnerability lets an attacker access a web server - no password required - is what makes it so dangerous.
translation.zh: 专家表示，攻击者不需要密码就能轻而易举地进入网络服务器，这就是它如此危险的原因。
translation.source: Experts said the extreme ease with which the vulnerability lets an attacker access a web server - no password required - is what makes it so dangerous.
translation.medium: 专家表示, 漏洞让攻击者轻松访问网络服务器 - - 无需密码 - - 这使得它变得如此危险.
translation.reference: 专家表示，攻击者不需要密码就能轻而易举地进入网络服务器，这就是它如此危险的原因。

translation.en: New Zealand's computer emergency response team was among the first to report that the flaw was being "actively exploited in the wild" just hours after it was publicly reported Thursday and a patch released.
translation.zh: 新西兰的计算机应急响应小组是首批报告该漏洞“被积极利用”的机构之一，几小时后（周四），该漏洞被公开报告，并发布了一个补丁。
translation.source: New Zealand's computer emergency response team was among the first to report that the flaw was being "actively exploited in the wild" just hours after it was publicly reported Thursday and a patch released.
translation.medium: 新西兰的计算机应急响应团队是第一个报告该漏洞"在野外被积极利用"的人,
translation.reference: 新西兰的计算机应急响应小组是首批报告该漏洞“被积极利用”的机构之一，几小时后（周四），该漏洞被公开报告，并发布了一个补丁。

translation.en: The vulnerability, located in open-source Apache software used to run websites and other web services, was reported to the foundation on November 24 by the Chinese tech giant Alibaba, it said.
translation.zh: 报告称，该漏洞在用于运行网站和其他网络服务的开源 Apache 软件中，中国科技巨头阿里巴巴于 11 月 24 日向该基金会报告了该漏洞。
translation.source: The vulnerability, located in open-source Apache software used to run websites and other web services, was reported to the foundation on November 24 by the Chinese tech giant Alibaba, it said.
translation.medium: 该漏洞位于用于运行网站和其他网络服务的开源Apache软件中, 该漏洞于11月24日由中国科技巨头阿里巴巴向该基金会报告.
translation.reference: 报告称，该漏洞在用于运行网站和其他网络服务的开源 Apache 软件中，中国科技巨头阿里巴巴于 11 月 24 日向该基金会报告了该漏洞。

translation.en: It took two weeks to develop and release a fix.
translation.zh: 开发和发布修复程序花了两周时间。
translation.source: It took two weeks to develop and release a fix.
translation.medium: 需要两周的时间来开发和释放一个解决方案.
translation.reference: 开发和发布修复程序花了两周时间。

translation.en: Have a great day
translation.zh: 祝您愉快
translation.source: Have a great day
translation.medium: 祝你有一个美好的一天.
translation.reference: 祝您愉快

translation.en: Thank you for taking the time to chat to me today.
translation.zh: 感谢您今天联系我。
translation.source: Thank you for taking the time to chat to me today.
translation.medium: 谢谢你花时间和我聊天.
translation.reference: 感谢您今天联系我。

translation.en: Once this chat has ended you will be sent a 'rate my chat' feedback email.
translation.zh: 本次聊天结束后，您将收到“对我进行评价”的反馈电子邮件。
translation.source: Once this chat has ended you will be sent a 'rate my chat' feedback email.
translation.medium: 一旦聊天结束,您将收到一个"评价我的聊天"反电子邮件.
translation.reference: 本次聊天结束后，您将收到“对我进行评价”的反馈电子邮件。

translation.en: Please kindly fill this in if you have a moment, however if you don't have time then may I wish you a wonderful day and thank you again.
translation.zh: 请您抽空对我进行评价，如果您没有时间，也没关系，再次感谢您！
translation.source: Please kindly fill this in if you have a moment, however if you don't have time then may I wish you a wonderful day and thank you again.
translation.medium: 如果您有时间,请填写此表, 但如果您没有时间, 让我祝您过上美好的一天, 再次感谢您.
translation.reference: 请您抽空对我进行评价，如果您没有时间，也没关系，再次感谢您！

translation.en: Yep…we guys all have guns.
translation.zh: 没错，我们人人都有枪。
translation.source: Yep…we guys all have guns.
translation.medium: 是的...我们所有人都有枪.
translation.reference: 没错，我们人人都有枪。

translation.en: Even babies.
translation.zh: 婴儿也不例外。
translation.source: Even babies.
translation.medium: 甚至是婴儿.
translation.reference: 婴儿也不例外。

translation.en: We all walk around with them like it’s the Wild West.
translation.zh: 我们全都携枪而行，就像在狂野的西部一样。
translation.source: We all walk around with them like it’s the Wild West.
translation.medium: 我们都和他们一起走来走去,
translation.reference: 我们全都携枪而行，就像在狂野的西部一样。

translation.en: I don’t even know where to begin here.
translation.zh: 我都不知道该从何说起。
translation.source: I don’t even know where to begin here.
translation.medium: 我甚至不知道从哪里开始.
translation.reference: 我都不知道该从何说起。

translation.en: You honestly think that a crackhead would own an expensive gun, and then save up enough money for ammo?
translation.zh: 你真的认为一个瘾君子会有一把昂贵的枪，然后存够钱买弹药吗？
translation.source: You honestly think that a crackhead would own an expensive gun, and then save up enough money for ammo?
translation.medium: 你真的认为一个吸毒者会拥有昂贵的枪支, 然后储蓄足够的钱购买弹药?
translation.reference: 你真的认为一个瘾君子会有一把昂贵的枪，然后存够钱买弹药吗？

translation.en: A crack head is not a “professional mugger.”
translation.zh: 瘾君子不是“职业抢劫犯”。
translation.source: A crack head is not a “professional mugger.”
translation.medium: 吸毒者不是专业的抢劫犯.
translation.reference: 瘾君子不是“职业抢劫犯”。

translation.en: If you don’t hear of people being stabbed, so what?
translation.zh: 即使你没听说过有人被刺伤，那又怎样？
translation.source: If you don’t hear of people being stabbed, so what?
translation.medium: 如果你不听说有人被刺伤,那怎么样?
translation.reference: 即使你没听说过有人被刺伤，那又怎样？

translation.en: Stabbings don’t get the same press treatment as shootings.
translation.zh: 刺伤案不像枪击案那样受到媒体的关注。
translation.source: Stabbings don’t get the same press treatment as shootings.
translation.medium: 刺伤并没有得到与枪击事件相同的新闻处理.
translation.reference: 刺伤案不像枪击案那样受到媒体的关注。

translation.en: Just because the press doesn’t highlight something doesn’t mean it’s not happening.
translation.zh: 但是，媒体没有关注，并不意味着它没有发生。
translation.source: Just because the press doesn’t highlight something doesn’t mean it’s not happening.
translation.medium: 只是因为媒体没有强调某事并不意味着它没有发生.
translation.reference: 但是，媒体没有关注，并不意味着它没有发生。

translation.en: WTF does this have to do with race?
translation.zh: 这和种族有什么关系?
translation.source: WTF does this have to do with race?
translation.medium: 这与种族有什么关系?
translation.reference: 这和种族有什么关系?

translation.en: Missed Out on Shiba Inu?
translation.zh: 错过了柴犬币 (Shiba Inu)？
translation.source: Missed Out on Shiba Inu?
translation.medium: 你错过了什巴犬的机会吗?
translation.reference: 错过了柴犬币 (Shiba Inu)？

translation.en: EverGrow Might Be The Next Big Crypto To Explode in 2022
translation.zh: EverGrow 可能是 2022 年爆发的下一个大型加密货币
translation.source: EverGrow Might Be The Next Big Crypto To Explode in 2022
translation.medium: 在2022年爆发的下一个大型加密货币可能是EverGrow
translation.reference: EverGrow 可能是 2022 年爆发的下一个大型加密货币

translation.en: Shiba Inu is the latest meme-crypto to go viral and despite being down almost 60% from it's all-time high, the market cap still stands at an eye-watering $20 billion, making it the 12th biggest crypto in the world by valuation.
translation.zh: 柴犬币是最新一款走红的表情包加密货币，尽管已经从历史高点下跌了近 60%，但其市值仍高达 200 亿美元，按估值计算，它是全球第 12 大加密货币。
translation.source: Shiba Inu is the latest meme-crypto to go viral and despite being down almost 60% from it's all-time high, the market cap still stands at an eye-watering $20 billion, making it the 12th biggest crypto in the world by valuation.
translation.medium: 它的市值仍然高达200亿美元, 成为全球第12大加密货币.
translation.reference: 柴犬币是最新一款走红的表情包加密货币，尽管已经从历史高点下跌了近 60%，但其市值仍高达 200 亿美元，按估值计算，它是全球第 12 大加密货币。

translation.en: A $100 investment at launch would be worth over $2 million today!
translation.zh: 当初投资 100 美元可以换来今天的 200 多万美元！
translation.source: A $100 investment at launch would be worth over $2 million today!
translation.medium: 一个100美元的投资在推出将值得超过200万美元今天!
translation.reference: 当初投资 100 美元可以换来今天的 200 多万美元！

translation.en: Many are no doubt kicking themselves for missing out on such gains, but the reality is that a bet on Shiba Inu was a pure gamble.
translation.zh: 毫无疑问，许多人会为自己错过这样的收益而后悔不已，但现实是，押注柴犬币纯粹是一场赌博。
translation.source: Many are no doubt kicking themselves for missing out on such gains, but the reality is that a bet on Shiba Inu was a pure gamble.
translation.medium: 许多人无疑为错过这样的收益而自责, 但事实是,
translation.reference: 毫无疑问，许多人会为自己错过这样的收益而后悔不已，但现实是，押注柴犬币纯粹是一场赌博。

translation.en: Shiba's run was a combination of some very smart marketing and a whole lot of hype, that led droves of investors, with FOMO (fear of missing out) to pile into the meme-coin.
translation.zh: 柴犬币的运行是一些非常聪明的营销和大量炒作的结合，这导致了大批投资者因为 FOMO（害怕错过）而涌入模因 (Meme) 币市场。
translation.source: Shiba's run was a combination of some very smart marketing and a whole lot of hype, that led droves of investors, with FOMO (fear of missing out) to pile into the meme-coin.
translation.medium: 这使得大量投资者和FOMO (害怕错过) 投资于模特币.
translation.reference: 柴犬币的运行是一些非常聪明的营销和大量炒作的结合，这导致了大批投资者因为 FOMO（害怕错过）而涌入模因 (Meme) 币市场。

translation.en: Even the name itself, which was a homage to Elon Musk backed Dogecoin, was all part of the design.
translation.zh: 柴犬币就连名字本身也是设计的一部分，是为了向埃隆·马斯克 (Elon Musk) 支持的狗狗币致敬。
translation.source: Even the name itself, which was a homage to Elon Musk backed Dogecoin, was all part of the design.
translation.medium: 即使是名称本身, 是对埃隆·马斯克支持的Dogecoin的致敬, 都是设计的一部分.
translation.reference: 柴犬币就连名字本身也是设计的一部分，是为了向埃隆·马斯克 (Elon Musk) 支持的狗狗币致敬。

translation.en: In reality, Shiba Inu offers no tangible utility or value, with seemingly little effort to do so in the future.
translation.zh: 在现实中，柴犬币并没有提供任何有形的效用或价值，似乎未来也是如此。
translation.source: In reality, Shiba Inu offers no tangible utility or value, with seemingly little effort to do so in the future.
translation.medium: 实际上, 石巴没有任何实在在的用处或价值,
translation.reference: 在现实中，柴犬币并没有提供任何有形的效用或价值，似乎未来也是如此。

translation.en: Being on the Ethereum blockchain, there would've been plenty of opportunity for development had the team behind Shiba Inu been motivated to do so.
translation.zh: 在以太坊区块链上，如果柴犬币背后的团队有意去做开发，将有大量的机会。
translation.source: Being on the Ethereum blockchain, there would've been plenty of opportunity for development had the team behind Shiba Inu been motivated to do so.
translation.medium: 在以太坊区块链上, 如果Shiba Inu背后的团队有这样的动力,
translation.reference: 在以太坊区块链上，如果柴犬币背后的团队有意去做开发，将有大量的机会。

translation.en: There are, however, several cryptocurrencies that are working to rise above the pack, and back their popularity with real utility and fundamental value.
translation.zh: 然而，有一些加密货币正在努力超越它，并以实际效用和基本价值支撑其受欢迎程度。
translation.source: There are, however, several cryptocurrencies that are working to rise above the pack, and back their popularity with real utility and fundamental value.
translation.medium: 然而有几种加密货币正在努力超越其他货币, 并以真正的实用性和基本价值支持其受欢迎程度.
translation.reference: 然而，有一些加密货币正在努力超越它，并以实际效用和基本价值支撑其受欢迎程度。

translation.en: Just 10 weeks ago, EverGrow Coin ($EGC) was launched by a team of experienced finance, blockchain and marketing experts.
translation.zh: 就在 10 周前，一支经验丰富的金融、区块链和营销专家团队推出了 EverGrow Coin ($EGC)。
translation.source: Just 10 weeks ago, EverGrow Coin ($EGC) was launched by a team of experienced finance, blockchain and marketing experts.
translation.medium: 只有10周前, 一个经验丰富的金融,区块链和营销专家团队推出了EverGrow Coin ($EGC).
translation.reference: 就在 10 周前，一支经验丰富的金融、区块链和营销专家团队推出了 EverGrow Coin ($EGC)。

translation.en: One ground-breaking element of their project is the fact the token pays a stable currency to holders.
translation.zh: 他们项目的一个突破性元素是，代币以稳定的货币支付给持币者。
translation.source: One ground-breaking element of their project is the fact the token pays a stable currency to holders.
translation.medium: 他们的项目中的一个突破性元素是代币向持有者支付稳定的货币.
translation.reference: 他们项目的一个突破性元素是，代币以稳定的货币支付给持币者。

translation.en: In the short time since launch, holders of EverGrow Coin have received over $30 million of binance-pegged USD rewards - a stable, regulated currency pegged 1-to-1 with the USD.
translation.zh: 自发行以来，EverGrow Coin 的持有者在短时间内就获得了超过 3000 万美元的与币挂钩的美元奖励，这是一种与美元一对一挂钩的稳定的、受监管的货币。
translation.source: In the short time since launch, holders of EverGrow Coin have received over $30 million of binance-pegged USD rewards - a stable, regulated currency pegged 1-to-1 with the USD.
translation.medium: 自推出以来的短时间内,EverGrow Coin的持有者已经获得了超过3000万美元的币安挂美元奖励 - 一种稳定,受监管的货币,与美元挂为1比1.
translation.reference: 自发行以来，EverGrow Coin 的持有者在短时间内就获得了超过 3000 万美元的与币挂钩的美元奖励，这是一种与美元一对一挂钩的稳定的、受监管的货币。

translation.en: The project currently has 110,000 holders according to BSCScan.
translation.zh: 根据 BSCScan 的数据，该项目的持币者目前达到了 11 万之多。
translation.source: The project currently has 110,000 holders according to BSCScan.
translation.medium: 根据BSCScan的数据,该项目目前拥有11万名持有者.
translation.reference: 根据 BSCScan 的数据，该项目的持币者目前达到了 11 万之多。

translation.en: With their revolutionary contract, EverGrow Coin quickly grew to over $1 billion in market-cap, but then a major data error on CoinMarketCap, just weeks into the launch, caused mass panic amongst investors.
translation.zh: 这种颠覆性的契约让 EverGrow Coin 的市值迅速增长到超过 10 亿美元，但在推出后才数周，CoinMarketCap 上就出现了一个重大数据错误，在投资者中引发了大规模恐慌。
translation.source: With their revolutionary contract, EverGrow Coin quickly grew to over $1 billion in market-cap, but then a major data error on CoinMarketCap, just weeks into the launch, caused mass panic amongst investors.
translation.medium: 随着他们的革命性合同, EverGrow Coin 的市值迅速增长到超过10亿美元,
translation.reference: 这种颠覆性的契约让 EverGrow Coin 的市值迅速增长到超过 10 亿美元，但在推出后才数周，CoinMarketCap 上就出现了一个重大数据错误，在投资者中引发了大规模恐慌。

translation.en: With such a new project, trust can take time to build, and this panic was exploited by a series of articles, rumoured to have been paid for by rivals of the project, using the incorrect data to try to draw EverGrow investors away from the project.
translation.zh: 对于这样一个新项目，建立信任需要时间，而这种恐慌情绪被一系列文章所利用，据说这些文章的背后推手是该项目的竞争对手，他们试图利用不正确的数据诱惑 EverGrow 的投资者退出该项目。
translation.source: With such a new project, trust can take time to build, and this panic was exploited by a series of articles, rumoured to have been paid for by rivals of the project, using the incorrect data to try to draw EverGrow investors away from the project.
translation.medium: 对于这样一个新项目, 建立信任需要时间, 这种恐慌被一系列文章所利用, 据说是项目竞争对手支付的, 使用不正确的数据试图吸引EverGrow投资者远离项目.
translation.reference: 对于这样一个新项目，建立信任需要时间，而这种恐慌情绪被一系列文章所利用，据说这些文章的背后推手是该项目的竞争对手，他们试图利用不正确的数据诱惑 EverGrow 的投资者退出该项目。

translation.en: Over the next month, the errors remained unfixed, and EverGrow sunk to below $300 million in valuation.
translation.zh: 在接下来的一个月里，这些错误仍然没有得到修正，EverGrow 的估值跌至 3 亿美元以下。
translation.source: Over the next month, the errors remained unfixed, and EverGrow sunk to below $300 million in valuation.
translation.medium: 在接下来的一个月里, 错误仍然没有被修复, 而EverGrow的估值下降到3亿美元以下.
translation.reference: 在接下来的一个月里，这些错误仍然没有得到修正，EverGrow 的估值跌至 3 亿美元以下。

translation.en: Yesterday, CoinMarket Cap placed an alert on EverGrow's page, confirming that the data error had been fixed.
translation.zh: 昨天，CoinMarket Cap 在 EverGrow 的页面上发布了提醒，确认数据错误已经修复。
translation.source: Yesterday, CoinMarket Cap placed an alert on EverGrow's page, confirming that the data error had been fixed.
translation.medium: 昨天,CoinMarketCap在EverGrow的页面上发布了警报, 确认数据错误已被修复.
translation.reference: 昨天，CoinMarket Cap 在 EverGrow 的页面上发布了提醒，确认数据错误已经修复。

translation.en: The price has now stabilised, and signs of returning confidence saw an increase of 22% from the recent lows.
translation.zh: 现在价格已经稳定下来，市场信心有了恢复的迹象，表现在最近低点上升了 22%。
translation.source: The price has now stabilised, and signs of returning confidence saw an increase of 22% from the recent lows.
translation.medium: 现在价格已经稳定,信心回归的迹象显示,价格从最近的低点上了22%.
translation.reference: 现在价格已经稳定下来，市场信心有了恢复的迹象，表现在最近低点上升了 22%。

translation.en: However, EverGrow still remains well below the highs achieved before this error.
translation.zh: 然而，EverGrow 估值仍远低于该错误发生前的高点。
translation.source: However, EverGrow still remains well below the highs achieved before this error.
translation.medium: 然而,EverGrow仍然远低于这个错误之前的高点.
translation.reference: 然而，EverGrow 估值仍远低于该错误发生前的高点。

translation.en: EverGrow is very different from Shiba Inu.
translation.zh: EverGrow 和柴犬币大不相同。
translation.source: EverGrow is very different from Shiba Inu.
translation.medium: 常年生长的动物与小狗有很大不同.
translation.reference: EverGrow 和柴犬币大不相同。

translation.en: In addition to the obvious benefits of USD rewards, the team behind the project have already launched a SWAP dApp on their website, have recently revealed the upcoming release of a Crypto Wallet, promising to surpass the features offered by Trust Wallet or Safemoon Wallet, and have a whole suite of utilities, from content creation platform to NFT Market Place & Lending, designed to bring continuous value to investors.
translation.zh: 除了美元奖励这个明显的优势外，此项目背后的团队已经在网站上推出了 SWAP dApp，最近还透露即将发布一个加密钱包，并承诺提供比 Trust 钱包和 Safemoon 钱包更出色的功能，还提供从内容创作平台到 NFT Market Place & Lending 的一整套实用工具，将持续为投资者创造价值。
translation.source: In addition to the obvious benefits of USD rewards, the team behind the project have already launched a SWAP dApp on their website, have recently revealed the upcoming release of a Crypto Wallet, promising to surpass the features offered by Trust Wallet or Safemoon Wallet, and have a whole suite of utilities, from content creation platform to NFT Market Place & Lending, designed to bring continuous value to investors.
translation.medium: 除了美元奖励的明显好处外,该项目背后的团队已经在他们的网站上推出了一个SWAP dApp,最近透露即将发布的加密钱包,承诺超越Trust Wallet或Safemoon Wallet提供的功能,并拥有从内容创建平台到NFT Market Place & Lending的整套实用程序,旨在为投资者带来持续的价值.
translation.reference: 除了美元奖励这个明显的优势外，此项目背后的团队已经在网站上推出了 SWAP dApp，最近还透露即将发布一个加密钱包，并承诺提供比 Trust 钱包和 Safemoon 钱包更出色的功能，还提供从内容创作平台到 NFT Market Place & Lending 的一整套实用工具，将持续为投资者创造价值。

translation.en: Is EverGrow Coin the next Shiba Inu?
translation.zh: EverGrow Coin 会成为下一个柴犬币吗？
translation.source: Is EverGrow Coin the next Shiba Inu?
translation.medium: 永生金币是下一个西巴犬吗?
translation.reference: EverGrow Coin 会成为下一个柴犬币吗？

translation.en: With Shiba Inu, offering little to no utility, valued at around 66 times that of EverGrow Coin, there is a clear argument for an innovative and ground-breaking project like EverGrow to see some serious upside from their current low market cap.
translation.zh: 柴犬币几乎不提供任何实用功能，其估值约为 EverGrow Coin 的 66 倍，因此，像 EverGrow 这样具有创新性和突破性的项目，以目前的低市值来看，可以预期会有一些实质性的增长。
translation.source: With Shiba Inu, offering little to no utility, valued at around 66 times that of EverGrow Coin, there is a clear argument for an innovative and ground-breaking project like EverGrow to see some serious upside from their current low market cap.
translation.medium: 对于像EverGrow这样的创新和开创性项目来说,
translation.reference: 柴犬币几乎不提供任何实用功能，其估值约为 EverGrow Coin 的 66 倍，因此，像 EverGrow 这样具有创新性和突破性的项目，以目前的低市值来看，可以预期会有一些实质性的增长。

translation.en: If the team continues to impress the crypto community with their innovation and transparency and can shake off the fear spread among investors by the CoinMarketCap errors, there is a good chance EverGrow Coin could be one of the top cryptos to invest in for 2022.
translation.zh: 如果该团队继续以其创新和透明度给加密货币社区留下深刻印象，并能够摆脱 CoinMarketCap 错误在投资者中蔓延的恐惧，那么 EverGrow Coin 很有可能成为 2022 年最值得投资的加密货币之一。
translation.source: If the team continues to impress the crypto community with their innovation and transparency and can shake off the fear spread among investors by the CoinMarketCap errors, there is a good chance EverGrow Coin could be one of the top cryptos to invest in for 2022.
translation.medium: 如果该团队继续以其创新和透明度给加密货币社区留下深刻印象, 并能够摆脱CoinMarketCap错误在投资者中传播的恐惧, 那么EverGrow Coin很有可能成为2022年投资的顶级加密货币之一.
translation.reference: 如果该团队继续以其创新和透明度给加密货币社区留下深刻印象，并能够摆脱 CoinMarketCap 错误在投资者中蔓延的恐惧，那么 EverGrow Coin 很有可能成为 2022 年最值得投资的加密货币之一。

translation.en: There's a circularity to it...
translation.zh: 这就是一个循环……
translation.source: There's a circularity to it...
translation.medium: 有一个循环的...
translation.reference: 这就是一个循环……

translation.en: I think the meal boxes are an insane proposition.
translation.zh: 我觉得订购盒饭的主张十分疯狂。
translation.source: I think the meal boxes are an insane proposition.
translation.medium: 我认为餐盒是一个疯狂的提议.
translation.reference: 我觉得订购盒饭的主张十分疯狂。

translation.en: The math they do is just crazy.
translation.zh: 他们的计算方式也让人匪夷所思。
translation.source: The math they do is just crazy.
translation.medium: 他们所做的数学是疯狂的.
translation.reference: 他们的计算方式也让人匪夷所思。

translation.en: "We're actually saving money because we don't have to go out and buy a whole bottle of soy sauce to try Asian cooking..." Madness.
translation.zh: “我们实际上是在省钱，因为我们不需要去买一整瓶酱油来尝试亚洲食物……” 真是疯了。
translation.source: "We're actually saving money because we don't have to go out and buy a whole bottle of soy sauce to try Asian cooking..." Madness.
translation.medium: "我们实际上节省了钱, 因为我们不需要去买一瓶大豆来尝试亚洲料理"...疯狂.
translation.reference: “我们实际上是在省钱，因为我们不需要去买一整瓶酱油来尝试亚洲食物……” 真是疯了。

translation.en: I think that in the consumer space, cheaper goods at lower margins is the only reason that anyone outside of the upper class has experienced any sort of wage growth.
translation.zh: 我认为，在消费领域，商品更便宜、利润更低是上层社会以外的人群工资见长的唯一原因。
translation.source: I think that in the consumer space, cheaper goods at lower margins is the only reason that anyone outside of the upper class has experienced any sort of wage growth.
translation.medium: 我认为在消费领域, 价格更低,利更低的商品是高阶层以外的任何人都经历过任何形式的工资增长的唯一原因.
translation.reference: 我认为，在消费领域，商品更便宜、利润更低是上层社会以外的人群工资见长的唯一原因。

translation.en: Wages didn't really go up, but shit got cheaper.
translation.zh: 但是工资并未上涨，反而降了。
translation.source: Wages didn't really go up, but shit got cheaper.
translation.medium: 工资并没有真正上, 但垃圾变得更便宜.
translation.reference: 但是工资并未上涨，反而降了。

translation.en: The problem is that we sold out the people below us.
translation.zh: 问题在于我们出卖了下层人群。
translation.source: The problem is that we sold out the people below us.
translation.medium: 问题在于我们卖掉了下面的人.
translation.reference: 问题在于我们出卖了下层人群。

translation.en: I agree with you.
translation.zh: 我同意你的看法。
translation.source: I agree with you.
translation.medium: 我同意你的观点.
translation.reference: 我同意你的看法。

translation.en: Some of us need to give up at least some convenience to make society better.
translation.zh: 为了让社会变得更好，我们中的一些人至少需要放弃一些便利。
translation.source: Some of us need to give up at least some convenience to make society better.
translation.medium: 我们中的一些人至少需要放弃一些便利, 以使社会变得更好.
translation.reference: 为了让社会变得更好，我们中的一些人至少需要放弃一些便利。

translation.en: Even if I'm not in the income level that would pay more taxes, I can still buy fewer things that are more expensive so that they can be made by people making a living wage and I can be willing to wait a few days to get it so that some gig worker doesn't have to be worked to the bone...
translation.zh: 即使我的收入水平到不了要缴纳更多税费的层次，我仍然可以少买贵的东西，给制造它们的人以谋生的机会，我愿意多等几天，这样一些零工工人就不用拼命工作了……
translation.source: Even if I'm not in the income level that would pay more taxes, I can still buy fewer things that are more expensive so that they can be made by people making a living wage and I can be willing to wait a few days to get it so that some gig worker doesn't have to be worked to the bone...
translation.medium: 即使我的收入不足以支付更多的税收, 我仍然可以购买更昂贵的东西,
translation.reference: 即使我的收入水平到不了要缴纳更多税费的层次，我仍然可以少买贵的东西，给制造它们的人以谋生的机会，我愿意多等几天，这样一些零工工人就不用拼命工作了……

translation.en: I am going to delete and add the book again and after you are going to troubleshoot your #PRS_ORG# app with 2 procedures to see if that solves the issue .
translation.zh: 我将删除并重新添加这本书，随后您通过 2 个过程对 #PRS_ORG# App 进行故障排除，看看能不能解决问题。
translation.source: I am going to delete and add the book again and after you are going to troubleshoot your #PRS_ORG# app with 2 procedures to see if that solves the issue .
translation.medium: 我将再次删除并添加该书, 然后你将通过2个程序解决你的#PRS_ORG#应用程序的问题, 看看这是否解决了问题.
translation.reference: 我将删除并重新添加这本书，随后您通过 2 个过程对 #PRS_ORG# App 进行故障排除，看看能不能解决问题。

translation.en: 2 minutes please
translation.zh: 请等待 2 分钟
translation.source: 2 minutes please
translation.medium: 两分钟时间
translation.reference: 请等待 2 分钟

translation.en: It is done .
translation.zh: 好了。
translation.source: It is done .
translation.medium: 已经完成了.
translation.reference: 好了。

translation.en: now please try to perform this procedure on your app:
translation.zh: 现在，请您试着在 App 上执行此过程：
translation.source: now please try to perform this procedure on your app:
translation.medium: 现在请尝试在您的应用程序上执行此程序:
translation.reference: 现在，请您试着在 App 上执行此过程：

translation.en: To repair your account on the android app, please follow the steps indicated below:
translation.zh: 要在安卓 App 上修复您的帐户，请执行以下步骤：
translation.source: To repair your account on the android app, please follow the steps indicated below:
translation.medium: 请按照下面的步骤修复您的Android应用上的帐户:
translation.reference: 要在安卓 App 上修复您的帐户，请执行以下步骤：

translation.en: Tap the #PRS_ORG# icon at the top of the screen.
translation.zh: 点击屏幕顶部的 #PRS_ORG# 图标。
translation.source: Tap the #PRS_ORG# icon at the top of the screen.
translation.medium: 点击屏幕顶部的 #PRS_ORG# 图标.
translation.reference: 点击屏幕顶部的 #PRS_ORG# 图标。

translation.en: Go to the Home screen.
translation.zh: 进入主屏幕。
translation.source: Go to the Home screen.
translation.medium: 进入主屏幕.
translation.reference: 进入主屏幕。

translation.en: Tap the Menu icon at the top of the screen.
translation.zh: 点击屏幕顶部的“菜单”图标。
translation.source: Tap the Menu icon at the top of the screen.
translation.medium: 在屏幕顶部点击菜单图标.
translation.reference: 点击屏幕顶部的“菜单”图标。

translation.en: Tap Settings.
translation.zh: 点击“设置”。
translation.source: Tap Settings.
translation.medium: 点击"设置".
translation.reference: 点击“设置”。

translation.en: Scroll to the bottom and tap Repair your account.
translation.zh: 滚动到底部，点击修复帐户。
translation.source: Scroll to the bottom and tap Repair your account.
translation.medium: 滚动到底部并点击修复您的帐户.
translation.reference: 滚动到底部，点击修复帐户。

translation.en: Tap Repair.
translation.zh: 点击“修复”。
translation.source: Tap Repair.
translation.medium: 按一下修复.
translation.reference: 点击“修复”。

translation.en: when you finish please continue with this procedure:
translation.zh: 完成后，请继续执行此过程：
translation.source: when you finish please continue with this procedure:
translation.medium: 当你完成请继续这个程序:
translation.reference: 完成后，请继续执行此过程：

translation.en: To sign out proceed with the steps indicated below on your #PRS_ORG# app, please:
translation.zh: 要注销，请在 #PRS_ORG# App 继续下面描述的步骤，请：
translation.source: To sign out proceed with the steps indicated below on your #PRS_ORG# app, please:
translation.medium: 在您的 #PRS_ORG# 应用程序中,请按照下面指出的步骤进行退出:
translation.reference: 要注销，请在 #PRS_ORG# App 继续下面描述的步骤，请：

translation.en: Tap the More icon at the bottom of the screen.
translation.zh: 点击屏幕底部的“更多”图标。
translation.source: Tap the More icon at the bottom of the screen.
translation.medium: 点击屏幕底部的更多图标.
translation.reference: 点击屏幕底部的“更多”图标。

translation.en: Tap Settings.
translation.zh: 点击“设置”。
translation.source: Tap Settings.
translation.medium: 点击"设置".
translation.reference: 点击“设置”。

translation.en: Tap Sign out of #PRS_ORG#.
translation.zh: 点击“注销 #PRS_ORG#”。
translation.source: Tap Sign out of #PRS_ORG#.
translation.medium: 点击"退出#PRS_ORG#".
translation.reference: 点击“注销 #PRS_ORG#”。

translation.en: And sign back in after this please, to have the account update.
translation.zh: 注销后重新登录，以更新帐户。
translation.source: And sign back in after this please, to have the account update.
translation.medium: 在此之后请重新登录, 更新帐户.
translation.reference: 注销后重新登录，以更新帐户。

translation.en: how did it go?
translation.zh: 怎么样了？
translation.source: how did it go?
translation.medium: 情况如何?
translation.reference: 怎么样了？

translation.en: A dream to keep all children safe this Christmas
translation.zh: 梦想：希望所有孩子平安度过圣诞节
translation.source: A dream to keep all children safe this Christmas
translation.medium: 一个梦想让所有孩子平安过圣诞节
translation.reference: 梦想：希望所有孩子平安度过圣诞节

translation.en: Her brother (nearly two) had to be persuaded not to walk off with the baby Jesus.
translation.zh: 她的弟弟（将近两岁）不得不听从大人的话，不能跟婴儿 Jesus 一起走。
translation.source: Her brother (nearly two) had to be persuaded not to walk off with the baby Jesus.
translation.medium: 她的哥哥 (大约两岁) 不得不说服她不要带着婴儿耶稣走开.
translation.reference: 她的弟弟（将近两岁）不得不听从大人的话，不能跟婴儿 Jesus 一起走。

translation.en: So there was the usual gentle chaos that attends any gathering of toddlers.
translation.zh: 所以，在蹒跚学步的孩子们的聚会上，呈现的是一种温和的混乱。
translation.source: So there was the usual gentle chaos that attends any gathering of toddlers.
translation.medium: 随着时间的推移,
translation.reference: 所以，在蹒跚学步的孩子们的聚会上，呈现的是一种温和的混乱。

translation.en: But everyone was so pleased that it had gone ahead when so many other Christmas events have been cancelled as yet another Covid variant hove into view.
translation.zh: 但每个人都很高兴，要知道许多其他圣诞活动都因为出现了新的新冠病毒变异株而取消了。
translation.source: But everyone was so pleased that it had gone ahead when so many other Christmas events have been cancelled as yet another Covid variant hove into view.
translation.medium: 但每个人都很高兴它已经推进了许多其他圣诞活动被取消,
translation.reference: 但每个人都很高兴，要知道许多其他圣诞活动都因为出现了新的新冠病毒变异株而取消了。

translation.en: My granddaughter is four which means that half her life - half her life! - has been blighted by the pandemic.
translation.zh: 我的孙女四岁了，这意味着她有一半的生命都被疫情毁了。
translation.source: My granddaughter is four which means that half her life - half her life! - has been blighted by the pandemic.
translation.medium: 我的孙女四岁了,
translation.reference: 我的孙女四岁了，这意味着她有一半的生命都被疫情毁了。

translation.en: Since she became properly aware she has known nothing but mask wearing, obsessive hand washing and keeping your distance.
translation.zh: 自从她懂事后，她就知道戴口罩、勤洗手和保持距离。
translation.source: Since she became properly aware she has known nothing but mask wearing, obsessive hand washing and keeping your distance.
translation.medium: 自从她意识到这一点以来, 她只知道戴口罩, 强迫洗手和保持距离.
translation.reference: 自从她懂事后，她就知道戴口罩、勤洗手和保持距离。

translation.en: On several occasions (through various lockdowns) when I saw her I didn't know if I should kiss her or not.
translation.zh: 有几次（在多次封锁期间），当我看到她时，我不知道是否应该亲吻她。
translation.source: On several occasions (through various lockdowns) when I saw her I didn't know if I should kiss her or not.
translation.medium: 我不知该吻她还是不该吻她.
translation.reference: 有几次（在多次封锁期间），当我看到她时，我不知道是否应该亲吻她。

translation.en: What kind of message does that send into the receptive, super-alert brain of a tiny child?
translation.zh: 这会向一个接受能力强、高度警觉的小孩子传递什么样的信息呢？
translation.source: What kind of message does that send into the receptive, super-alert brain of a tiny child?
translation.medium: 这会给一个小孩子的灵敏,超级敏的大脑带来什么样的信息呢?
translation.reference: 这会向一个接受能力强、高度警觉的小孩子传递什么样的信息呢？

translation.en: I dread to think.
translation.zh: 我不敢去想。
translation.source: I dread to think.
translation.medium: 我害怕思考.
translation.reference: 我不敢去想。

translation.en: I say this not as someone opposed to lockdowns or distancing.
translation.zh: 我这么说并不是反对封锁或隔离。
translation.source: I say this not as someone opposed to lockdowns or distancing.
translation.medium: 我不是反对封锁或隔离的人.
translation.reference: 我这么说并不是反对封锁或隔离。

translation.en: For all the criticism of our Government not a single nation has got it exactly right.
translation.zh: 尽管我国政府受到各种批评，但没有一个国家的批评是完全正确的。
translation.source: For all the criticism of our Government not a single nation has got it exactly right.
translation.medium: 没有一个国家对我们政府的批评是完全正确的.
translation.reference: 尽管我国政府受到各种批评，但没有一个国家的批评是完全正确的。

translation.en: It's been two steps forward, and one back (and sometimes the opposite) since the beginning of 2020.
translation.zh: 自 2020 年初以来，我们是前进两步后退一步，有时候又是后退两步前进一步。
translation.source: It's been two steps forward, and one back (and sometimes the opposite) since the beginning of 2020.
translation.medium: 自2020年初以来, 两步前进, 一步后退 (有时相反).
translation.reference: 自 2020 年初以来，我们是前进两步后退一步，有时候又是后退两步前进一步。

translation.en: AND one knew - though many of us during those early sunny months rather enjoyed the luxury of not going out - that all over Britain there were those for whom being at home was hell not heaven.
translation.zh: 尽管我们中有许多人在最初阳光明媚的几个月里享受着不出门的奢侈，但人们知道，在整个英国，对有些人而言，在家就是地狱，而不是天堂。
translation.source: AND one knew - though many of us during those early sunny months rather enjoyed the luxury of not going out - that all over Britain there were those for whom being at home was hell not heaven.
translation.medium: 人们知道 - 虽然我们中的许多人在那些早期的阳光充足的月份相当享受不出去的奢 - 在整个英国有那些谁在家里是地狱而不是天堂.
translation.reference: 尽管我们中有许多人在最初阳光明媚的几个月里享受着不出门的奢侈，但人们知道，在整个英国，对有些人而言，在家就是地狱，而不是天堂。

translation.en: Children such as Arthur Labinjo-Hughes who became invisible with no school staff to ponder on why he was so thin and ill, no neighbours, no passers-by, no nothing.
translation.zh: 像 Arthur Labinjo-Hughes 这样的孩子，已经变隐形了，没有人关心他为什么这么瘦，病秧秧的，没有邻居，没有路人，什么都没有。
translation.source: Children such as Arthur Labinjo-Hughes who became invisible with no school staff to ponder on why he was so thin and ill, no neighbours, no passers-by, no nothing.
translation.medium: 像Arthur Labinjo-Hughes这样的孩子变成了无形的, 没有学校的工作人员来思考为什么他那么瘦和生病, 没有邻居, 没有路人, 没有什么.
translation.reference: 像 Arthur Labinjo-Hughes 这样的孩子，已经变隐形了，没有人关心他为什么这么瘦，病秧秧的，没有邻居，没有路人，什么都没有。

translation.en: Molecular Diagnosis Test Can Detect Omicron Variant In 20 Minutes: Report
translation.zh: 分子诊断测试可在 20 分钟内检测出奥密克戎变异株：报告
translation.source: Molecular Diagnosis Test Can Detect Omicron Variant In 20 Minutes: Report
translation.medium: 分子诊断测试可以在20分钟内检测Omicron变种:报告
translation.reference: 分子诊断测试可在 20 分钟内检测出奥密克戎变异株：报告

translation.en: Korean researchers have developed molecular diagnostics technology that can detect Omicron variants.
translation.zh: 韩国研究人员开发出了可以检测奥密克戎变异株的分子诊断技术。
translation.source: Korean researchers have developed molecular diagnostics technology that can detect Omicron variants.
translation.medium: 韩国研究人员已经开发出可以检测Omicron变种的分子诊断技术.
translation.reference: 韩国研究人员开发出了可以检测奥密克戎变异株的分子诊断技术。

translation.en: The technology development has been currently completed, and it is expected to take time for commercialization.
translation.zh: 该技术目前已经完成开发，预计还需要一段时间后才能商业化。
translation.source: The technology development has been currently completed, and it is expected to take time for commercialization.
translation.medium: 目前已完成技术开发,预计将需要时间进行商业化.
translation.reference: 该技术目前已经完成开发，预计还需要一段时间后才能商业化。

translation.en: POSTECH announced on the 10th that a research team led by Professor Lee Jung-wook of the Department of Chemical Engineering has developed molecular diagnostic technology that can detect the Omicron variant in just 20-30 minutes and will publish the results online.
translation.zh: 浦项工科大学 10 日表示，该大学化学工程系李正旭教授带领的研究小组开发出了可以在 20-30 分钟内检测出奥密克戎变异株的分子诊断技术，并将在网上公开结果。
translation.source: POSTECH announced on the 10th that a research team led by Professor Lee Jung-wook of the Department of Chemical Engineering has developed molecular diagnostic technology that can detect the Omicron variant in just 20-30 minutes and will publish the results online.
translation.medium: 邮报10日宣布,由化学工程系Lee Jung-wook教授领导的研究小组已经开发出分子诊断技术,可以在20-30分钟内检测出Omicron变种,并将在网上发布结果.
translation.reference: 浦项工科大学 10 日表示，该大学化学工程系李正旭教授带领的研究小组开发出了可以在 20-30 分钟内检测出奥密克戎变异株的分子诊断技术，并将在网上公开结果。

translation.en: Omicron is a variant in which 26-32 mutations in the spike, which is used to infect cells by the COVID-19 virus.
translation.zh: 奥密克戎是一种变异毒株，其刺突中有 26-32 个突变，被新冠病毒用于感染细胞。
translation.source: Omicron is a variant in which 26-32 mutations in the spike, which is used to infect cells by the COVID-19 virus.
translation.medium: 欧米克朗是一种突变型,突变突变突变突变突变突变突变突变突变突变突变突变突变突变突变突变突变突变突变突变突变突变突变突变突变突变突变突变突变突变突变突变突变突变突变突变突变突变突变突变突变突变突变突变突变突变突变突变突变突变突变突变突变突变突变突变突变突变突变突变突变突变突变.
translation.reference: 奥密克戎是一种变异毒株，其刺突中有 26-32 个突变，被新冠病毒用于感染细胞。

translation.en: According to the research team, molecular diagnostics technology can distinguish mutations at the single-nucleotide base, so it can detect "Stealth Omicron," which are difficult to be detected by PCR tests.
translation.zh: 研究小组表示，分子诊断技术可以识别单核苷酸碱基的突变，因此可以检测出 PCR 很难检测出的“隐形奥密克戎”。
translation.source: According to the research team, molecular diagnostics technology can distinguish mutations at the single-nucleotide base, so it can detect "Stealth Omicron," which are difficult to be detected by PCR tests.
translation.medium: 根据研究小组的说法,分子诊断技术可以区分单核酸基的突变,因此可以检测"隐形Omicron",这是PCR测试难以检测的.
translation.reference: 研究小组表示，分子诊断技术可以识别单核苷酸碱基的突变，因此可以检测出 PCR 很难检测出的“隐形奥密克戎”。

translation.en: Currently, the Korea Centers for Disease Control and Prevention is using three methods to detect COVID-19 variants: whole-genome analysis, target DNA (mutations such as spike protein) analysis, and PCR test.
translation.zh: 目前，韩国疾病控制和预防中心正在使用全基因组分析、目标 DNA（刺突蛋白等突变）分析、PCR 检测等 3 种方法来检测新型冠状病毒的变异株。
translation.source: Currently, the Korea Centers for Disease Control and Prevention is using three methods to detect COVID-19 variants: whole-genome analysis, target DNA (mutations such as spike protein) analysis, and PCR test.
translation.medium: 目前,韩国疾病控制和预防中心正在使用三种方法检测COVID-19变种:全基因组分析,目标DNA (突变如尖端蛋白) 分析和PCR测试.
translation.reference: 目前，韩国疾病控制和预防中心正在使用全基因组分析、目标 DNA（刺突蛋白等突变）分析、PCR 检测等 3 种方法来检测新型冠状病毒的变异株。

translation.en: In the case of the Delta variant, it can be detected by the current PCR test, but Omicron cannot.
translation.zh: 目前的 PCR 检测可以检测出 Delta 变异株，但无法检测出奥密克戎。
translation.source: In the case of the Delta variant, it can be detected by the current PCR test, but Omicron cannot.
translation.medium: 在 Delta 变种的情况下,它可以通过当前的 PCR 测试检测到,但 Omicron 不能.
translation.reference: 目前的 PCR 检测可以检测出 Delta 变异株，但无法检测出奥密克戎。

translation.en: The newly developed technology this time is not a sequencing method that reads DNA or RNA sequences, but the molecular diagnostic technology.
translation.zh: 此次新开发的技术不是读取 DNA 或 RNA 序列的测序技术，而是分子诊断技术。
translation.source: The newly developed technology this time is not a sequencing method that reads DNA or RNA sequences, but the molecular diagnostic technology.
translation.medium: 这次新开发的技术不是读取DNA或RNA序列的测序方法, 而是分子诊断技术.
translation.reference: 此次新开发的技术不是读取 DNA 或 RNA 序列的测序技术，而是分子诊断技术。

translation.en: The existing technology screens only specific areas of the virus, but the molecular diagnostic technology was designed to cause nucleic acid-binding reactions only when the COVID-19 RNA exists, enabling rapid detection.
translation.zh: 目前的技术只筛选病毒的特定区域，但分子诊断技术是在新冠病毒 RNA 存在时才会引起核酸结合反应，因此可以达到快速检测的效果。
translation.source: The existing technology screens only specific areas of the virus, but the molecular diagnostic technology was designed to cause nucleic acid-binding reactions only when the COVID-19 RNA exists, enabling rapid detection.
translation.medium: 现有的技术仅检测病毒的特定区域,但分子诊断技术的设计仅在COVID-19 RNA存在时引起核酸结合反应,从而能够快速检测.
translation.reference: 目前的技术只筛选病毒的特定区域，但分子诊断技术是在新冠病毒 RNA 存在时才会引起核酸结合反应，因此可以达到快速检测的效果。

translation.en: According to Professor Lee, Omicron has a strong signal for N genes in PCR tests but has a weak signal for S genes.
translation.zh: 李教授表示：“在 PCR 检测中，奥密克戎对 N 基因的信号较强，但对 S 基因的信号较弱。
translation.source: According to Professor Lee, Omicron has a strong signal for N genes in PCR tests but has a weak signal for S genes.
translation.medium: 根据李教授的说法,在PCR测试中,Omicron对N基因有强烈的信号,但对S基因有弱信号.
translation.reference: 李教授表示：“在 PCR 检测中，奥密克戎对 N 基因的信号较强，但对 S 基因的信号较弱。

translation.en: In the case of "Stealth Omicron," both N and S genes confirmed positive, making it difficult to distinguish from other variants.
translation.zh: 在“隐形奥密克戎”中，N 和 S 基因都被确认为阳性，这使得它很难与其他变异株区分开来。
translation.source: In the case of "Stealth Omicron," both N and S genes confirmed positive, making it difficult to distinguish from other variants.
translation.medium: 在"隐形奥米克朗"的病例中,N和S基因均呈阳性,使其难以与其他变种区分开来.
translation.reference: 在“隐形奥密克戎”中，N 和 S 基因都被确认为阳性，这使得它很难与其他变异株区分开来。

translation.en: The molecular diagnostic technology works in different mechanisms from PCR, detecting the Omicron variant efficiently.
translation.zh: 分子诊断技术的机制与 PCR 不同，可以有效地检测到奥密克戎变异株。
translation.source: The molecular diagnostic technology works in different mechanisms from PCR, detecting the Omicron variant efficiently.
translation.medium: 分子诊断技术与PCR不同,有效检测Omicron变种.
translation.reference: 分子诊断技术的机制与 PCR 不同，可以有效地检测到奥密克戎变异株。

translation.en: Unlike conventional technology that generally processes up to 96 samples per device, the new technology can process more than 125 in 30 minutes (more than 250 samples per hour).
translation.zh: 与一般每台设备最多处理 96 个样本的传统技术不同，新技术可以在 30 分钟内处理 125 个以上样本（每小时处理 250 个以上）。
translation.source: Unlike conventional technology that generally processes up to 96 samples per device, the new technology can process more than 125 in 30 minutes (more than 250 samples per hour).
translation.medium: 与通常处理每台设备高达96个样本的传统技术不同,新技术可以在30分钟内处理超过125个样本 (每小时超过250个样本).
translation.reference: 与一般每台设备最多处理 96 个样本的传统技术不同，新技术可以在 30 分钟内处理 125 个以上样本（每小时处理 250 个以上）。

translation.en: In addition, this technology does not need specialized equipment, thus can make diagnostic kits simply and easily.
translation.zh: 此外，该技术不需要专门的设备，因此可以制作简单、方便的诊断试剂盒。
translation.source: In addition, this technology does not need specialized equipment, thus can make diagnostic kits simply and easily.
translation.medium: 此外,这项技术不需要专门的设备,因此可以简单轻松地制造诊断套件.
translation.reference: 此外，该技术不需要专门的设备，因此可以制作简单、方便的诊断试剂盒。

translation.en: As the method can develop the diagnosis kit in 4 days, it is expected to respond quickly even if a new variant or virus occurs in the future.
translation.zh: 该方法可以在 4 天内开发出诊断试剂，因此即使以后出现新的变异株或病毒，也能迅速做出反应。
translation.source: As the method can develop the diagnosis kit in 4 days, it is expected to respond quickly even if a new variant or virus occurs in the future.
translation.medium: 由于该方法可以在4天内开发诊断套件,因此即使在未来出现新的变种或病毒,预计它也会迅速响应.
translation.reference: 该方法可以在 4 天内开发出诊断试剂，因此即使以后出现新的变异株或病毒，也能迅速做出反应。

translation.en: "I hope the disclosure of this technology will help us return to normal daily life as soon as possible," said Professor Lee.
translation.zh: 李教授表示：“我们希望通过公开该技术，尽快恢复正常的生活。”
translation.source: "I hope the disclosure of this technology will help us return to normal daily life as soon as possible," said Professor Lee.
translation.medium: "我希望这项技术的披露能帮助我们尽快恢复正常的日常生活", 李教授说.
translation.reference: 李教授表示：“我们希望通过公开该技术，尽快恢复正常的生活。”

translation.en: We will try to quickly diagnose and respond to new variants that may come out after COVID-19.
translation.zh: 我们将努力快速诊断和应对新冠病毒之后可能出现的新变异株。
translation.source: We will try to quickly diagnose and respond to new variants that may come out after COVID-19.
translation.medium: 我们将尽量快速诊断和应对COVID-19之后可能出现的新变种.
translation.reference: 我们将努力快速诊断和应对新冠病毒之后可能出现的新变异株。

translation.en: This technology is currently before commercialization.
translation.zh: 该技术目前尚未商业化。
translation.source: This technology is currently before commercialization.
translation.medium: 这项技术目前还没有商业化.
translation.reference: 该技术目前尚未商业化。

translation.en: However, it can be used as an auxiliary in current situations where the PCR test for Omicron has not been developed.
translation.zh: 但是，在目前还没有开发出奥密克戎的 PCR 检测方法的情况下，它可以作为一种辅助手段。
translation.source: However, it can be used as an auxiliary in current situations where the PCR test for Omicron has not been developed.
translation.medium: 然而,在目前尚未开发出针对Omicron的PCR测试的情况下,它可以作为辅助剂.
translation.reference: 但是，在目前还没有开发出奥密克戎的 PCR 检测方法的情况下，它可以作为一种辅助手段。

translation.en: Professor Lee said, "I think this technology will be close to commercialization in the second half of next year after clinical trials.
translation.zh: 李教授表示:“（该技术）有望在明年下半年通过临床试验后实现商业化。
translation.source: Professor Lee said, "I think this technology will be close to commercialization in the second half of next year after clinical trials.
translation.medium: 李教授说:"我认为这项技术将在临床试验后在明年下半年接近商业化.
translation.reference: 李教授表示:“（该技术）有望在明年下半年通过临床试验后实现商业化。

translation.en: The reason why I disclose the technology is to share it with others to develop better technologies for overcoming COVID-19 and to allow underdeveloped countries also analyze COVID-19 variants."
translation.zh: 我公开这项技术是为了开发更好的新冠病毒应对技术，让落后国家也能分析新冠病毒变异株。”
translation.source: The reason why I disclose the technology is to share it with others to develop better technologies for overcoming COVID-19 and to allow underdeveloped countries also analyze COVID-19 variants."
translation.medium: 我披露这项技术的原因是与他人分享,以开发更好的技术来克服COVID-19并允许欠发达国家也分析COVID-19变种. "
translation.reference: 我公开这项技术是为了开发更好的新冠病毒应对技术，让落后国家也能分析新冠病毒变异株。”

translation.en: I told ya so....
translation.zh: 我早就跟你说过……
translation.source: I told ya so....
translation.medium: 我已经告诉你了.
translation.reference: 我早就跟你说过……

translation.en: The grocery store I worked at was undergoing a complete and total reorganization.
translation.zh: 当时我工作的杂货店正在进行改头换面。
translation.source: The grocery store I worked at was undergoing a complete and total reorganization.
translation.medium: 我工作的杂货店正在进行彻底的重组.
translation.reference: 当时我工作的杂货店正在进行改头换面。

translation.en: Aisles were changing, and we were all learning where everything was.
translation.zh: 过道都改变了，不过我们都知道每样东西在哪里。
translation.source: Aisles were changing, and we were all learning where everything was.
translation.medium: 走廊也在变化, 我们都在学习每件事情的位置.
translation.reference: 过道都改变了，不过我们都知道每样东西在哪里。

translation.en: Needless to say, it was chaos.
translation.zh: 不用说，那肯定是一片混乱。
translation.source: Needless to say, it was chaos.
translation.medium: 没有必要说,这是一个混乱的局面.
translation.reference: 不用说，那肯定是一片混乱。

translation.en: At the time this happened, we were pretty busy, and I had a line of customers, but Karen decides to skip the line to ask me where something was.
translation.zh: 事情发生的时候，我们都很忙，我的收银台前排着一排顾客，但是凯伦穿过队伍来问我某样东西在哪里。
translation.source: At the time this happened, we were pretty busy, and I had a line of customers, but Karen decides to skip the line to ask me where something was.
translation.medium: 卡伦决定跳过排队, 问我有什么东西在哪里.
translation.reference: 事情发生的时候，我们都很忙，我的收银台前排着一排顾客，但是凯伦穿过队伍来问我某样东西在哪里。

translation.en: I don't remember the exact item, but it was something like paper plates (or something that would be near them...plastic forks?
translation.zh: 我不记得具体是什么了，好像是纸盘之类的东西（或者是类似的东西……塑料餐叉？
translation.source: I don't remember the exact item, but it was something like paper plates (or something that would be near them...plastic forks?
translation.medium: 我不记得确切的项目, 但它是像纸盘 (或一些将在他们附近...塑料叉?
translation.reference: 我不记得具体是什么了，好像是纸盘之类的东西（或者是类似的东西……塑料餐叉？

translation.en: straws?).
translation.zh: 或者是吸管？)。
translation.source: straws?).
translation.medium: 没有吸管吗?
translation.reference: 或者是吸管？)。

translation.en: Since I had a line of customers, I couldn't leave to help her locate, so I told her "I believe they are now on aisle 7."
translation.zh: 因为有顾客在排队，我不能自己前去寻找，只能告诉她“可能在 7 号通道。”
translation.source: Since I had a line of customers, I couldn't leave to help her locate, so I told her "I believe they are now on aisle 7."
translation.medium: 我告诉她:"我相信他们现在在7号通道.
translation.reference: 因为有顾客在排队，我不能自己前去寻找，只能告诉她“可能在 7 号通道。”

translation.en: Before I can even get on my walkie to ask someone for sure, she storms off.
translation.zh: 我还没来得及用对讲机问清楚，她就快步走了。
translation.source: Before I can even get on my walkie to ask someone for sure, she storms off.
translation.medium: 之前我甚至可以得到我的无线电询问某人肯定,她暴风雨离开.
translation.reference: 我还没来得及用对讲机问清楚，她就快步走了。

translation.en: Only to come storming back a couple of minutes later to tell me they are not there.
translation.zh: 几分钟后她又回来了，说她要的东西不在那里。
translation.source: Only to come storming back a couple of minutes later to tell me they are not there.
translation.medium: 只是在几分钟后冲回来告诉我他们不在那里.
translation.reference: 几分钟后她又回来了，说她要的东西不在那里。

translation.en: A manager is now nearby, so I ask him if he can help her, and I tell him that I thought they were on 7, but she said they were not.
translation.zh: 有位经理就站在附近，于是我问他能否帮她，我说我以为她要的东西在 7 号通道，但她说没有。
translation.source: A manager is now nearby, so I ask him if he can help her, and I tell him that I thought they were on 7, but she said they were not.
translation.medium: 我问他是否可以帮助她, 我告诉他我以为他们是在7号楼, 但她说他们不是.
translation.reference: 有位经理就站在附近，于是我问他能否帮她，我说我以为她要的东西在 7 号通道，但她说没有。

translation.en: He looks confused and says "OK, maybe they are on 8.
translation.zh: 他也不能肯定，就说:“好吧，也有可能在 8 号。
translation.source: He looks confused and says "OK, maybe they are on 8.
translation.medium: 他看起来很困惑,说:"好吧,也许他们在8号.
translation.reference: 他也不能肯定，就说:“好吧，也有可能在 8 号。

translation.en: I'll help you find them, ma'am."
translation.zh: 我会帮你找到的，女士。”
translation.source: I'll help you find them, ma'am."
translation.medium: 我会帮助您找到他们,夫人. "
translation.reference: 我会帮你找到的，女士。”

translation.en: As they are about to walk away, she turns to me and says "You should know better than to tell someone where something is if you don't actually know".
translation.zh: 当他们要走开时，她转向我说:“如果你不知道东西在哪里，就不要瞎说。”
translation.source: As they are about to walk away, she turns to me and says "You should know better than to tell someone where something is if you don't actually know".
translation.medium: 她转过身对我说:"你应该知道,
translation.reference: 当他们要走开时，她转向我说:“如果你不知道东西在哪里，就不要瞎说。”

translation.en: Long story short, she comes back to the checkout, but goes to another line.
translation.zh: 长话短说，她后来回到收银台时，没有在我这里排队。
translation.source: Long story short, she comes back to the checkout, but goes to another line.
translation.medium: 简而言之,她回到了收银处,
translation.reference: 长话短说，她后来回到收银台时，没有在我这里排队。

translation.en: As the manager comes back, he leans in and whispers to me "They WERE on aisle 7, like you told her."
translation.zh: 当经理回来时，他靠过来小声对我说:“就在 7 号通道，你没记错。”
translation.source: As the manager comes back, he leans in and whispers to me "They WERE on aisle 7, like you told her."
translation.medium: 经理回来时, 他向我低声说:"正如你告诉她的那样,
translation.reference: 当经理回来时，他靠过来小声对我说:“就在 7 号通道，你没记错。”

translation.en: HA....told you so!
translation.zh: 哈……我就说嘛！
translation.source: HA....told you so!
translation.medium: 哈...我已经告诉你了!
translation.reference: 哈……我就说嘛！

translation.en: Please visit the following link and follow the steps to create a new password
translation.zh: 请访问以下链接，并按说明的步骤创建新密码
translation.source: Please visit the following link and follow the steps to create a new password
translation.medium: 请访问下面的链接并遵循创建新密码的步骤
translation.reference: 请访问以下链接，并按说明的步骤创建新密码

translation.en: Let me know if you were able to create your new password and sign in with it
translation.zh: 请告诉我您能否创建新密码并登录
translation.source: Let me know if you were able to create your new password and sign in with it
translation.medium: 让我知道你是否能够创建新的密码并使用它登录
translation.reference: 请告诉我您能否创建新密码并登录

translation.en: Great!!
translation.zh: 太好了！
translation.source: Great!!
translation.medium: 这真是太棒了!
translation.reference: 太好了！

translation.en: I am glad that you have accessed your eBook now!!
translation.zh: 很高兴听到您说现在可以访问电子书了！
translation.source: I am glad that you have accessed your eBook now!!
translation.medium: 我很高兴你现在可以阅读你的电子书了!
translation.reference: 很高兴听到您说现在可以访问电子书了！

translation.en: For your reference, I will be sending you a transcript of our conversation.
translation.zh: 我将把我们的聊天记录寄给您，供您参考。
translation.source: For your reference, I will be sending you a transcript of our conversation.
translation.medium: 为了您的参考,我将发送我们的对话的成绩单.
translation.reference: 我将把我们的聊天记录寄给您，供您参考。

translation.en: Should you have any other questions or concerns, you can always reply back to that email and we will be able to assist you further.
translation.zh: 如果您有任何其他疑问或担忧，您可以随时回复邮件，我们很乐意继续帮助您。
translation.source: Should you have any other questions or concerns, you can always reply back to that email and we will be able to assist you further.
translation.medium: 如果您有任何其他问题或疑虑,请随时回复这封电子邮件,我们将能够进一步协助您.
translation.reference: 如果您有任何其他疑问或担忧，您可以随时回复邮件，我们很乐意继续帮助您。

translation.en: Is there anything else I can help you with today?
translation.zh: 现在还有什么需要我帮忙的吗？
translation.source: Is there anything else I can help you with today?
translation.medium: 我今天还能帮你做些什么吗?
translation.reference: 现在还有什么需要我帮忙的吗？

translation.en: Stainless Steel Made Straight, Razor Maintenance Made Easy With Replaceable Blades!
translation.zh: 不锈钢直剃刀，容易更换刀片，维护更简单！
translation.source: Stainless Steel Made Straight, Razor Maintenance Made Easy With Replaceable Blades!
translation.medium: 用可更换的刀片使刀具的维护变得容易!
translation.reference: 不锈钢直剃刀，容易更换刀片，维护更简单！

translation.en: This Razor is a close relative to Straight/Cut Throat razor, giving you that old Barber Vintage Vibe for a fraction of the price and virtually zero maintenance!
translation.zh: 这把剃刀是直剃刀/直刃剃须刀的近亲，给您带来传统理发师般的服务，价格低廉，且近乎零维护！
translation.source: This Razor is a close relative to Straight/Cut Throat razor, giving you that old Barber Vintage Vibe for a fraction of the price and virtually zero maintenance!
translation.medium: 这款剃须刀是直切子剃须刀的近亲,
translation.reference: 这把剃刀是直剃刀/直刃剃须刀的近亲，给您带来传统理发师般的服务，价格低廉，且近乎零维护！

translation.en: Using Replaceable Standard Double Edge Blades just like the classic safety razor - Meaning you don't have to worry about stropping and sharpening and yet enjoy the closeness of a straight razor shave!
translation.zh: 使用可更换的标准双刃刀片，就像经典的安全剃刀一样 - 这意味着您不必磨刀片，就能享受直剃刀与皮肤的亲密接触！
translation.source: Using Replaceable Standard Double Edge Blades just like the classic safety razor - Meaning you don't have to worry about stropping and sharpening and yet enjoy the closeness of a straight razor shave!
translation.medium: 使用可更换标准双边刀片, 就像经典的安全剃须刀一样 - - 这意味着你不必担心削和利,
translation.reference: 使用可更换的标准双刃刀片，就像经典的安全剃刀一样 - 这意味着您不必磨刀片，就能享受直剃刀与皮肤的亲密接触！

translation.en: Perfect for beginners who want to try the art of Shaving with Straight Razors.
translation.zh: 它是刚开始尝试使用直剃刀的用户的完美选择。
translation.source: Perfect for beginners who want to try the art of Shaving with Straight Razors.
translation.medium: 对于初学者来说是完美的, 他们想尝试用直剃须刀剃须的艺术.
translation.reference: 它是刚开始尝试使用直剃刀的用户的完美选择。

translation.en: Three or five blade razors irritate the skin much more and you need to press it hard against your skin to use them.
translation.zh: 在使用三刀片或五刀片剃须刀时，需要用力按压皮肤，因此对皮肤的刺激更大。
translation.source: Three or five blade razors irritate the skin much more and you need to press it hard against your skin to use them.
translation.medium: 你需要用三到五刀的剃须刀对皮肤的刺激要大得多, 你需要用三到五刀的剃须刀对皮肤的压力要大得多.
translation.reference: 在使用三刀片或五刀片剃须刀时，需要用力按压皮肤，因此对皮肤的刺激更大。

translation.en: Therefore, this shaving product is so great and often using for better skin care products than the average shaver.

translation.en: To update your payment information please follow these steps:
translation.zh: 要更新付款信息，请执行以下步骤：

translation.en: Log in to your #PRS_ORG# account.

translation.source: Click on "My Account" and in the menu select "Account Settings”

translation.reference: 单击“我的帐户”，并在菜单中选择“帐户设置”

translation.zh: 在“付款信息”下，选择信用卡类型并输入卡上的卡号、安全码 (CVV) 和过期日期。
translation.source: Under “Payment Information”, select the type of credit card and enter your card number, security code (CVV), name on the card, and expiration date.

translation.en: Click "Save”
