translation.reference: 单击“保存”

translation.en: did yo utried this steps?
translation.zh: 您执行这些步骤了吗？
translation.source: did yo utried this steps?
translation.medium: 你尝试过这些步骤吗?
translation.reference: 您执行这些步骤了吗？

translation.en: Water heater temp and bath issue.
translation.zh: 热水器温度和浴缸问题。
translation.source: Water heater temp and bath issue.
translation.medium: 热水器温度和浴室问题.
translation.reference: 热水器温度和浴缸问题。

translation.en: My water heater is set pretty low.
translation.zh: 我把热水器温度调得相当低。
translation.source: My water heater is set pretty low.
translation.medium: 我的热水器设置相当低.
translation.reference: 我把热水器温度调得相当低。

translation.en: It’s a small tank in a closet (I live in an old pre-war apartment).
translation.zh: 它就是壁橱里的一个小水箱（我住在一个战前旧公寓里）。
translation.source: It’s a small tank in a closet (I live in an old pre-war apartment).
translation.medium: 我住在一个旧的战前公寓里.
translation.reference: 它就是壁橱里的一个小水箱（我住在一个战前旧公寓里）。

translation.en: Question is, it does fill the bathtub up all the way without going cold.
translation.zh: 问题是，它需要给浴缸里灌满水而且不能变凉。
translation.source: Question is, it does fill the bathtub up all the way without going cold.
translation.medium: 问题在于,它会在没有冷却的情况下把浴完全填满.
translation.reference: 问题是，它需要给浴缸里灌满水而且不能变凉。

translation.en: If I only bathe once a week (but shower every 2 days or so) and the heater has enough water for quick showers, is it worth turning up the heat for the once a week bath?
translation.zh: 如果我一周只在浴缸里洗一次澡（但每两天左右淋浴一次），而且热水器里的水已经足够冲澡了，那么就为了一周使用一次浴缸，值得把热水器温度调高吗？
translation.source: If I only bathe once a week (but shower every 2 days or so) and the heater has enough water for quick showers, is it worth turning up the heat for the once a week bath?
translation.medium: 如果我每周洗一次 (但每两天左右洗一次), 暖气器有足够的水供快速洗, 值得提高每周洗一次的热量吗?
translation.reference: 如果我一周只在浴缸里洗一次澡（但每两天左右淋浴一次），而且热水器里的水已经足够冲澡了，那么就为了一周使用一次浴缸，值得把热水器温度调高吗？

translation.en: Or would I save more electricity heating up my stock pot on the stove and adding it to the bath once the water heater is emptied?
translation.zh: 或者，如果热水器里的水不够，那我在炉子上用汤锅把水烧热再倒到浴缸里，可以省更多的电吗？
translation.source: Or would I save more electricity heating up my stock pot on the stove and adding it to the bath once the water heater is emptied?
translation.medium: 我是否会节省更多的电力, 在炉子上加热我的, 在热水器空了之后把它加到浴里?
translation.reference: 或者，如果热水器里的水不够，那我在炉子上用汤锅把水烧热再倒到浴缸里，可以省更多的电吗？

translation.en: Edit: Thanks everyone for the advice!
translation.zh: 编辑：感谢大家提出的建议！
translation.source: Edit: Thanks everyone for the advice!
translation.medium: 编辑:谢谢大家的建议!
translation.reference: 编辑：感谢大家提出的建议！

translation.en: I turned up the heat just a little and it did the trick.
translation.zh: 我把温度调高一点，就可以达到我想要的效果了。
translation.source: I turned up the heat just a little and it did the trick.
translation.medium: 我稍微加热了一下, 效果就好了.
translation.reference: 我把温度调高一点，就可以达到我想要的效果了。

translation.en: The comment about boiling being inefficient is probably correct bc even though the water heater is running continuously, that thing has SO MUCH insulation.
translation.zh: 关于把水烧沸效率很低的看法可能是正确的，因为即使热水器一直在运行，它的隔热性能也很好。
translation.source: The comment about boiling being inefficient is probably correct bc even though the water heater is running continuously, that thing has SO MUCH insulation.
translation.medium: 关于沸效率低的评论可能是正确的, 即使热水器连续运行,
translation.reference: 关于把水烧沸效率很低的看法可能是正确的，因为即使热水器一直在运行，它的隔热性能也很好。

translation.en: It’s hard to get to so I’m leaving it at that temp and calling it a day.
translation.zh: 温度调来调去很麻烦，所以我就一直保持这个温度了，今天就到此为止吧。
translation.source: It’s hard to get to so I’m leaving it at that temp and calling it a day.
translation.medium: 很难达到,所以我把它留在这个温度下,并称之为一天.
translation.reference: 温度调来调去很麻烦，所以我就一直保持这个温度了，今天就到此为止吧。

translation.en: Iran reports lowest number of daily COVID-19 cases in more than one year
translation.zh: 伊朗报告一年多来最低的每日 COVID-19 病例数
translation.source: Iran reports lowest number of daily COVID-19 cases in more than one year
translation.medium: 伊朗报告了一年多以来每日COVID-19病例数量最低
translation.reference: 伊朗报告一年多来最低的每日 COVID-19 病例数

translation.en: Iran's Health Ministry has registered 1,686 new daily COVID-19 infections, the lowest tally over the past 460 days, marking a sharp decline in cases as the fifth wave of the pandemic subsides.
translation.zh: 伊朗卫生部登记了 1686 例新增 COVID-19 感染病例，这是过去 460 天以来的最低记录，标志着随着第五波疫情消退，病例数量急剧下降。
translation.source: Iran's Health Ministry has registered 1,686 new daily COVID-19 infections, the lowest tally over the past 460 days, marking a sharp decline in cases as the fifth wave of the pandemic subsides.
translation.medium: 伊朗卫生部每天登记了1686例新增COVID-19感染者,这是过去460天以来的最低数字,随着第五波疫情的缓解,病例急剧下降.
translation.reference: 伊朗卫生部登记了 1686 例新增 COVID-19 感染病例，这是过去 460 天以来的最低记录，标志着随着第五波疫情消退，病例数量急剧下降。

translation.en: According to Press TV, the Ministry announced on Saturday that 58 Iranians died from the disease, noting that out of the new cases detected over the past 24 hours, 286 patients were admitted to hospital.
translation.zh: 据 Press TV 报道，伊朗卫生部周六宣布，58 名伊朗人死于该病，并指出在过去 24 小时发现的新病例中，有 286 名患者入院治疗。
translation.source: According to Press TV, the Ministry announced on Saturday that 58 Iranians died from the disease, noting that out of the new cases detected over the past 24 hours, 286 patients were admitted to hospital.
translation.medium: 根据新闻电视台的报道,该部周六宣布58名伊朗人死于这种疾病,并指出在过去24小时内发现的新病例中,有286名患者被送往医院.
translation.reference: 据 Press TV 报道，伊朗卫生部周六宣布，58 名伊朗人死于该病，并指出在过去 24 小时发现的新病例中，有 286 名患者入院治疗。

translation.en: It added that 6,152,524 people in the country have contracted COVID-19 and 5,963,373 of the infected people recovered and were discharged from hospitals.
translation.zh: 它还补充道，全国累计确诊病例 6,152,524 例，累计康复出院 5,963,373 例。
translation.source: It added that 6,152,524 people in the country have contracted COVID-19 and 5,963,373 of the infected people recovered and were discharged from hospitals.
translation.medium: 它补充说,该国有6,152,524人感染了COVID-19,5,963,373名感染者康复并从医院出院.
translation.reference: 它还补充道，全国累计确诊病例 6,152,524 例，累计康复出院 5,963,373 例。

translation.en: According to the Ministry, 3,126 COVID-19 patients are in intensive care units (ICU) while 39,951,481 diagnosis tests have been so far conducted across Iran.
translation.zh: 据伊朗卫生部统计，目前有 3126 名新冠肺炎患者在重症监护室 (ICU) 接受治疗，伊朗全国进行了 39,951,481 次诊断检测。
translation.source: According to the Ministry, 3,126 COVID-19 patients are in intensive care units (ICU) while 39,951,481 diagnosis tests have been so far conducted across Iran.
translation.medium: 根据该部的说法,目前有3,126名COVID-19患者在重症监护室 (ICU),迄今为止在伊朗进行了39,951,481次诊断测试.
translation.reference: 据伊朗卫生部统计，目前有 3126 名新冠肺炎患者在重症监护室 (ICU) 接受治疗，伊朗全国进行了 39,951,481 次诊断检测。

translation.en: Coronavirus figures have been on a downward trend since the government started a mass vaccination campaign.
translation.zh: 自政府大规模接种疫苗以来，冠状病毒数据一直呈下降趋势。
translation.source: Coronavirus figures have been on a downward trend since the government started a mass vaccination campaign.
translation.medium: 自政府开始大规模疫苗接种活动以来,冠状病毒病例数量呈下降趋势.
translation.reference: 自政府大规模接种疫苗以来，冠状病毒数据一直呈下降趋势。

translation.en: So far, 58,595,066 people have received the first dose of the COVID vaccine, 49,157,835 have received the second dosage and 2,237,841 have gotten the booster shots.
translation.zh: 截至目前，共有 58,595,066 人接种了第一剂疫苗，49,157,835 人接种了第二剂疫苗，2,237,841 人接种了加强剂疫苗。
translation.source: So far, 58,595,066 people have received the first dose of the COVID vaccine, 49,157,835 have received the second dosage and 2,237,841 have gotten the booster shots.
translation.medium: 截至目前,已有58,595,066人接种了COVID疫苗的第一剂量,49,157,835人接种了第二剂量,2237,841人接种了助推剂量.
translation.reference: 截至目前，共有 58,595,066 人接种了第一剂疫苗，49,157,835 人接种了第二剂疫苗，2,237,841 人接种了加强剂疫苗。

translation.en: The total number of vaccines injected in the country reached 109,990,742 doses.
translation.zh: 全国注射的疫苗总数达到 109,990,742 剂。
translation.source: The total number of vaccines injected in the country reached 109,990,742 doses.
translation.medium: 全国注射的疫苗总数达到了109,990,742剂.
translation.reference: 全国注射的疫苗总数达到 109,990,742 剂。

translation.en: Over the past 24 hours, 19 provinces reported almost no death case or only one dead.
translation.zh: 在过去 24 小时内，19 个省几乎没有报告死亡病例或只有 1 例死亡病例。
translation.source: Over the past 24 hours, 19 provinces reported almost no death case or only one dead.
translation.medium: 在过去的24小时里,19个省份几乎没有报告死亡病例或只有1人死亡.
translation.reference: 在过去 24 小时内，19 个省几乎没有报告死亡病例或只有 1 例死亡病例。

translation.en: According to the latest figures, eight cities are in the orange zones, 119 in the yellow category, and 321 cities are in blue zones.
translation.zh: 根据最新数据，8 个城市在橙色区域，119 个在黄色区域，321 个在蓝色区域。
translation.source: According to the latest figures, eight cities are in the orange zones, 119 in the yellow category, and 321 cities are in blue zones.
translation.medium: 根据最新数据,8个城市属于色区,119个城市属于黄色区,321个城市属于蓝色区.
translation.reference: 根据最新数据，8 个城市在橙色区域，119 个在黄色区域，321 个在蓝色区域。

translation.en: There is no city in the high-risk red zone.
translation.zh: 没有城市在高危红色区域。
translation.source: There is no city in the high-risk red zone.
translation.medium: 没有任何城市处于高风险红区.
translation.reference: 没有城市在高危红色区域。

translation.en: Iran's First Vice President Mohammad Mokhber said on Wednesday that the country is fully prepared to roll out coronavirus booster vaccinations.
translation.zh: 伊朗第一副总统穆罕默德·莫赫贝尔 (Mohammad Mokhber) 周三表示，该国已全面做好推行新冠病毒增强疫苗的准备。
translation.source: Iran's First Vice President Mohammad Mokhber said on Wednesday that the country is fully prepared to roll out coronavirus booster vaccinations.
translation.medium: 伊朗第一副总统穆罕默德·莫赫伯 (Mohammad Mokhber) 周三表示,该国已完全准备好推出冠状病毒增强疫苗接种.
translation.reference: 伊朗第一副总统穆罕默德·莫赫贝尔 (Mohammad Mokhber) 周三表示，该国已全面做好推行新冠病毒增强疫苗的准备。

translation.en: "Today there is neither concern nor any shortage in the supply of vaccine and the ground is ready for the third and fourth dose vaccinations," Mokhber added.
translation.zh: Mokhber 补充说:“如今，疫苗供应既不短缺也没有隐患，我们已经为接种第三和第四剂疫苗做好了准备。”
translation.source: "Today there is neither concern nor any shortage in the supply of vaccine and the ground is ready for the third and fourth dose vaccinations," Mokhber added.
translation.medium: 莫赫伯补充说:"今天疫苗供应既没有担忧,也没有短缺, 接种第三和第四剂量疫苗的基础已经准备好了.
translation.reference: Mokhber 补充说:“如今，疫苗供应既不短缺也没有隐患，我们已经为接种第三和第四剂疫苗做好了准备。”

translation.en: You know what I understand you.
translation.zh: 我明白您的意思。
translation.source: You know what I understand you.
translation.medium: 你知道什么我理解你.
translation.reference: 我明白您的意思。

translation.en: since we want you to have your order from us.
translation.zh: 我们也希望您能在我们这里下单。
translation.source: since we want you to have your order from us.
translation.medium: 因为我们希望你从我们那里得到你的订单.
translation.reference: 我们也希望您能在我们这里下单。

translation.en: As a courtesy on your first order I will process a full amount credit on this order so you can use this credit to place a order with the right branch,
translation.zh: 为了向您的第一个订单表示感谢，我们将按照此订单的总金额送您一张抵免券，您可以使用此抵免券向您喜欢的门店下单。
translation.source: As a courtesy on your first order I will process a full amount credit on this order so you can use this credit to place a order with the right branch,
translation.medium: 作为您的第一个订单的礼貌, 我将对此订单进行全额信用处理,
translation.reference: 为了向您的第一个订单表示感谢，我们将按照此订单的总金额送您一张抵免券，您可以使用此抵免券向您喜欢的门店下单。

translation.en: Free Training on CompTIA A+ | Will Cover Full Course
translation.zh: CompTIA A+ 免费培训 | 将涵盖全部课程
translation.source: Free Training on CompTIA A+ | Will Cover Full Course
translation.medium: 在 CompTIA A+ 免费培训. 将涵盖全课程
translation.reference: CompTIA A+ 免费培训 | 将涵盖全部课程

translation.en: I'm currently delivering free training on the CompTIA A+ course.
translation.zh: 我目前正在提供免费的 CompTIA A+ 培训课程。
translation.source: I'm currently delivering free training on the CompTIA A+ course.
translation.medium: 我目前正在免费提供CompTIA A+课程的培训.
translation.reference: 我目前正在提供免费的 CompTIA A+ 培训课程。

translation.en: The course consists of 18 modules and I will be doing a dedicated video on each module.
translation.zh: 本课程由 18 个模块组成，我将为每个模块制作专门的视频。
translation.source: The course consists of 18 modules and I will be doing a dedicated video on each module.
translation.medium: 课程由18个模块组成, 我将为每一个模块制作一个专门的视频.
translation.reference: 本课程由 18 个模块组成，我将为每个模块制作专门的视频。

translation.en: Some of these videos might be a bit long since it will be a whole module in each video so please feel free to make use of the time stamps in descriptions if you're looking for specific topics only or just want to refresh on certain topics only.
translation.zh: 有些视频可能会有点长，因为每个视频都是一个完整的模块，所以如果你只想寻找特定的主题或只想复习特定的主题，请使用描述中的时间戳。
translation.source: Some of these videos might be a bit long since it will be a whole module in each video so please feel free to make use of the time stamps in descriptions if you're looking for specific topics only or just want to refresh on certain topics only.
translation.medium: 如果您只是在寻找特定主题或只是想更新某些主题, 请随时使用描述中的时间.
translation.reference: 有些视频可能会有点长，因为每个视频都是一个完整的模块，所以如果你只想寻找特定的主题或只想复习特定的主题，请使用描述中的时间戳。

translation.en: The time stamps are there to make life easier for you so it's your own fault if you end up skimming through the module back and forth like a crazy person looking for their lost teeth.
translation.zh: 时间戳的存在就是为了方便寻找内容，所以如果你像一个要把丢掉的牙齿找回来的疯子一样来回查找模块，那是你自己的错。
translation.source: The time stamps are there to make life easier for you so it's your own fault if you end up skimming through the module back and forth like a crazy person looking for their lost teeth.
translation.medium: 时间标记是为了让你的生活变得更轻松, 所以如果你最终像一个疯子一样在模块里来回, 寻找失去的牙, 那是你自己的错.
translation.reference: 时间戳的存在就是为了方便寻找内容，所以如果你像一个要把丢掉的牙齿找回来的疯子一样来回查找模块，那是你自己的错。

translation.en: I will make 20 videos for this course, the first is just the 4 min intro explaining the course, the last will be a dedicated exam tips video and then obviously the 18 videos in between will be your modules.
translation.zh: 我会为这个课程制作 20 个视频，第一个视频时长 4 分钟，介绍这个课程，最后一个视频专门教授考试技巧，中间的 18 个视频对应不同的模块。
translation.source: I will make 20 videos for this course, the first is just the 4 min intro explaining the course, the last will be a dedicated exam tips video and then obviously the 18 videos in between will be your modules.
translation.medium: 我将为这个课程制作20个视频,第一个只是4分钟的介绍解释课程,最后一个将是专门的考试技巧视频,然后显然中间的18个视频将是你的模块.
translation.reference: 我会为这个课程制作 20 个视频，第一个视频时长 4 分钟，介绍这个课程，最后一个视频专门教授考试技巧，中间的 18 个视频对应不同的模块。

translation.en: The training should be enough to pass both the international exams for A+, and the other courses I deliver should also be enough to pass the exams associated if there is a exam associated to that specific course.
translation.zh: 完成培训后，你应该足以通过 A+ 的国际考试，我提供的其他课程也应该足以帮助你通过相关考试（如果有与该特定课程相关的考试）。
translation.source: The training should be enough to pass both the international exams for A+, and the other courses I deliver should also be enough to pass the exams associated if there is a exam associated to that specific course.
translation.medium: 培训应该足以通过A+国际考试, 我提供的其他课程也应该足以通过相关的考试, 如果与该特定课程相关的考试.
translation.reference: 完成培训后，你应该足以通过 A+ 的国际考试，我提供的其他课程也应该足以帮助你通过相关考试（如果有与该特定课程相关的考试）。

translation.en: If you have a question about a specific topic in a module or the course in general that you would like more clarity on, please feel free to ask and I will try to assist you where I can if I'm online.
translation.zh: 如果你对某个模块或课程的特定主题有疑问要弄清楚，请随时问我，如果我在网上，我会尽量帮助你。
translation.source: If you have a question about a specific topic in a module or the course in general that you would like more clarity on, please feel free to ask and I will try to assist you where I can if I'm online.
translation.medium: 如果您对某个模块或课程中的某个特定主题有任何疑问,
translation.reference: 如果你对某个模块或课程的特定主题有疑问要弄清楚，请随时问我，如果我在网上，我会尽量帮助你。

translation.zh: 以下是课程简介
translation.source: Here is the course intro

translation.reference: 以下是课程简介

translation.reference: **CompTIA A+ 课程介绍**

translation.en: Thanks for waiting.
translation.zh: 感谢您的耐心等候。
translation.source: Thanks for waiting.
translation.medium: 谢谢你的等待.
translation.reference: 感谢您的耐心等候。

translation.en: Wrong order was selected earlier that's why I got confused earlier.
translation.zh: 我之前看错订单了，所以没说对。
translation.source: Wrong order was selected earlier that's why I got confused earlier.
translation.medium: 之前选择了错误的顺序, 这就是为什么我之前感到困惑的原因.
translation.reference: 我之前看错订单了，所以没说对。

translation.source: I thought it was already delivered.
translation.medium: 我认为它已经交付.
translation.reference: 我以为已经送到了。

translation.zh: 我看了您的订单，骑手目前正在取餐。

translation.medium: 我检查了正确的顺序, 我可以在这里看到骑手正在试图拿起它.
translation.reference: 我看了您的订单，骑手目前正在取餐。

translation.en: He will be there in 10-15 minutes.
translation.zh: 10-15 分钟后就能送到。
translation.source: He will be there in 10-15 minutes.
translation.medium: 他将在10到15分钟内到达.
translation.reference: 10-15 分钟后就能送到。

translation.en: I'm sorry but I don't see that you have sign in to your account, unless you have another account.
translation.zh: 抱歉，我没有看到您已经登录帐户了，您是有另一个帐户吗？
translation.source: I'm sorry but I don't see that you have sign in to your account, unless you have another account.
translation.medium: 我很抱歉,但我看不到您有登录到您的帐户,除非您有另一个帐户.
translation.reference: 抱歉，我没有看到您已经登录帐户了，您是有另一个帐户吗？

translation.en: If this the case please let me know the email you are already signed in on the ereader.
translation.zh: 如果是，请把您用来登录电子阅读器的电子邮箱告诉我。
translation.source: If this the case please let me know the email you are already signed in on the ereader.
translation.medium: 如果是这样的话,请让我知道你已经在电子邮件阅读器上登录的电子邮件.
translation.reference: 如果是，请把您用来登录电子阅读器的电子邮箱告诉我。

translation.zh: 正面：1 个大口袋和 1 个拉链口袋
translation.source: Front: 1 large pocket and 1 zipper pocket

translation.zh: 宽 1.5 英寸宽、长 58 英寸的可调节真皮肩带

translation.en: Naturally tanned with Sunflower oil only, no use of dye or chemicals
translation.zh: 只使用葵花油自然鞣制，不使用染料或化学物质
translation.source: Naturally tanned with Sunflower oil only, no use of dye or chemicals
translation.medium: 仅用向日油自然制,不使用染料或化学品
translation.reference: 只使用葵花油自然鞣制，不使用染料或化学物质

translation.en: UNIQUE CHARACTERISTICS OF HANDMADE LEATHER BAGS-
translation.zh: 独具特色的手工皮包 -
translation.source: UNIQUE CHARACTERISTICS OF HANDMADE LEATHER BAGS-
translation.medium: 手工皮包的独特特点
translation.reference: 独具特色的手工皮包 -

translation.en: Bag is made of Genuine Real Goat Leather (Full Grain) processed and tanned naturally with sunflower oil only.
translation.zh: 这款皮包使用真正的山羊皮（全谷物）制成，只使用葵花籽油自然加工和鞣制。
translation.source: Bag is made of Genuine Real Goat Leather (Full Grain) processed and tanned naturally with sunflower oil only.
translation.medium: 袋子是用天然的真正山羊皮革 (全谷物) 制成的,仅用向日油加工和制.
translation.reference: 这款皮包使用真正的山羊皮（全谷物）制成，只使用葵花籽油自然加工和鞣制。

translation.en: Each vintage leather bag is a totally natural and handmade product therefore the colors and the finish can vary from one piece to the other.
translation.zh: 每个复古的皮包都是完全自然和手工制作的产品，因此每块皮的颜色与光泽可能有所不同。
translation.source: Each vintage leather bag is a totally natural and handmade product therefore the colors and the finish can vary from one piece to the other.
translation.medium: 每个复古皮包都是完全天然的手工制品,因此颜色和外观都会因每件不同而有所不同.
translation.reference: 每个复古的皮包都是完全自然和手工制作的产品，因此每块皮的颜色与光泽可能有所不同。

translation.en: Each bag has a unique antique leather / lightly distressed vintage leather look.
translation.zh: 每个皮包都呈现出别具一格的古董皮革/轻微做旧皮革质感。
translation.source: Each bag has a unique antique leather / lightly distressed vintage leather look.
translation.medium: 每个袋子都有一个独特的古董皮革/轻微痛苦的复古皮革外观.
translation.reference: 每个皮包都呈现出别具一格的古董皮革/轻微做旧皮革质感。

translation.en: Parts from several hides may be used to make a single leather bag.
translation.zh: 一个皮包可能用了几块皮的某些部分。
translation.source: Parts from several hides may be used to make a single leather bag.
translation.medium: 一些皮革的部分可以用来制造一个皮革袋.
translation.reference: 一个皮包可能用了几块皮的某些部分。

translation.en: So there may be some variation in color and the textures to the different parts of a bag, which will create a wonderfully unique effect.
translation.zh: 因此，皮包各个部分的颜色和纹理可能不一样，这将形成一个奇妙而独特的效果。
translation.source: So there may be some variation in color and the textures to the different parts of a bag, which will create a wonderfully unique effect.
translation.medium: 袋子的不同部分的颜色和纹理可能会有所不同,
translation.reference: 因此，皮包各个部分的颜色和纹理可能不一样，这将形成一个奇妙而独特的效果。

translation.en: Because of different craftsman and there may be small differences in the style, construction of the bags is shown on the website.
translation.zh: 因为工匠的不同，款式上可能会有细微的差异，包包的构造在网站上有展示。
translation.source: Because of different craftsman and there may be small differences in the style, construction of the bags is shown on the website.
translation.medium: 由于不同工匠和风格可能有小差异, 袋子的构造在网站上显示.
translation.reference: 因为工匠的不同，款式上可能会有细微的差异，包包的构造在网站上有展示。

translation.en: The lining may be a lighter or darker colour to the one shown in the images.
translation.zh: 里衬的颜色可能比图片中显示的颜色浅或深。
translation.source: The lining may be a lighter or darker colour to the one shown in the images.
translation.medium: 层的颜色可能比图片中显示的颜色更浅或更深.
translation.reference: 里衬的颜色可能比图片中显示的颜色浅或深。

translation.en: Please write to us to know the current stock color.
translation.zh: 要想知道当前库存皮包的颜色，请联系我们。
translation.source: Please write to us to know the current stock color.
translation.medium: 请给我们写信以了解当前的股票颜色.
translation.reference: 要想知道当前库存皮包的颜色，请联系我们。

translation.en: Genuine leather might have very small cut / scars / mark on it.
translation.zh: 真皮表面可能有很小的切口/疤痕/印记。
translation.source: Genuine leather might have very small cut / scars / mark on it.
translation.medium: 真皮可能会有很小的伤口/痕/痕迹.
translation.reference: 真皮表面可能有很小的切口/疤痕/印记。

translation.en: This does not mean it is damaged.
translation.zh: 这并不意味着它损坏了。
translation.source: This does not mean it is damaged.
translation.medium: 这并不意味着它是受损的.
translation.reference: 这并不意味着它损坏了。

translation.en: There may also be visible creases in the leather.
translation.zh: 皮革上还可能有明显的折痕。
translation.source: There may also be visible creases in the leather.
translation.medium: 皮肤上也可能有明显的纹.
translation.reference: 皮革上还可能有明显的折痕。

translation.en: These features show the genuine origin of our leather satchels and messengers bags, they form part of the bag and do not affect its durability.
translation.zh: 这些特征表明我们的真皮挎包和邮差包的真正来源，它们不影响包的耐用性。
translation.source: These features show the genuine origin of our leather satchels and messengers bags, they form part of the bag and do not affect its durability.
translation.medium: 这些特征表明我们的皮包和信使包的真实起源,它们是包包的一部分,并不会影响包包的耐用性.
translation.reference: 这些特征表明我们的真皮挎包和邮差包的真正来源，它们不影响包的耐用性。

translation.en: Pure leather may smell a little when it is fresh but the smell will go away with use.
translation.zh: 真皮制成的新包可能会有一点气味，但使用后气味会消失。
translation.source: Pure leather may smell a little when it is fresh but the smell will go away with use.
translation.medium: 纯皮革在新鲜时可能会有点气味, 但随着使用, 气味会消失.
translation.reference: 真皮制成的新包可能会有一点气味，但使用后气味会消失。

translation.en: Please keep it in sunlight and fresh air for a few days.
translation.zh: 请把它放在通风的地方晾几天。
translation.source: Please keep it in sunlight and fresh air for a few days.
translation.medium: 请将其放在阳光和新鲜空气中几天.
translation.reference: 请把它放在通风的地方晾几天。

translation.en: There may be local customs / VAT charges which are unknown to us and beyond our control.
translation.zh: 当地可能会征收关税/增值税，这不在我们的控制范围内。
translation.source: There may be local customs / VAT charges which are unknown to us and beyond our control.
translation.medium: 可能有地方的海关/增值税费用,我们不知道和超出我们的控制.
translation.reference: 当地可能会征收关税/增值税，这不在我们的控制范围内。

translation.en: Buyers are responsible for CUSTOMS at destination.
translation.zh: 目的地的海关费用由买家支付。
translation.source: Buyers are responsible for CUSTOMS at destination.
translation.medium: 买家在目的地负责关税.
translation.reference: 目的地的海关费用由买家支付。

translation.en: You know something.
translation.zh: 你是知道一些的。
translation.source: You know something.
translation.medium: 你知道一些事情.
translation.reference: 你是知道一些的。

translation.en: I get what Dave's point was.
translation.zh: 我明白戴夫的意思。
translation.source: I get what Dave's point was.
translation.medium: 我明白戴夫的意思.
translation.reference: 我明白戴夫的意思。

translation.en: It's worse to kill black people than it is to make fun of trans people.
translation.zh: 杀害黑人比取笑变性人更不可取。
translation.source: It's worse to kill black people than it is to make fun of trans people.
translation.medium: 杀死黑人比嘲笑跨性别者还要糟糕.
translation.reference: 杀害黑人比取笑变性人更不可取。

translation.en: And of course that's true.
translation.zh: 这当然是对的。
translation.source: And of course that's true.
translation.medium: 这当然是真的.
translation.reference: 这当然是对的。

translation.en: But Dave forgot something.
translation.zh: 但是戴夫忘了一些东西。
translation.source: But Dave forgot something.
translation.medium: 但戴夫忘记了一些东西.
translation.reference: 但是戴夫忘了一些东西。

translation.en: Many people who hate trans people also hate black people.
translation.zh: 许多人既讨厌变性人，也讨厌黑人。
translation.source: Many people who hate trans people also hate black people.
translation.medium: 许多讨厌跨性别者的人也讨厌黑人.
translation.reference: 许多人既讨厌变性人，也讨厌黑人。

translation.en: He hasn't endeared anyone to #blacklivesmatter.
translation.zh: 他没有让任何人拥戴 #blacklivesmatter。
translation.source: He hasn't endeared anyone to #blacklivesmatter.
translation.medium: 他没有让任何人喜欢#blacklivesmatter.
translation.reference: 他没有让任何人拥戴 #blacklivesmatter。

translation.en: He's just given transphobes another hero and more anti-trans rhetoric.
translation.zh: 他只是给跨性别恐惧者造就了另一个英雄和更多的反变性言论。
translation.source: He's just given transphobes another hero and more anti-trans rhetoric.
translation.medium: 他只是给了变性恐惧症的另一个英雄和更多的反变性言论.
translation.reference: 他只是给跨性别恐惧者造就了另一个英雄和更多的反变性言论。

translation.en: He's given credibility to transphobia.
translation.zh: 他在跨性别恐惧者中赢得了信任。
translation.source: He's given credibility to transphobia.
translation.medium: 他给了变性恐惧症的可信性.
translation.reference: 他在跨性别恐惧者中赢得了信任。

translation.en: And considering the most vulnerable trans people are trans women of colour, he has made them a target for violence.
translation.zh: 考虑到最容易受到攻击的变性人是有色人种的女性变性者，他将她们变成了暴力的目标。
translation.source: And considering the most vulnerable trans people are trans women of colour, he has made them a target for violence.
translation.medium: 考虑到最脆弱的跨性别者是有色人种的跨性别女性,
translation.reference: 考虑到最容易受到攻击的变性人是有色人种的女性变性者，他将她们变成了暴力的目标。

translation.en: He left his show because he realized that white people were laughing AT him, not WITH him.
translation.zh: 他退出了他的节目，因为他意识到白人在嘲笑他，而不是跟他同心同德。
translation.source: He left his show because he realized that white people were laughing AT him, not WITH him.
translation.medium: 他离开了他的节目, 因为他意识到白人嘲笑他, 而不是他.
translation.reference: 他退出了他的节目，因为他意识到白人在嘲笑他，而不是跟他同心同德。

translation.en: How he didn't realize he's done the exact same thing to trans people is very sad.
translation.zh: 他竟然没有意识到他对变性人做了同样的事，真是可悲。
translation.source: How he didn't realize he's done the exact same thing to trans people is very sad.
translation.medium: 他没有意识到他对跨性别者也做了同样的事情,
translation.reference: 他竟然没有意识到他对变性人做了同样的事，真是可悲。

translation.en: You're welcome, one moment please.
translation.zh: 不客气，请稍等。
translation.source: You're welcome, one moment please.
translation.medium: 没有问题,请等一下.
translation.reference: 不客气，请稍等。

translation.en: I've ordered a replacement item for you, this is scheduled to dispatch on February 19.
translation.zh: 我已经为您订购了一个更换件，预计 2 月 19 日发货。
translation.source: I've ordered a replacement item for you, this is scheduled to dispatch on February 19.
translation.medium: 我已经为你订购了一件替代品, 计划在2月19日发货.
translation.reference: 我已经为您订购了一个更换件，预计 2 月 19 日发货。

translation.en: I will just arrange a returns label for you now.
translation.zh: 我现在就给您安排退货标签。
translation.source: I will just arrange a returns label for you now.
translation.medium: 我会为你安排一个退货标签.
translation.reference: 我现在就给您安排退货标签。

translation.en: A Thief’s Pants Falls Down As He Attempts To Flee.
translation.zh: 小偷逃跑时裤子掉了。
translation.source: A Thief’s Pants Falls Down As He Attempts To Flee.
translation.medium: 一个小偷试图逃跑时,他的子掉了下来.
translation.reference: 小偷逃跑时裤子掉了。

translation.en: So to note, I didn’t witness this.
translation.zh: 我先声明，我没有亲眼目睹这个场景。
translation.source: So to note, I didn’t witness this.
translation.medium: 我没有亲眼目睹此事.
translation.reference: 我先声明，我没有亲眼目睹这个场景。

translation.en: I was told this by co-workers at my first retail job.
translation.zh: 这是我从事第一份零售工作时同事告诉我的。
translation.source: I was told this by co-workers at my first retail job.
translation.medium: 在我的第一份零售工作中,
translation.reference: 这是我从事第一份零售工作时同事告诉我的。

translation.en: These two guys came to the store.
translation.zh: 那天有两个人来到店里。
translation.source: These two guys came to the store.
translation.medium: 这两个人来到了商店.
translation.reference: 那天有两个人来到店里。

translation.en: One of them was pretty infamous in town for always being in trouble with the law.
translation.zh: 其中一个经常犯事儿，因此在镇上臭名昭著。
translation.source: One of them was pretty infamous in town for always being in trouble with the law.
translation.medium: 他们中的一个在镇上非常臭名昭著的总是与法律发生麻烦.
translation.reference: 其中一个经常犯事儿，因此在镇上臭名昭著。

translation.en: After a while of browsing, the infamous one left and went back to his vehicle while the other one took a shopping cart, and put a large 500 dollar socket set in it.
translation.zh: 这人逛了一会儿就出去了，回到车里坐着；另一个人推着购物车，往车里放了一个 500 美元的大套筒扳手组。
translation.source: After a while of browsing, the infamous one left and went back to his vehicle while the other one took a shopping cart, and put a large 500 dollar socket set in it.
translation.medium: 另一位则拿起一辆购物车, 放入一套价值500美元的大插座.
translation.reference: 这人逛了一会儿就出去了，回到车里坐着；另一个人推着购物车，往车里放了一个 500 美元的大套筒扳手组。

translation.en: This accomplice then waited until the two cashiers at the exit door were busy, then walked right by them and out the door.
translation.zh: 然后，这人趁着出口处的两名收银员忙着收银，径直从他们身边走过，走出了门。
translation.source: This accomplice then waited until the two cashiers at the exit door were busy, then walked right by them and out the door.
translation.medium: 这名帮凶等待出口门的两名收银员忙碌, 然后直接走过他们, 走出门口.
translation.reference: 然后，这人趁着出口处的两名收银员忙着收银，径直从他们身边走过，走出了门。

translation.en: Both of them noticed, and asked each other if the guy paid.
translation.zh: 这两名收银员都注意到他了，互问此人有没有付钱。
translation.source: Both of them noticed, and asked each other if the guy paid.
translation.medium: 他们俩都注意到了, 问对方是不是那个家伙付了钱.
translation.reference: 这两名收银员都注意到他了，互问此人有没有付钱。

translation.en: When it was confirmed he didn’t, one ran after him.
translation.zh: 当证实他没有付款时，一名收银员追了上去。
translation.source: When it was confirmed he didn’t, one ran after him.
translation.medium: 当被证实他没有, 一个跑在他身后.
translation.reference: 当证实他没有付款时，一名收银员追了上去。

translation.en: I was told the cashier shouted for him to stop as she chased after him, but he began running with the cart to the getaway vehicle.
translation.zh: 我同事说，收银员边追边喊他停下来，他却开始推着购物车跑向同伙的车。
translation.source: I was told the cashier shouted for him to stop as she chased after him, but he began running with the cart to the getaway vehicle.
translation.medium: 我被告知收银员在追他时喊叫他停下来, 但他开始跟着马车跑到逃跑车上.
translation.reference: 我同事说，收银员边追边喊他停下来，他却开始推着购物车跑向同伙的车。

translation.en: I don’t know if he was one of those guys who liked wearing his pants low, or he didn’t have a belt on.
translation.zh: 此人当时穿着低腰裤，而且没有系皮带。
translation.source: I don’t know if he was one of those guys who liked wearing his pants low, or he didn’t have a belt on.
translation.medium: 我不知道他是否喜欢低着子,
translation.reference: 此人当时穿着低腰裤，而且没有系皮带。

translation.en: But I was told his pants started falling down, and he was struggling to pull them up while running and pushing a cart with a heavy socket set.
translation.zh: 他跑着跑着，裤子就掉了，他一边往上拉裤子，一边跑，一边还推着车，车里放着沉重的套筒扳手组。
translation.source: But I was told his pants started falling down, and he was struggling to pull them up while running and pushing a cart with a heavy socket set.
translation.medium: 但是我被告知他的子开始掉下来,
translation.reference: 他跑着跑着，裤子就掉了，他一边往上拉裤子，一边跑，一边还推着车，车里放着沉重的套筒扳手组。

translation.en: He then ditches the cart, leaving the socket set in it as he yanked his pants up, and ran to the getaway vehicle, jumping in with his infamous accomplice diving them off.
translation.zh: 到后来，他扔下购物车和套筒扳手组不管了，拉起裤子，跑向同伙，跳进车里，两人就开车跑了。
translation.source: He then ditches the cart, leaving the socket set in it as he yanked his pants up, and ran to the getaway vehicle, jumping in with his infamous accomplice diving them off.
translation.medium: 他把子拉起来, 跑到逃跑车上, 跳进去, 他的臭名昭著的帮凶把子下来.
translation.reference: 到后来，他扔下购物车和套筒扳手组不管了，拉起裤子，跑向同伙，跳进车里，两人就开车跑了。

translation.en: I'm in HR and have worked payroll in the past.
translation.zh: 我在人力资源部门工作，过去做过工资单方面的工作。
translation.source: I'm in HR and have worked payroll in the past.
translation.medium: 我在人力资源部门工作,
translation.reference: 我在人力资源部门工作，过去做过工资单方面的工作。

translation.en: If someone comes to me and tells me that they're working to get out of a financially abusive relationship and their abuser looks at their paystubs,
translation.zh: 如果有人来找我，说他们正在努力摆脱一段经济虐待关系，而施虐者知晓他们的工资单，
translation.source: If someone comes to me and tells me that they're working to get out of a financially abusive relationship and their abuser looks at their paystubs,
translation.medium: 如果有人来找我,告诉我他们正在努力摆脱财务虐待的关系, 而他们的虐待者看着他们的工资卡,
translation.reference: 如果有人来找我，说他们正在努力摆脱一段经济虐待关系，而施虐者知晓他们的工资单，

translation.en: we might be able to help!
translation.zh: 我们也许能帮上忙！
translation.source: we might be able to help!
translation.medium: 我们也许可以帮忙!
translation.reference: 我们也许能帮上忙！

translation.en: Depending on the company.
translation.zh: 这件事需要公司的帮忙。
translation.source: Depending on the company.
translation.medium: 这取决于公司.
translation.reference: 这件事需要公司的帮忙。

translation.en: I haven't had to do any of the below but I have had to keep staff off our directories and teach reception to pretend they didn't know who someone was and how to identify the abuser if he came by.
translation.zh: 我没有必要做以下任何一件事，但我必须将工作人员从名录中删除，并教前台假装他们不知道某人是谁，以及如何在施虐者出现时辨认出来。
translation.source: I haven't had to do any of the below but I have had to keep staff off our directories and teach reception to pretend they didn't know who someone was and how to identify the abuser if he came by.
translation.medium: 我没有做下面的任何事情, 但我不得不让工作人员远离我们的目录, 并教接待员假装他们不知道某人是谁以及如何识别虐待者如果他来了.
translation.reference: 我没有必要做以下任何一件事，但我必须将工作人员从名录中删除，并教前台假装他们不知道某人是谁，以及如何在施虐者出现时辨认出来。

translation.en: I could make an arrangement to syphon money as an after tax deduction, give the deduction an incongruous name that makes it look like some sort of obligatory deduction and then "remit" that deduction back to you separately.
translation.zh: 我可以划出一部分工资作为税后扣除额，并给这个扣除额一个不甚了然的名称，让它看起来像某种强制性扣除额，然后把扣除额单独“汇”回你。
translation.source: I could make an arrangement to syphon money as an after tax deduction, give the deduction an incongruous name that makes it look like some sort of obligatory deduction and then "remit" that deduction back to you separately.
translation.medium: 我可以安排把钱作为税后减免,给减免一个不合适的名字让它看起来像某种强制性减免,
translation.reference: 我可以划出一部分工资作为税后扣除额，并给这个扣除额一个不甚了然的名称，让它看起来像某种强制性扣除额，然后把扣除额单独“汇”回你。

translation.en: I'd probably have to have you sign an agreement of course.
translation.zh: 当然，我可能需要你签署一份协议。
translation.source: I'd probably have to have you sign an agreement of course.
translation.medium: 我可能需要你签署一份协议.
translation.reference: 当然，我可能需要你签署一份协议。

translation.en: Another thing I might be able to do: have a fake email conversation with you about why your paystubs are going missing or why your password isn't working (after you change it) and how we're "trying to figure this out, thank you for your patience!"
translation.zh: 我还可以做的另一件事是：通过电子邮件与你进行一次虚假的对话，讨论为什么你的工资单不见了，或者你的密码不对（由你先更改密码），以及我们如何“试图解决这个问题，感谢你的耐心等待！”
translation.source: Another thing I might be able to do: have a fake email conversation with you about why your paystubs are going missing or why your password isn't working (after you change it) and how we're "trying to figure this out, thank you for your patience!"
translation.medium: 我可能还能做另一件事:与你进行虚假的电子邮件对话, 谈论为什么你的工资卡丢失了, 为什么你的密码不起作用 (在你更改后), 以及我们如何"试图弄清楚这个问题, 感谢你的耐心!"
translation.reference: 我还可以做的另一件事是：通过电子邮件与你进行一次虚假的对话，讨论为什么你的工资单不见了，或者你的密码不对（由你先更改密码），以及我们如何“试图解决这个问题，感谢你的耐心等待！”

translation.en: We don't have this but some employers can issue all or part of a paycheck onto their own debit card, no bank needed.
translation.zh: 我们不这样做，但一些雇主可以将全部或部分工资存入他们自己的借记卡，不需要经过银行。
translation.source: We don't have this but some employers can issue all or part of a paycheck onto their own debit card, no bank needed.
translation.medium: 但有些雇主可以将全部或部分工资支票发放到自己的借记卡上, 不需要银行.
translation.reference: 我们不这样做，但一些雇主可以将全部或部分工资存入他们自己的借记卡，不需要经过银行。

translation.en: Also a lot of employers have various underutilized employee support services.
translation.zh: 此外，许多雇主提供各种未充分利用的员工支持服务。
translation.source: Also a lot of employers have various underutilized employee support services.
translation.medium: 还有很多雇主没有充分利用各种员工支持服务.
translation.reference: 此外，许多雇主提供各种未充分利用的员工支持服务。

translation.en: These can range from counseling help, legal insurance, to discounts and coupons.
translation.zh: 这包括咨询帮助、法律保险、折扣和优惠券。
translation.source: These can range from counseling help, legal insurance, to discounts and coupons.
translation.medium: 这些可能包括咨询帮助,法律保险,折扣和优惠券.
translation.reference: 这包括咨询帮助、法律保险、折扣和优惠券。

translation.en: It is worth asking what they have so you can take advantage of anything that helps.
translation.zh: 可以问问雇主，这样你就可以利用任何有用的资源。
translation.source: It is worth asking what they have so you can take advantage of anything that helps.
translation.medium: 问问他们有什么东西是值得的,这样你就可以利用任何有帮助的东西.
translation.reference: 可以问问雇主，这样你就可以利用任何有用的资源。

translation.en: Some gyms let you rent lockers.
translation.zh: 有些健身房会让你租储物柜。
translation.source: Some gyms let you rent lockers.
translation.medium: 有些健身房让你租柜.
translation.reference: 有些健身房会让你租储物柜。

translation.en: Not an ideal place to hide stuff as theft is a risk, but it is an option that might work for some.
translation.zh: 这不是一个理想的藏东西的地方，因为存在偷窃风险，但对某些人可能有帮助。
translation.source: Not an ideal place to hide stuff as theft is a risk, but it is an option that might work for some.
translation.medium: 这不是隐藏物品的理想地点, 因为盗窃是有风险的, 但对于一些人来说,
translation.reference: 这不是一个理想的藏东西的地方，因为存在偷窃风险，但对某些人可能有帮助。

translation.en: I've done that several times, it doesn't work.
translation.zh: 我试过几次了，没用。
translation.source: I've done that several times, it doesn't work.
translation.medium: 我已经做了好几次了,它不起作用.
translation.reference: 我试过几次了，没用。

translation.en: I issued you a refund of the book.
translation.zh: 这本书我给您退款了。
translation.source: I issued you a refund of the book.
translation.medium: 我已经退还了这本书.
translation.reference: 这本书我给您退款了。

translation.en: I am very dissatisfied with the solution, what do I do if the problem occurs again in the next book?
translation.zh: 我对这个解决方案很不满意，如果下一本书再次出现这个问题，我该怎么办？
translation.source: I am very dissatisfied with the solution, what do I do if the problem occurs again in the next book?
translation.medium: 我对解决方案非常不满意,如果问题在下一本书中再次出现,我该怎么办?
translation.reference: 我对这个解决方案很不满意，如果下一本书再次出现这个问题，我该怎么办？

translation.en: It is a rear occasion that it happens.
translation.zh: 这个问题极少出现的。
translation.source: It is a rear occasion that it happens.
translation.medium: 这是一个后面的场合,它发生了.
translation.reference: 这个问题极少出现的。

translation.en: I am sorry, due to quality purposes I will have to close this chat if I don’t receive a response in 2 minutes.
translation.zh: 很抱歉，为了提高服务质量，如果您在 2 分钟内没有回应，我将结束本次聊天。
translation.source: I am sorry, due to quality purposes I will have to close this chat if I don’t receive a response in 2 minutes.
translation.medium: 我很抱歉,由于质量原因, 如果我在2分钟内没有收到回复, 我将不得不关闭这个聊天.
translation.reference: 很抱歉，为了提高服务质量，如果您在 2 分钟内没有回应，我将结束本次聊天。

translation.en: I will close this chat now since no response has been received.
translation.zh: 由于一直没有收到您的回复，我将结束本次聊天。
translation.source: I will close this chat now since no response has been received.
translation.medium: 由于没有收到任何回复,
translation.reference: 由于一直没有收到您的回复，我将结束本次聊天。

translation.en: Amazing.
translation.zh: 很神奇的。
translation.source: Amazing.
translation.medium: 这真是太棒了.
translation.reference: 很神奇的。

translation.en: But good on you.
translation.zh: 但很适合你。
translation.source: But good on you.
translation.medium: 但对你来说很好.
translation.reference: 但很适合你。

translation.en: Yeah, when I was 16 I applied and got offered a job at a restaurant.
translation.zh: 我 16 岁的时候找了一份在餐馆
translation.source: Yeah, when I was 16 I applied and got offered a job at a restaurant.
translation.medium: 是的,当我16岁的时候,我申请了一份在一家餐馆的工作.
translation.reference: 我 16 岁的时候找了一份在餐馆

translation.en: Dishwasher.
translation.zh: 当洗碗工的工作。
translation.source: Dishwasher.
translation.medium: 一个洗碗机.
translation.reference: 当洗碗工的工作。

translation.en: First shift they had me close.
translation.zh: 第一班，我就一直工作到打烊才下班。
translation.source: First shift they had me close.
translation.medium: 第一个轮班他们让我接近.
translation.reference: 第一班，我就一直工作到打烊才下班。

translation.en: Saturday.
translation.zh: 那是星期六。
translation.source: Saturday.
translation.medium: 在星期六.
translation.reference: 那是星期六。

translation.en: We were working till past 1am.
translation.zh: 我们都工作到了凌晨 1 点多。
translation.source: We were working till past 1am.
translation.medium: 我们工作到凌晨1点.
translation.reference: 我们都工作到了凌晨 1 点多。

translation.en: I quit the next day.
translation.zh: 第二天我就辞职了。
translation.source: I quit the next day.
translation.medium: 我在第二天辞职了.
translation.reference: 第二天我就辞职了。

translation.en: Best way to lose a new young worker, by shocking them with that.
translation.zh: 要说什么是失去年轻员工的最好办法，就是这一招。
translation.source: Best way to lose a new young worker, by shocking them with that.
translation.medium: 失去年轻工人的最好方法就是用这种方式给他们带来冲击.
translation.reference: 要说什么是失去年轻员工的最好办法，就是这一招。

translation.en: Same happened to my friend after I had been working with Pizza Hut for a couple years (didn't make me close until months after I started working and trained up), got him a job there on the spot.
translation.zh: 同样的事情也发生在我的朋友身上，我在必胜客工作了几年（直到我工作和培训几个月后才让我上班到打烊），他也在必胜客找了一份工作。
translation.source: Same happened to my friend after I had been working with Pizza Hut for a couple years (didn't make me close until months after I started working and trained up), got him a job there on the spot.
translation.medium: 我在Pizza Hut工作了几年之后, 我的朋友也发生了同样的事情 (直到我开始工作和接受培训几个月后,
translation.reference: 同样的事情也发生在我的朋友身上，我在必胜客工作了几年（直到我工作和培训几个月后才让我上班到打烊），他也在必胜客找了一份工作。

translation.en: They proceeded to put him on two closes in a row.
translation.zh: 他们让他连续两天工作到打烊。
translation.source: They proceeded to put him on two closes in a row.
translation.medium: 他们接着把他连续两次关闭.
translation.reference: 他们让他连续两天工作到打烊。

translation.en: He quit.
translation.zh: 他辞职了。
translation.source: He quit.
translation.medium: 他已经辞职了.
translation.reference: 他辞职了。

translation.en: Unless you advertise a job as a closing gig late at night, expect to lose your workers if you hit them with it too early.
translation.zh: 除非你的职位描述里说了要工作到深夜打烊，否则如果过早出这一招，你就得做好失去员工的准备。
translation.source: Unless you advertise a job as a closing gig late at night, expect to lose your workers if you hit them with it too early.
translation.medium: 除非你在晚上宣传一份工作,
translation.reference: 除非你的职位描述里说了要工作到深夜打烊，否则如果过早出这一招，你就得做好失去员工的准备。

translation.en: I can see that you've ordered from a restaurant that does their own delivery.
translation.zh: 我知道您从一家自己送餐的餐厅点餐了。
translation.source: I can see that you've ordered from a restaurant that does their own delivery.
translation.medium: 我可以看到你已经从餐厅订购了他们自己的送货.
translation.reference: 我知道您从一家自己送餐的餐厅点餐了。

translation.en: They have accepted your order which is #PRS_ORG#.
translation.zh: 他们已经接受您的订单，编号是 #PRS_ORG#。
translation.source: They have accepted your order which is #PRS_ORG#.
translation.medium: 他们已经接受了你的订单#PRS_ORG#.
translation.reference: 他们已经接受您的订单，编号是 #PRS_ORG#。

translation.en: The restaurant called you and they do not have the item that you ordered?
translation.zh: 餐厅打电话给您，说没有您点的菜？
translation.source: The restaurant called you and they do not have the item that you ordered?
translation.medium: 餐厅打电话给你,他们没有你订购的物品?
translation.reference: 餐厅打电话给您，说没有您点的菜？

translation.en: Regrettably this is currently out of stock, I will just see if this is returning.
translation.zh: 很遗憾，这款商品目录缺货，我看看会不会补货。
translation.source: Regrettably this is currently out of stock, I will just see if this is returning.
translation.medium: 遗憾的是,它目前已经缺货,
translation.reference: 很遗憾，这款商品目录缺货，我看看会不会补货。

translation.en: Please bear with me a moment
translation.zh: 请等一下
translation.source: Please bear with me a moment
translation.medium: 请耐心对待我一会儿
translation.reference: 请等一下

translation.en: This has been discontinued so will not be returning to stock, we do apologize.
translation.zh: 这款产品已经停产，所以无法补货，很抱歉。
translation.source: This has been discontinued so will not be returning to stock, we do apologize.
translation.medium: 这种产品已经停产, 所以不会再回归库存, 我们真的很抱歉.
translation.reference: 这款产品已经停产，所以无法补货，很抱歉。

translation.en: Boris Johnson teeters on edge of favour with Tory MPs
translation.zh: 鲍里斯·约翰逊 (Boris Johnson) 在保守党议员的支持边缘徘徊
translation.source: Boris Johnson teeters on edge of favour with Tory MPs
translation.medium: 里斯·约翰逊在保守党议员的支持边缘
translation.reference: 鲍里斯·约翰逊 (Boris Johnson) 在保守党议员的支持边缘徘徊

translation.en: Boris Johnson has long been considered a king of comebacks.
translation.zh: 鲍里斯·约翰逊一直被认为是复出之王。
translation.source: Boris Johnson has long been considered a king of comebacks.
translation.medium: 里斯·约翰逊长期以来一直被认为是复出之王.
translation.reference: 鲍里斯·约翰逊一直被认为是复出之王。

translation.en: And some Tory MPs hope he'll continue that streak by managing to rescue himself from plummeting poll ratings in the wake of a string of Downing Street parties in defiance of Covid laws.
translation.zh: 一些保守党议员希望他能继续这一势头，设法挽回在唐宁街举行一系列无视新冠肺炎法律的派对后民调支持率直线下降的局面。
translation.source: And some Tory MPs hope he'll continue that streak by managing to rescue himself from plummeting poll ratings in the wake of a string of Downing Street parties in defiance of Covid laws.
translation.medium: 一些保守党议员希望他能继续保持这一趋势, 在一系列无视COVID法规的唐宁街派对之后,
translation.reference: 一些保守党议员希望他能继续这一势头，设法挽回在唐宁街举行一系列无视新冠肺炎法律的派对后民调支持率直线下降的局面。

translation.en: The prime minister had tangled himself in knots by repeatedly denying any rules were broken before more reports and evidence emerged to suggest the opposite.
translation.zh: 在没有更多对他不利的报道和证据出来之前，他一再否认违反了任何规定，这让他自己陷入了困境。
translation.source: The prime minister had tangled himself in knots by repeatedly denying any rules were broken before more reports and evidence emerged to suggest the opposite.
translation.medium: 在更多报告和证据出现之前, 总理一再否认任何规则被打破,
translation.reference: 在没有更多对他不利的报道和证据出来之前，他一再否认违反了任何规定，这让他自己陷入了困境。

translation.en: First there was the video of No 10 aides laughing while they discussed a Christmas gathering on 18 December last year.
translation.zh: 最先爆出来的是去年 12 月 18 日他的助手们在唐宁街 10 号讨论圣诞聚会时开怀大笑的视频。
translation.source: First there was the video of No 10 aides laughing while they discussed a Christmas gathering on 18 December last year.
translation.medium: 首先是在去年12月18日举行的圣诞聚会上,
translation.reference: 最先爆出来的是去年 12 月 18 日他的助手们在唐宁街 10 号讨论圣诞聚会时开怀大笑的视频。

translation.en: Then Dominic Cummings, once Johnson's closest adviser, promised pictures had been taken of parties, and so with bated breath critics of the government waited for them to surface.
translation.zh: 后来，约翰逊最亲密的顾问多米尼克·卡明斯 (Dominic Cummings) 表示已经拍下了派对的照片，因此政府的批评者们屏息以待这些照片浮出水面。
translation.source: Then Dominic Cummings, once Johnson's closest adviser, promised pictures had been taken of parties, and so with bated breath critics of the government waited for them to surface.
translation.medium: 然后Dominic Cummings, 曾经是约翰逊最亲密的顾问,
translation.reference: 后来，约翰逊最亲密的顾问多米尼克·卡明斯 (Dominic Cummings) 表示已经拍下了派对的照片，因此政府的批评者们屏息以待这些照片浮出水面。

translation.en: When an image was published on Sunday showing Johnson on a screen hosting a Christmas quiz for staffers tuning in from No 10 and at home, it was not quite the smoking gun some thought would finally skewer him, however.
translation.zh: 周日发布的一张照片显示，约翰逊正在屏幕上为在唐宁街 10 号和在家里收看的工作人员主持一个圣诞问答会，然而，有些人认为这张照片并不是能够刺痛他的铁证。
translation.source: When an image was published on Sunday showing Johnson on a screen hosting a Christmas quiz for staffers tuning in from No 10 and at home, it was not quite the smoking gun some thought would finally skewer him, however.
translation.medium: 不过,当周日公布了一张照片, 显示约翰逊在屏幕上为工作人员举办圣诞问答,
translation.reference: 周日发布的一张照片显示，约翰逊正在屏幕上为在唐宁街 10 号和在家里收看的工作人员主持一个圣诞问答会，然而，有些人认为这张照片并不是能够刺痛他的铁证。

translation.en: The Sunday Mirror image shows Johnson with two aides who were dressed up with tinsel and a Santa hat - not socially distanced from one another, and clearly engaged in a social occasion while mixing households.
translation.zh: 在《星期日镜报》的照片中，约翰逊和两名助手穿着金光闪闪的衣服，戴着圣诞老人的帽子，他们彼此之间并没有社交距离，显然是在参加一个有多个家庭出席的社交场合。
translation.source: The Sunday Mirror image shows Johnson with two aides who were dressed up with tinsel and a Santa hat - not socially distanced from one another, and clearly engaged in a social occasion while mixing households.
translation.medium: "星期日镜报"的图片显示约翰逊与两名助手一起穿着花和圣诞老人的帽子 - - 没有彼此保持社交距离,并且在混合家庭的同时显然参与了社交活动.
translation.reference: 在《星期日镜报》的照片中，约翰逊和两名助手穿着金光闪闪的衣服，戴着圣诞老人的帽子，他们彼此之间并没有社交距离，显然是在参加一个有多个家庭出席的社交场合。

translation.en: But it could have been worse.
translation.zh: 但情况本可能更糟。
translation.source: But it could have been worse.
translation.medium: 但它可能会更糟.
translation.reference: 但情况本可能更糟。

translation.en: There have been other parties hosted in No 10 and Conservative party headquarters in which people drank copious amounts of alcohol, played party games, exchanged secret Santa gifts and socialised into the small hours, sources have told media outlets including the Guardian, Mirror, BBC and Times.
translation.zh: 有消息人士告诉《卫报》、《镜报》、英国广播公司和《泰晤士报》等媒体，在唐宁街 10 号和保守党总部举行的其他派对上，人们喝了很多酒，玩派对游戏，交换秘密的圣诞礼物，一直社交到凌晨。
translation.source: There have been other parties hosted in No 10 and Conservative party headquarters in which people drank copious amounts of alcohol, played party games, exchanged secret Santa gifts and socialised into the small hours, sources have told media outlets including the Guardian, Mirror, BBC and Times.
translation.medium: 据消息人士透露, 在No10和保守党总部举办的其他派对中, 人们喝了大量的酒精, 玩了派对游戏, 交换了秘密的圣诞老人礼物,
translation.reference: 有消息人士告诉《卫报》、《镜报》、英国广播公司和《泰晤士报》等媒体，在唐宁街 10 号和保守党总部举行的其他派对上，人们喝了很多酒，玩派对游戏，交换秘密的圣诞礼物，一直社交到凌晨。

translation.en: Ministers will quietly breath a sigh of relief no pictures of these scenes have been leaked - yet.
translation.zh: 不过，部长们可以松一口气了，因为这些场景的照片还没有被披露出来。
translation.source: Ministers will quietly breath a sigh of relief no pictures of these scenes have been leaked - yet.
translation.medium: 部长们将安静地叹了口气, 这些场景的照片尚未泄露.
translation.reference: 不过，部长们可以松一口气了，因为这些场景的照片还没有被披露出来。

translation.en: While Johnson's attendance at the quiz broke the rules, according to Keir Starmer, the Labour leader and a former director of public prosecutions, Tory MPs think people will look at the photo and judge that it really shows him hosting a virtual quiz - a familiar sight during the pandemic.
translation.zh: 据工党领袖、前检察长基尔•斯塔默 (Keir Starmer) 表示，约翰逊参加问答会违反了规定，但保守党议员认为，人们看到照片后会判断，这真的是他在主持一个虚拟问答会，而这是疫情期间常见的一幕。
translation.source: While Johnson's attendance at the quiz broke the rules, according to Keir Starmer, the Labour leader and a former director of public prosecutions, Tory MPs think people will look at the photo and judge that it really shows him hosting a virtual quiz - a familiar sight during the pandemic.
translation.medium: 根据工党领袖和前检察长Keir Starmer的说法,虽然约翰逊参加了测试违反了规则,但保守党议员们认为人们会看这张照片并判断它真的显示他主持虚拟测试 - - 这在疫情期间是一个熟悉的景象.
translation.reference: 据工党领袖、前检察长基尔•斯塔默 (Keir Starmer) 表示，约翰逊参加问答会违反了规定，但保守党议员认为，人们看到照片后会判断，这真的是他在主持一个虚拟问答会，而这是疫情期间常见的一幕。

translation.en: The staff, dialling in from other rooms in No 10 while drinking and not socially distancing, cannot be seen.
translation.zh: 在唐宁街 10 号喝酒时在其他房间打电话和没有保持社交距离的工作人员没有被曝光出来。
translation.source: The staff, dialling in from other rooms in No 10 while drinking and not socially distancing, cannot be seen.
translation.medium: 工作人员在喝酒时从10号其他房间拨打电话, 没有保持社交距离, 无法看到.
translation.reference: 在唐宁街 10 号喝酒时在其他房间打电话和没有保持社交距离的工作人员没有被曝光出来。

translation.en: On Sunday Nadhim Zahawi insisted the picture was just an example of Johnson "thanking his staff" and used it to play down the party scandal as "hype."
translation.zh: 周日，纳齐姆·扎哈维 (Nadhim Zahawi) 坚称，这张照片只是约翰逊“感谢他的工作人员”的一个例子，并用它来把保守党的丑闻淡化为“炒作”。
translation.source: On Sunday Nadhim Zahawi insisted the picture was just an example of Johnson "thanking his staff" and used it to play down the party scandal as "hype."
translation.medium: 周日Nadhim Zahawi坚持认为这张照片只是约翰逊"感谢他的工作人员"的一个例子,
translation.reference: 周日，纳齐姆·扎哈维 (Nadhim Zahawi) 坚称，这张照片只是约翰逊“感谢他的工作人员”的一个例子，并用它来把保守党的丑闻淡化为“炒作”。

translation.en: He told LBC: "On that front page, I think your listeners will look at that and see a PM in his office, with the two close people that work with him, with no alcohol, taking 10 to 15 minutes to thank and motivate his staff, who have been coming in because they can't work from home."
translation.zh: 他告诉 LBC：“我认为，你的听众会在封面上看到首相在他的办公室，旁边有两个关系密切的工作人员，他们没有喝酒，他用了 10 到 15 分钟感谢并激励他的员工，而他们在场，是因为他们不能居家工作。”
translation.source: He told LBC: "On that front page, I think your listeners will look at that and see a PM in his office, with the two close people that work with him, with no alcohol, taking 10 to 15 minutes to thank and motivate his staff, who have been coming in because they can't work from home."
translation.medium: 他告诉LBC:"在头版上,我认为你的听众会看到一个总理在他的办公室, 两个与他工作的亲密的人, 没有酒精, 花10到15分钟感谢和激励他的员工, 因为他们不能在家工作. "
translation.reference: 他告诉 LBC：“我认为，你的听众会在封面上看到首相在他的办公室，旁边有两个关系密切的工作人员，他们没有喝酒，他用了 10 到 15 分钟感谢并激励他的员工，而他们在场，是因为他们不能居家工作。”

translation.en: Much damage has already been done, with mutinous MPs furious at the prime minister allowing a "one rule for them" narrative to take hold, from Cummings to Matt Hancock and more recently Owen Paterson.
translation.zh: 从卡明斯到马特·汉考克，再到最近的欧文·帕特森，反对首相的议员们对他的“只许州官放火”的说法感到愤怒，这已经造成了很大的损害。
translation.source: Much damage has already been done, with mutinous MPs furious at the prime minister allowing a "one rule for them" narrative to take hold, from Cummings to Matt Hancock and more recently Owen Paterson.
translation.medium: 从卡明斯到马特·汉考克以及最近的欧文·帕特森,
translation.reference: 从卡明斯到马特·汉考克，再到最近的欧文·帕特森，反对首相的议员们对他的“只许州官放火”的说法感到愤怒，这已经造成了很大的损害。

translation.en: Johnson is teetering on the edge of favour with his own MPs; if further photos surface, they may push him over the edge.
translation.zh: 约翰逊在保守党中受到的支持正摇摇欲坠；如果有更多的照片浮出水面，他可能会被推到边缘。
translation.source: Johnson is teetering on the edge of favour with his own MPs; if further photos surface, they may push him over the edge.
translation.medium: 如果进一步的照片出现, 他们可能会把他推到边缘.
translation.reference: 约翰逊在保守党中受到的支持正摇摇欲坠；如果有更多的照片浮出水面，他可能会被推到边缘。

translation.en: As I can see here this rider came to your location at 12:39. he try to deliver this order until 12:52.
translation.zh: 我看到这名骑手在 12 点 39 分到达您所在的位置。在 12 点 52 分之前，他是想把您的订餐送到。
translation.source: As I can see here this rider came to your location at 12:39. he try to deliver this order until 12:52.
translation.medium: 这位骑士在12:39到达您的位置. 他试图在12:52之前交付这份订单.
translation.reference: 我看到这名骑手在 12 点 39 分到达您所在的位置。在 12 点 52 分之前，他是想把您的订餐送到。

translation.en: The rider try to leave the order on the Security but he did not accept it.
translation.zh: 这名骑手想把您的订餐放在保安那，但被拒绝了。
translation.source: The rider try to leave the order on the Security but he did not accept it.
translation.medium: 骑手试图在安全上留下命令, 但他没有接受它.
translation.reference: 这名骑手想把您的订餐放在保安那，但被拒绝了。

translation.en: That is why the order was taken by the rider as he goes.
translation.zh: 所以他又把您的订餐带走了。
translation.source: That is why the order was taken by the rider as he goes.
translation.medium: 这就是为什么骑手在行走时接受命令的原因.
translation.reference: 所以他又把您的订餐带走了。

translation.en: Long queues for Banksy's shirts supporting statue-toppling protesters
translation.zh: 为支持推翻雕像的抗议者，人们排长队购买班克西 (Banksy) 设计的衬衫
translation.source: Long queues for Banksy's shirts supporting statue-toppling protesters
translation.medium: 长长的队列为班克西的衫支持雕像倾倒的抗议者
translation.reference: 为支持推翻雕像的抗议者，人们排长队购买班克西 (Banksy) 设计的衬衫

translation.en: Crowds desperate to buy shirts designed by the mysterious street artist Banksy have been seen in Bristol, UK.
translation.zh: 在英国的布里斯托尔，为了支持在“黑人的命也是命”(BLM) 游行中推翻奴隶贸易商雕像的抗议者，
translation.source: Crowds desperate to buy shirts designed by the mysterious street artist Banksy have been seen in Bristol, UK.
translation.medium: 在英国布里斯托尔看到一群人拼命购买神秘街头艺术家班克西设计的衫.
translation.reference: 在英国的布里斯托尔，为了支持在“黑人的命也是命”(BLM) 游行中推翻奴隶贸易商雕像的抗议者，

translation.en: They were released to support protesters on trial for toppling a slave trader statue during a Black Lives Matter march.
translation.zh: 人们争相购买神秘街头艺术家班克西设计的衬衫。
translation.source: They were released to support protesters on trial for toppling a slave trader statue during a Black Lives Matter march.
translation.medium: 他们被释放是为了支持在"黑人生命重要"游行中推翻奴隶贩子雕像的示威者.
translation.reference: 人们争相购买神秘街头艺术家班克西设计的衬衫。

translation.en: Banksy designed the limited edition "souvenir shirts" to mark the trial of four people charged with damaging a controversial statue in Bristol last year.
translation.zh: 为纪念去年被控破坏布里斯托尔一座有争议的雕像的四人受审案件，班克西设计了这款限量版“纪念衬衫”。
translation.source: Banksy designed the limited edition "souvenir shirts" to mark the trial of four people charged with damaging a controversial statue in Bristol last year.
translation.medium: 班克西设计了限量版的"纪念衫"来纪念去年在布里斯托尔破坏一座有争议的雕像的四人.
translation.reference: 为纪念去年被控破坏布里斯托尔一座有争议的雕像的四人受审案件，班克西设计了这款限量版“纪念衬衫”。

translation.en: "All proceeds to the defendants so they can go for a pint," the artist wrote on Instagram.
translation.zh: “所有收益都赠予被告，这样他们就可以去喝一杯了，”这位艺术家在 Instagram 上写道。
translation.source: "All proceeds to the defendants so they can go for a pint," the artist wrote on Instagram.
translation.medium: 这位艺术家在Instagram上写道:
translation.reference: “所有收益都赠予被告，这样他们就可以去喝一杯了，”这位艺术家在 Instagram 上写道。

translation.en: Sold for £25 ($33) plus VAT and limited to only one item per person at several shops, the shirt has been in such demand that people queued around blocks to get it.
translation.zh: 这款衬衫的售价为 25 英镑（33 美元），外加增值税，几家商店要求每人限购一件，由于供不应求，有些人在几个街区排队后才买到。
translation.source: Sold for £25 ($33) plus VAT and limited to only one item per person at several shops, the shirt has been in such demand that people queued around blocks to get it.
translation.medium: 这件衫售价25英 (33美元) 加增值税, 在几个商店里每人只能买一件,
translation.reference: 这款衬衫的售价为 25 英镑（33 美元），外加增值税，几家商店要求每人限购一件，由于供不应求，有些人在几个街区排队后才买到。

translation.en: An almost two-minute long video posted on Twitter shows an endless line of customers.
translation.zh: 在推特上发布的一段近两分钟长的视频显示，购买衬衫的顾客排起了长龙。
translation.source: An almost two-minute long video posted on Twitter shows an endless line of customers.
translation.medium: 在推特上发布的一段近两分钟长的视频中,
translation.reference: 在推特上发布的一段近两分钟长的视频显示，购买衬衫的顾客排起了长龙。

translation.en: UK media reported that "thousands" were eager to raise cash for the protesters by purchasing the gray T-shirt, which depicts an empty plinth with "Bristol" written above it.
translation.zh: 据英国媒体报道，“数千人”急于购买这款灰色 T 恤，为抗议者筹集资金，T 恤上画着一个空底座，上面写着“布里斯托尔”。
translation.source: UK media reported that "thousands" were eager to raise cash for the protesters by purchasing the gray T-shirt, which depicts an empty plinth with "Bristol" written above it.
translation.medium: 据英国媒体报道, "成千上万的人"渴望通过购买灰色T恤来为抗议者筹集资金,
translation.reference: 据英国媒体报道，“数千人”急于购买这款灰色 T 恤，为抗议者筹集资金，T 恤上画着一个空底座，上面写着“布里斯托尔”。

translation.en: It refers to a toppled bronze memorial to the 17th century merchant Edward Colston, who was involved in the transatlantic slave trade.
translation.zh: 这个底座意寓已被推倒的为 17 世纪参与了跨大西洋奴隶贸易的商人爱德华·科尔斯顿 (Edward Colston) 而建的青铜纪念碑。
translation.source: It refers to a toppled bronze memorial to the 17th century merchant Edward Colston, who was involved in the transatlantic slave trade.
translation.medium: 它指的是17世纪商人爱德华·科尔斯顿 (Edward Colston) 的塌的青铜纪念碑,
translation.reference: 这个底座意寓已被推倒的为 17 世纪参与了跨大西洋奴隶贸易的商人爱德华·科尔斯顿 (Edward Colston) 而建的青铜纪念碑。

translation.en: The activists, known as the "Colston Four," are facing a trial at Bristol Crown Court next week, charged with inflicting criminal damage to a monument belonging to the city council.
translation.zh: 这些被称为“科尔斯顿四人组”的活动人士将于下周在布里斯托尔刑事法庭接受审判，他们被控对属于市议会的一座纪念碑造成刑事毁坏。
translation.source: The activists, known as the "Colston Four," are facing a trial at Bristol Crown Court next week, charged with inflicting criminal damage to a monument belonging to the city council.
translation.medium: 活动人士被称为"科尔斯顿四人", 下周将在布里斯托尔皇家法院面临审判,
translation.reference: 这些被称为“科尔斯顿四人组”的活动人士将于下周在布里斯托尔刑事法庭接受审判，他们被控对属于市议会的一座纪念碑造成刑事毁坏。

translation.en: The men - who have all pleaded not guilty - are accused of sinking the statue "without lawful excuse."
translation.zh: 这四名男子拒不认罪，他们被指控“没有合法理由”就将雕像沉到了水下。
translation.source: The men - who have all pleaded not guilty - are accused of sinking the statue "without lawful excuse."
translation.medium: 他们被指控"没有合法借口"将雕像沉没.
translation.reference: 这四名男子拒不认罪，他们被指控“没有合法理由”就将雕像沉到了水下。

translation.en: Praised by some for leaving money to various charitable causes after his death, the controversial trader's statue was attacked in June 2020, when a protest supporting the Black Lives Matter (BLM) movement was happening in the city.
translation.zh: 贸易商爱德华·科尔斯顿饱受争议，有些人称赞他死后为各种慈善事业留下了资金，他的雕像在 2020 年 6 月遭到毁坏，当时该市正在举行一场支持“黑人的命也是命”(BLM) 运动的抗议活动。
translation.source: Praised by some for leaving money to various charitable causes after his death, the controversial trader's statue was attacked in June 2020, when a protest supporting the Black Lives Matter (BLM) movement was happening in the city.
translation.medium: 这位有争议的商人的雕像在2020年6月遭到袭击,当时在该市举行了一场支持黑人生命重要 (BLM) 运动的抗议活动.
translation.reference: 贸易商爱德华·科尔斯顿饱受争议，有些人称赞他死后为各种慈善事业留下了资金，他的雕像在 2020 年 6 月遭到毁坏，当时该市正在举行一场支持“黑人的命也是命”(BLM) 运动的抗议活动。

translation.en: The damaged plinth and graffitied statue was later recovered by the city council from Bristol Harbour, where it was thrown during the unrest, and re-emerged as a local museum exhibit, alongside a curated selection of BLM posters from the march.
translation.zh: 在骚乱期间，这尊雕像底座受损，雕像本身被涂鸦并被推进了布里斯托尔港口，后来被市议会从布里斯托尔港捞出来，并把它与 BLM 游行海报一起放在当地博物馆里。
translation.source: The damaged plinth and graffitied statue was later recovered by the city council from Bristol Harbour, where it was thrown during the unrest, and re-emerged as a local museum exhibit, alongside a curated selection of BLM posters from the march.
translation.medium: 这座受损的基座和涂的雕像后来被布里斯托尔港市议会收回,在骚乱期间被扔到那里,并作为当地博物馆展品重新出现,与游行中的BLM海报一起.
translation.reference: 在骚乱期间，这尊雕像底座受损，雕像本身被涂鸦并被推进了布里斯托尔港口，后来被市议会从布里斯托尔港捞出来，并把它与 BLM 游行海报一起放在当地博物馆里。

translation.en: A sculpture of a BLM protester was erected on the empty plinth previously occupied by Colston.
translation.zh: 现在，放在底座上的是一名 BLM 抗议者的雕塑。
translation.source: A sculpture of a BLM protester was erected on the empty plinth previously occupied by Colston.
translation.medium: 一个BLM抗议者的雕塑被立在以前由科尔斯顿占据的空脚架上.
translation.reference: 现在，放在底座上的是一名 BLM 抗议者的雕塑。

translation.en: Joe Biden Laments Failure to Stop Global Warming After Deadly Tornados
translation.zh: 致命龙卷风过后，乔·拜登哀叹未能阻止全球变暖
translation.source: Joe Biden Laments Failure to Stop Global Warming After Deadly Tornados
translation.medium: 乔·拜登对致命龙卷风造成的全球变暖失败表示遗憾
translation.reference: 致命龙卷风过后，乔·拜登哀叹未能阻止全球变暖

translation.en: President Joe Biden lamented the world's failure to stop global warming on Saturday after addressing the deadly tornadoes that swept through several states.
translation.zh: 周六，美国总统乔·拜登 (Joe Biden) 就席卷了美国几个州的致命龙卷风发表讲话，对未能阻止全球变暖表示遗憾。
translation.source: President Joe Biden lamented the world's failure to stop global warming on Saturday after addressing the deadly tornadoes that swept through several states.
translation.medium: 美国总统乔·拜登在周六对几州发生的致命龙卷风发表讲话后, 哀叹世界未能阻止全球变暖.
translation.reference: 周六，美国总统乔·拜登 (Joe Biden) 就席卷了美国几个州的致命龙卷风发表讲话，对未能阻止全球变暖表示遗憾。

translation.en: "We all know that everything is more intense when the climate is warming.
translation.zh: “我们都知道，当气候变暖时，一切都会变得更加严重。
translation.source: "We all know that everything is more intense when the climate is warming.
translation.medium: "我们都知道, 当气候变暖时, 一切都变得更加激烈.
translation.reference: “我们都知道，当气候变暖时，一切都会变得更加严重。

translation.en: Everything," he said.
translation.zh: 一切,”他说。
translation.source: Everything," he said.
translation.medium: 他表示:
translation.reference: 一切,”他说。

translation.en: "And obviously it has some impact here."
translation.zh: “显然它在这里产生了一些影响。”
translation.source: "And obviously it has some impact here."
translation.medium: "这显然对我们产生了一些影响.
translation.reference: “显然它在这里产生了一些影响。”

translation.en: At least 30 tornadoes were reported across six different states causing widespread devastation, and over 100 people are expected killed from the storm.
translation.zh: 据报道，至少有 30 场龙卷风席卷了六个州，造成大面积破坏，预计超过 100 人死于这场风暴。
translation.source: At least 30 tornadoes were reported across six different states causing widespread devastation, and over 100 people are expected killed from the storm.
translation.medium: 至少有30个龙卷风在六个不同的州造成广泛的破坏, 预计有100多人死于这场风暴.
translation.reference: 据报道，至少有 30 场龙卷风席卷了六个州，造成大面积破坏，预计超过 100 人死于这场风暴。

translation.en: The president said he did not know the full extent of global warming's contribution to the deadly storms, which he described as one of the "largest tornado outbreaks in history."
translation.zh: 总统说，他不知道全球变暖对这场致命风暴的影响程度，他称这是“历史上最大的龙卷风暴之一”。
translation.source: The president said he did not know the full extent of global warming's contribution to the deadly storms, which he described as one of the "largest tornado outbreaks in history."
translation.medium: 总统说他不知道全球变暖对致命风暴的贡献有多大, 他将其描述为"历史上最大的龙卷风爆发"之一.
translation.reference: 总统说，他不知道全球变暖对这场致命风暴的影响程度，他称这是“历史上最大的龙卷风暴之一”。

translation.en: He said he would get the Environmental Protection Agency to investigate.
translation.zh: 他说他会让环境保护局展开调查。
translation.source: He said he would get the Environmental Protection Agency to investigate.
translation.medium: 他说他会让环境保护局进行调查.
translation.reference: 他说他会让环境保护局展开调查。

translation.en: "All that I know is that the intensity of the weather across the board has some impact as a consequence of the warming of the planet," Biden said.
translation.zh: 拜登说:“我所知道的是，由于地球变暖，各地天气的强度都受到了一定的影响。”
translation.source: "All that I know is that the intensity of the weather across the board has some impact as a consequence of the warming of the planet," Biden said.
translation.medium: 拜登说:"我所知道的是,天气的强度会对全球变暖产生一些影响.
translation.reference: 拜登说:“我所知道的是，由于地球变暖，各地天气的强度都受到了一定的影响。”

translation.en: The president praised the reporter who asked him about climate change.
translation.zh: 总统赞扬了问他关于气候变化问题的记者。
translation.source: The president praised the reporter who asked him about climate change.
translation.medium: 总统赞扬了那位问他气候变化问题的记者.
translation.reference: 总统赞扬了问他关于气候变化问题的记者。

translation.en: "As usual, you ask always the best question," he said with a wry chuckle.
translation.zh: “跟平时一样，你总是问最好的问题，”他苦笑着说。
translation.source: "As usual, you ask always the best question," he said with a wry chuckle.
translation.medium: "像往常一样,你总是问最好的问题",他说一个刺的笑声.
translation.reference: “跟平时一样，你总是问最好的问题，”他苦笑着说。

translation.en: "How are we going to handle this?" he continued.
translation.zh: “我们要怎么处理这件事？”他继续说。
translation.source: "How are we going to handle this?" he continued.
translation.medium: 他继续说道:"我们该怎么办呢?
translation.reference: “我们要怎么处理这件事？”他继续说。

translation.en: "Part of it is acknowledging that the likelihood of fewer weather catastrophes, absent of continued movement on dealing with global warming, it's just not going to happen."
translation.zh: “首先要知道，我们是有可能减少气候灾难的，前提是要持续采取行动来应对全球变暖。”
translation.source: "Part of it is acknowledging that the likelihood of fewer weather catastrophes, absent of continued movement on dealing with global warming, it's just not going to happen."
translation.medium: 部分原因是承认天气灾难减少的可能性, 没有持续的行动来应对全球变暖, 这将不会发生.
translation.reference: “首先要知道，我们是有可能减少气候灾难的，前提是要持续采取行动来应对全球变暖。”

translation.en: Biden said he was shocked by the record wildfires in the country during 2021, expressing alarm that global warming was a major contribution.
translation.zh: 拜登表示，他对 2021 年美国创纪录的野火感到震惊，并表示全球变暖是主要原因。
translation.source: Biden said he was shocked by the record wildfires in the country during 2021, expressing alarm that global warming was a major contribution.
translation.medium: 拜登表示,他对2021年该国创纪录的野火感到震惊,并表示全球变暖是其中的主要原因.
translation.reference: 拜登表示，他对 2021 年美国创纪录的野火感到震惊，并表示全球变暖是主要原因。

translation.en: "So we have to act," he said.
translation.zh: “所以我们必须采取行动，”他说。
translation.source: "So we have to act," he said.
translation.medium: "所以我们必须采取行动",他说.
translation.reference: “所以我们必须采取行动，”他说。

translation.en: Biden said the first step was to save lives and care for the families who were affected by the storms.
translation.zh: 拜登说，第一步是拯救生命，照顾受风暴影响的家庭。
translation.source: Biden said the first step was to save lives and care for the families who were affected by the storms.
translation.medium: 拜登说,第一步是拯救生命并照顾受风暴影响的家庭.
translation.reference: 拜登说，第一步是拯救生命，照顾受风暴影响的家庭。

translation.en: "I promise you.
translation.zh: “我承诺。
translation.source: "I promise you.
translation.medium: "我向你保证.
translation.reference: “我承诺。

translation.en: Whatever is needed.
translation.zh: 不管需要什么，
translation.source: Whatever is needed.
translation.medium: 无论需要什么.
translation.reference: 不管需要什么，

translation.en: Whatever is needed, the federal government is going to supply it," Biden said.
translation.zh: 无论需要什么，联邦政府都会提供，”拜登说。
translation.source: Whatever is needed, the federal government is going to supply it," Biden said.
translation.medium: 无论需要什么,联邦政府都会提供",拜登说.
translation.reference: 无论需要什么，联邦政府都会提供，”拜登说。

translation.en: He said he would continue to monitor the storm recovery closely and do whatever was needed by the federal government.
translation.zh: 他说，他将继续密切关注风暴恢复情况，并采取联邦政府需要采取的任何措施。
translation.source: He said he would continue to monitor the storm recovery closely and do whatever was needed by the federal government.
translation.medium: 他说他将继续密切监视风暴的复苏,
translation.reference: 他说，他将继续密切关注风暴恢复情况，并采取联邦政府需要采取的任何措施。

translation.en: "I want folks in all these states to know.
translation.zh: “我想告诉这些州的所有民众，
translation.source: "I want folks in all these states to know.
translation.medium: "我希望所有这些州的人都知道.
translation.reference: “我想告诉这些州的所有民众，

translation.en: We're going to get through this.
translation.zh: 我们会扛过去的。
translation.source: We're going to get through this.
translation.medium: 我们将通过这一点.
translation.reference: 我们会扛过去的。

translation.en: We're going to get through this together and the federal government is not going to walk away," he said.
translation.zh: 我们将一起度过难关，联邦政府不会袖手旁观，”他说。
translation.source: We're going to get through this together and the federal government is not going to walk away," he said.
translation.medium: 联邦政府不会放弃", 他说.
translation.reference: 我们将一起度过难关，联邦政府不会袖手旁观，”他说。

translation.en: "This is one of those times when we aren't Democrats or Republicans."
translation.zh: “现在不应该是区分民主党人或共和党人的时候。”
translation.source: "This is one of those times when we aren't Democrats or Republicans."
translation.medium: "这是我们不是民主党人或共和党人的时刻之一.
translation.reference: “现在不应该是区分民主党人或共和党人的时候。”

translation.en: The president said he would visit the storm affected areas when it was clear he would not get in the way of local rescue efforts.
translation.zh: 总统表示，他将前往受风暴影响的地区，同时明确表示他不会妨碍当地的救援工作。
translation.source: The president said he would visit the storm affected areas when it was clear he would not get in the way of local rescue efforts.
translation.medium: 总统说他会访问受风暴影响的地区,
translation.reference: 总统表示，他将前往受风暴影响的地区，同时明确表示他不会妨碍当地的救援工作。

translation.en: "I do plan on going," he said.
translation.zh: “我确实打算去，”他说。
translation.source: "I do plan on going," he said.
translation.medium: "我确实打算去",他说.
translation.reference: “我确实打算去，”他说。

translation.en: You can come back any time as our chat service window is open 24/7
translation.zh: 我们的聊天服务窗口全年全天候开放，您可以随时回来
translation.source: You can come back any time as our chat service window is open 24/7
translation.medium: 您可以随时回来,因为我们的聊天服务窗口是24/7开放的
translation.reference: 我们的聊天服务窗口全年全天候开放，您可以随时回来

translation.en: I sincerely hope you get to find a resolution
translation.zh: 我真诚地祝您找到解决的办法
translation.source: I sincerely hope you get to find a resolution
translation.medium: 我真诚地希望你能找到一个解决方案
translation.reference: 我真诚地祝您找到解决的办法

translation.en: Thank you for contacting #PRS_ORG#, it was my pleasure to assist you today.
translation.zh: 感谢您联系 #PRS_ORG#，很高兴今天能帮到您。
translation.source: Thank you for contacting #PRS_ORG#, it was my pleasure to assist you today.
translation.medium: 感谢您与#PRS_ORG#联系, 很高兴今天能够协助您.
translation.reference: 感谢您联系 #PRS_ORG#，很高兴今天能帮到您。

translation.en: I hope you have an excellent evening.
translation.zh: 祝您度过一个愉快的夜晚。
translation.source: I hope you have an excellent evening.
translation.medium: 我希望你有一个很棒的晚上.
translation.reference: 祝您度过一个愉快的夜晚。

translation.en: I can see the details match.
translation.zh: 我看到细节都对的上。
translation.source: I can see the details match.
translation.medium: 我可以看到细节匹配.
translation.reference: 我看到细节都对的上。

translation.en: I am sorry but it seems your original order was accidentally spilled, that is why my colleague had to make a new order.
translation.zh: 很抱歉，看起来您原来订的餐不小心洒了，所以我的同事重新下了订单。
translation.source: I am sorry but it seems your original order was accidentally spilled, that is why my colleague had to make a new order.
translation.medium: 我很抱歉,但您的原始订单似乎不小心被泄漏了,这就是为什么我的同事不得不做一个新的订单.
translation.reference: 很抱歉，看起来您原来订的餐不小心洒了，所以我的同事重新下了订单。

translation.en: The new order is order #NUMBER# and it will be there in just 20 minutes.
translation.zh: 新订单号是 #NUMBER#，20 分钟后就能送到。
translation.source: The new order is order #NUMBER# and it will be there in just 20 minutes.
translation.medium: 新订单是#NUMBER#订单, 它将在20分钟内到达.
translation.reference: 新订单号是 #NUMBER#，20 分钟后就能送到。

translation.en: The rider is picking it up and will delivery asap.
translation.zh: 骑手正在取货，并会尽快送到。
translation.source: The rider is picking it up and will delivery asap.
translation.medium: 骑手正在拿起它,并将尽快交付.
translation.reference: 骑手正在取货，并会尽快送到。

translation.en: Wendy Rogers Calls New Zealand PM 'Lenin With Hair,' Claims 'Satanic Communists' in U.S.
translation.zh: 温迪·罗杰斯 (Wendy Rogers) 称新西兰总理是“留着头发的列宁”，呼吁美国警惕“邪恶的共产主义者”
translation.source: Wendy Rogers Calls New Zealand PM 'Lenin With Hair,' Claims 'Satanic Communists' in U.S.
translation.medium: 温迪·罗杰斯称新西兰总理为"头发的列宁",
translation.reference: 温迪·罗杰斯 (Wendy Rogers) 称新西兰总理是“留着头发的列宁”，呼吁美国警惕“邪恶的共产主义者”

translation.en: Republican Arizona Senator Wendy Rogers on Sunday called New Zealand's Prime Minister Jacinda Ardern "Lenin with Hair" and warned against communism in the United States.
translation.zh: 亚利桑那州共和党参议员温迪·罗杰斯周日称呼新西兰总理杰辛达·阿德恩 (Jacinda Ardern) 为“留着头发的列宁”，并警告美国警惕共产主义。
translation.source: Republican Arizona Senator Wendy Rogers on Sunday called New Zealand's Prime Minister Jacinda Ardern "Lenin with Hair" and warned against communism in the United States.
translation.medium: 共和党亚利桑那州参议员温迪·罗杰斯 (Wendy Rogers) 周日称新西兰总理贾辛达·阿德恩 (Jacinda Ardern) 是"头发的列宁",
translation.reference: 亚利桑那州共和党参议员温迪·罗杰斯周日称呼新西兰总理杰辛达·阿德恩 (Jacinda Ardern) 为“留着头发的列宁”，并警告美国警惕共产主义。

translation.en: Rogers appeared to be criticizing Ardern's COVID response as she referred to Soviet leader Vladimir Lenin in a Tweet she posted along with a short clip of the prime minister.
translation.zh: 罗杰斯似乎是在批评阿德恩对新冠肺炎的反应，她在推特上提到了苏联领导人弗拉基米尔·列宁 (Vladimir Lenin)，并附上了该总理的一段视频。
translation.source: Rogers appeared to be criticizing Ardern's COVID response as she referred to Soviet leader Vladimir Lenin in a Tweet she posted along with a short clip of the prime minister.
translation.medium: 罗杰斯似乎在批评阿德伦的COVID反应,因为她在推特上提到苏联领导人弗拉基米尔列宁,她发布了一段总理的短片.
translation.reference: 罗杰斯似乎是在批评阿德恩对新冠肺炎的反应，她在推特上提到了苏联领导人弗拉基米尔·列宁 (Vladimir Lenin)，并附上了该总理的一段视频。

translation.en: Rogers didn't further explain her criticism of Ardern in her Tweet.
translation.zh: 罗杰斯没有就她在推特上对阿德恩的批评进行解释。
translation.source: Rogers didn't further explain her criticism of Ardern in her Tweet.
translation.medium: 罗杰斯在推文中没有进一步解释她对阿德伦的批评.
translation.reference: 罗杰斯没有就她在推特上对阿德恩的批评进行解释。

translation.en: In the clip, Ardern was speaking about COVID misinformation and New Zealand's efforts to keep people informed about the pandemic.
translation.zh: 在视频中，阿德恩谈到了有关新冠病毒的错误信息，以及新西兰在帮助民众了解疫情方面作出的努力。
translation.source: In the clip, Ardern was speaking about COVID misinformation and New Zealand's efforts to keep people informed about the pandemic.
translation.medium: 在片段中,阿德伦谈到了COVID错误信息和新西兰努力让人们了解大流行病.
translation.reference: 在视频中，阿德恩谈到了有关新冠病毒的错误信息，以及新西兰在帮助民众了解疫情方面作出的努力。

translation.en: "More bold Christians are needed in office to counter the satanic Communists in both parties," the Arizona Senator wrote in another tweet on Sunday.
translation.zh: 周日，这位亚利桑那州参议员在另一条推文中写道:“政府需要更多大胆的基督徒来对抗两党中邪恶的共产党人。”
translation.source: "More bold Christians are needed in office to counter the satanic Communists in both parties," the Arizona Senator wrote in another tweet on Sunday.
translation.medium: 这位亚利桑那州参议员在周日的另一条推文中写道:"我们需要更多勇敢的基督徒来对抗两党的邪恶共产主义者.
translation.reference: 周日，这位亚利桑那州参议员在另一条推文中写道:“政府需要更多大胆的基督徒来对抗两党中邪恶的共产党人。”

translation.en: Her Tweet was met with ridicule from different social media users, with one person tweeting back: "Please offer your definitions of Communism and Christianity, because I don't think you understand either."
translation.zh: 她的推文遭到了不同社交媒体用户的嘲笑，其中一人回复道：“请给出你对共产主义和基督教的定义，因为我认为你也不懂。”
translation.source: Her Tweet was met with ridicule from different social media users, with one person tweeting back: "Please offer your definitions of Communism and Christianity, because I don't think you understand either."
translation.medium: 她的推文遭到了不同社交媒体用户的嘲笑, 一位推文回复说:"请提供你对共产主义和基督教的定义,
translation.reference: 她的推文遭到了不同社交媒体用户的嘲笑，其中一人回复道：“请给出你对共产主义和基督教的定义，因为我认为你也不懂。”

translation.en: "I see that Wendy is going all out today, trying to compete with the craziest of the crazy," another person tweeted.
translation.zh: 另一个人在推特上写道:“我看到温迪今天全力以赴，试图与最疯狂的人竞争。”
translation.source: "I see that Wendy is going all out today, trying to compete with the craziest of the crazy," another person tweeted.
translation.medium: "我看到温迪今天全力以赴, 试图与最疯狂的疯子竞争",
translation.reference: 另一个人在推特上写道:“我看到温迪今天全力以赴，试图与最疯狂的人竞争。”

translation.en: Rogers has been vocal about her stance against communism before on social media.
translation.zh: 罗杰斯此前曾在社交媒体上公开表达过她反对共产主义的立场。
translation.source: Rogers has been vocal about her stance against communism before on social media.
translation.medium: 罗杰斯之前在社交媒体上公开表达了她反对共产主义的立场.
translation.reference: 罗杰斯此前曾在社交媒体上公开表达过她反对共产主义的立场。

translation.en: In September, she called Labor Day a "Communist Holiday" without further explanation.
translation.zh: 9 月，她称劳动节为“共产主义节日”，但没有进一步解释。
translation.source: In September, she called Labor Day a "Communist Holiday" without further explanation.
translation.medium: 在没有进一步解释的情况下, 她称劳动节为"共产主义节日".
translation.reference: 9 月，她称劳动节为“共产主义节日”，但没有进一步解释。

translation.en: Her tweet was mocked among social media users, including The Arizona House Democrats, who replied: "Says the heart and soul of Arizona's Republican Party (prove us wrong)."
translation.zh: 她的推文遭到了社交媒体用户的嘲笑，包括亚利桑那州众议院民主党人，他们回应道：“这是亚利桑那州共和党的心声（证明我们错了）。”
translation.source: Her tweet was mocked among social media users, including The Arizona House Democrats, who replied: "Says the heart and soul of Arizona's Republican Party (prove us wrong)."
translation.medium: 她的推文在社交媒体用户中受到嘲笑, 包括亚利桑那州众议院民主党人, 他们回答说:"亚利桑那州共和党的内心和灵魂说 (证明我们错了).
translation.reference: 她的推文遭到了社交媒体用户的嘲笑，包括亚利桑那州众议院民主党人，他们回应道：“这是亚利桑那州共和党的心声（证明我们错了）。”

translation.en: "You do realize that if you keep falsely calling all good things communist you're only going to make communism more attractive, no?" asked another social media user.
translation.zh: 另一位社交媒体用户问道:“你知道，如果你一直错误地把所有好的都称为共产主义，你只会让共产主义更有吸引力，不是吗？”
translation.source: "You do realize that if you keep falsely calling all good things communist you're only going to make communism more attractive, no?" asked another social media user.
translation.medium: 另一位社交媒体用户问道:"你是否意识到,如果你错误地把所有好的东西都称为共产主义, 你只会让共产主义变得更有吸引力, 不是吗?"
translation.reference: 另一位社交媒体用户问道:“你知道，如果你一直错误地把所有好的都称为共产主义，你只会让共产主义更有吸引力，不是吗？”

translation.en: Republican Senator Wendy Rogers warned against communists in America and called for having more "bold Christians" in office.
translation.zh: 共和党参议员温迪·罗杰斯警告美国警惕共产主义者，并呼吁让更多“大胆的基督徒”执政。
