translation.source: Republican Senator Wendy Rogers warned against communists in America and called for having more "bold Christians" in office.
translation.medium: 共和党参议员温迪·罗杰斯警告美国的共产主义者, 并呼吁有更多的"勇敢的基督徒"在办公室.
translation.reference: 共和党参议员温迪·罗杰斯警告美国警惕共产主义者，并呼吁让更多“大胆的基督徒”执政。

translation.en: Writer Shiv Ramdas also denounced the tweet by paraphrasing her own words: "'working is Communism.'"
translation.zh: 作家希夫·拉姆达斯 (Shiv Ramdas) 也用自己的话谴责了这条推文：“‘工作就是共产主义。’”
translation.source: Writer Shiv Ramdas also denounced the tweet by paraphrasing her own words: "'working is Communism.'"
translation.medium: 作家希夫·拉姆达斯 (Shiv Ramdas) 也谴责这条推特, 引用她自己的话:"工作就是共产主义.
translation.reference: 作家希夫·拉姆达斯 (Shiv Ramdas) 也用自己的话谴责了这条推文：“‘工作就是共产主义。’”

translation.en: Separately, Rogers has frequently suggested that Donald Trump won the 2020 presidential election and called for a new election.
translation.zh: 另外，罗杰斯经常暗示，唐纳德·特朗普 (Donald Trump) 赢得了 2020 年总统大选，并呼吁重新选举。
translation.source: Separately, Rogers has frequently suggested that Donald Trump won the 2020 presidential election and called for a new election.
translation.medium: 另外,罗杰斯经常暗示唐纳德特朗普赢得了2020年总统大选,并呼吁举行新的选举.
translation.reference: 另外，罗杰斯经常暗示，唐纳德·特朗普 (Donald Trump) 赢得了 2020 年总统大选，并呼吁重新选举。

translation.en: "I call for the Biden electors to be recalled to Arizona & a new election must be conducted.
translation.zh: “我呼吁将拜登的选举人召回亚利桑那州，重新举行选举。
translation.source: "I call for the Biden electors to be recalled to Arizona & a new election must be conducted.
translation.medium: "我呼吁拜登选民被召回亚利桑那州, 必须进行新的选举.
translation.reference: “我呼吁将拜登的选举人召回亚利桑那州，重新举行选举。

translation.en: Arizona's electors must not be awarded fraudulently..." the senator tweeted in July.
translation.zh: 亚利桑那州的选民不应该遭到欺骗……”这位参议员 7 月份在推特上写道。
translation.source: Arizona's electors must not be awarded fraudulently..." the senator tweeted in July.
translation.medium: 亚利桑那州的选民不能以欺诈的方式获奖"...这位参议员在7月份的推特上写道.
translation.reference: 亚利桑那州的选民不应该遭到欺骗……”这位参议员 7 月份在推特上写道。

translation.en: In July, Rogers campaigned for the election to be decertified and previously launched a petition that she claimed gained 663,000 signatures.
translation.zh: 今年 7 月，罗杰斯发起了取消选举认证的活动，此前她发起了一份请愿书，声称已经获得了 66.3 万个签名。
translation.source: In July, Rogers campaigned for the election to be decertified and previously launched a petition that she claimed gained 663,000 signatures.
translation.medium: 在7月份, 罗杰斯宣传选举被取消认证, 并先前发起了一份请愿书, 她声称获得了663,000个签名.
translation.reference: 今年 7 月，罗杰斯发起了取消选举认证的活动，此前她发起了一份请愿书，声称已经获得了 66.3 万个签名。

translation.en: "Things are really taking off!
translation.zh: “事情真的成功了！
translation.source: "Things are really taking off!
translation.medium: "事情真的在起飞!
translation.reference: “事情真的成功了！

translation.en: Let's get to 1 million ASAP.
translation.zh: 让我们尽快拿到一百万个签名。
translation.source: Let's get to 1 million ASAP.
translation.medium: 让我们尽快达到100万.
translation.reference: 让我们尽快拿到一百万个签名。

translation.en: Audit results are coming soon, more states are coming online," she tweeted in September.
translation.zh: 审计结果很快就会出来，更多的州将上线，”她 9 月份在推特上写道。
translation.source: Audit results are coming soon, more states are coming online," she tweeted in September.
translation.medium: 更多州正在上线", 她在9月份的推特上写道.
translation.reference: 审计结果很快就会出来，更多的州将上线，”她 9 月份在推特上写道。

translation.en: The Trump supporter has also pushed for debunked claims of voter fraud in Arizona.
translation.zh: 特朗普的支持者还推动了亚利桑那州选民欺诈的指控。
translation.source: The Trump supporter has also pushed for debunked claims of voter fraud in Arizona.
translation.medium: 这位特朗普支持者还推动揭露亚利桑那州选民欺诈的指控.
translation.reference: 特朗普的支持者还推动了亚利桑那州选民欺诈的指控。

translation.en: Newsweek contacted Senator Rogers' office for comment.
translation.zh: 《新闻周刊》联系了罗杰斯参议员的办公室请其置评。
translation.source: Newsweek contacted Senator Rogers' office for comment.
translation.medium: "新闻周刊"与罗杰斯参议员办公室联系,
translation.reference: 《新闻周刊》联系了罗杰斯参议员的办公室请其置评。

translation.en: Thank you, please bear with me a moment whilst I look into this for you
translation.zh: 谢谢，请您稍候，我查一下
translation.source: Thank you, please bear with me a moment whilst I look into this for you
translation.medium: 谢谢你,请耐心等我看看这个为你
translation.reference: 谢谢，请您稍候，我查一下

translation.en: I do apologise about this, as the account holder is not yourself we would need #NAME# to contact us to confirm her details, once she has done this and has confirmed she is happy for us to discuss the order with yourself we can then look at the previous correspondence for you.
translation.zh: 抱歉，帐户持有人不是您，必须由 #NAME# 本人与我们联系，确认她的详细信息，等她确认同意我们与您讨论订单后，我们可以为您查找以前的通信内容。
translation.source: I do apologise about this, as the account holder is not yourself we would need #NAME# to contact us to confirm her details, once she has done this and has confirmed she is happy for us to discuss the order with yourself we can then look at the previous correspondence for you.
translation.medium: 我们需要#NAME#与我们联系以确认她的详细信息,一旦她这样做并确认她很高兴我们与你讨论订单,
translation.reference: 抱歉，帐户持有人不是您，必须由 #NAME# 本人与我们联系，确认她的详细信息，等她确认同意我们与您讨论订单后，我们可以为您查找以前的通信内容。

translation.en: I understand would you please check if the ebook can open it?
translation.zh: 我明白了，您能检查一下能否打开电子书吗？
translation.source: I understand would you please check if the ebook can open it?
translation.medium: 我理解,请检查电子书是否可以打开它.
translation.reference: 我明白了，您能检查一下能否打开电子书吗？

translation.en: Were you able to find the ebook?
translation.zh: 您找到电子书了吗？
translation.source: Were you able to find the ebook?
translation.medium: 你能找到电子书吗?
translation.reference: 您找到电子书了吗？

translation.en: Due to no response, and for quality purposes, I have to release this chat, please feel free to contact us for any inquiry or question, We will be more than glad to provide you assistance with it.
translation.zh: 由于您没有回应，为了提高服务质量，我不得不发布此聊天内容，如有任何询问或问题，请随时联系我们，我们非常乐意为您提供帮助。
translation.source: Due to no response, and for quality purposes, I have to release this chat, please feel free to contact us for any inquiry or question, We will be more than glad to provide you assistance with it.
translation.medium: 由于没有回应, 为了质量目的, 我不得不发布这个聊天, 请随时与我们联系任何查询或问题, 我们将很高兴为您提供帮助.
translation.reference: 由于您没有回应，为了提高服务质量，我不得不发布此聊天内容，如有任何询问或问题，请随时联系我们，我们非常乐意为您提供帮助。

translation.en: Have a wonderful day, Goodbye!
translation.zh: 祝您有美好的一天，再见！
translation.source: Have a wonderful day, Goodbye!
translation.medium: 祝你有一个美好的一天,再见!
translation.reference: 祝您有美好的一天，再见！

translation.en: Please wait for the order, and you can report to us if ever food is not hot so we can help you.
translation.zh: 请等待订餐的送达，如果食物变凉了，请您告诉我们，我们可以帮助您。
translation.source: Please wait for the order, and you can report to us if ever food is not hot so we can help you.
translation.medium: 请等待订单,如果食物不热,您可以向我们报告,以便我们可以帮助您.
translation.reference: 请等待订餐的送达，如果食物变凉了，请您告诉我们，我们可以帮助您。

translation.en: I know having a credit will not make your food experience better, but allow me to compensate for the delay.
translation.zh: 我知道给您抵免券也不能改善您的用餐体验，但是请允许我为这次延迟作出补偿。
translation.source: I know having a credit will not make your food experience better, but allow me to compensate for the delay.
translation.medium: 我知道有信用不会让您的美食体验更好, 但请允许我补偿延误.
translation.reference: 我知道给您抵免券也不能改善您的用餐体验，但是请允许我为这次延迟作出补偿。

translation.en: 'Interview with the Vampire' author Anne Rice dies at age 80
translation.zh: 《夜访吸血鬼》的作者安妮·赖斯去世，享年 80 岁
translation.source: 'Interview with the Vampire' author Anne Rice dies at age 80
translation.medium: "与吸血鬼的采访"作者安妮·赖斯在80岁时去世
translation.reference: 《夜访吸血鬼》的作者安妮·赖斯去世，享年 80 岁

translation.en: She passed away due to complications resulting from a stroke, Christopher Rice said.
translation.zh: 她的儿子克里斯多夫·赖斯说，她死于中风引起的并发症。
translation.source: She passed away due to complications resulting from a stroke, Christopher Rice said.
translation.medium: 克里斯托弗·赖斯说,
translation.reference: 她的儿子克里斯多夫·赖斯说，她死于中风引起的并发症。

translation.en: Rice's biggest success was her first novel, "Interview with the Vampire," which was published in 1976 and introduced the character of the vampire Lestat, who would be the central character in the 13-book Chronicles series, the most recent of which was published in 2018.
translation.zh: 赖斯最成功的作品是她的第一部小说《夜访吸血鬼》，该书于 1976 年出版，塑造了吸血鬼莱斯特这个角色，莱斯特是《编年史》13 部全集的中心人物，最新一部于 2018 年出版。
translation.source: Rice's biggest success was her first novel, "Interview with the Vampire," which was published in 1976 and introduced the character of the vampire Lestat, who would be the central character in the 13-book Chronicles series, the most recent of which was published in 2018.
translation.medium: 赖斯最大的成功是她的第一部小说"与吸血鬼的采访",于1976年出版,并介绍了吸血鬼莱斯塔特的角色,他将成为13本"纪事"系列的中心人物,最近一本于2018年出版.
translation.reference: 赖斯最成功的作品是她的第一部小说《夜访吸血鬼》，该书于 1976 年出版，塑造了吸血鬼莱斯特这个角色，莱斯特是《编年史》13 部全集的中心人物，最新一部于 2018 年出版。

translation.en: "I had an idea of Lestat as the man of action, the man who could do things that I couldn't do," Rice said in a talk at Southern Illinois University in 2010.
translation.zh: 2010 年，赖斯在南伊利诺伊大学的一次演讲中说：“我认为莱斯特是个实干家，他能做我做不到的事情。”
translation.source: "I had an idea of Lestat as the man of action, the man who could do things that I couldn't do," Rice said in a talk at Southern Illinois University in 2010.
translation.medium: "我认为莱斯塔特是行动的男人, 他可以做我做不到的事情", 赖斯在2010年在南伊利诺伊大学的一次演讲中说.
translation.reference: 2010 年，赖斯在南伊利诺伊大学的一次演讲中说：“我认为莱斯特是个实干家，他能做我做不到的事情。”

translation.en: "Interview with the Vampire" was made into a successful feature film in 1994, helping to reignite interest in the vampire genre which continued with the TV series "The Vampire Diaries" and the "Twilight" film series.
translation.zh: 1994 年，《夜访吸血鬼》被拍成电影并获得了成功，它重新点燃了人们对吸血鬼题材的兴趣，之后的电视剧《吸血鬼日记》和《暮光之城》系列电影相继上映。
translation.source: "Interview with the Vampire" was made into a successful feature film in 1994, helping to reignite interest in the vampire genre which continued with the TV series "The Vampire Diaries" and the "Twilight" film series.
translation.medium: "与吸血鬼的采访"在1994年成为一部成功的故事片, 帮助重新点燃对吸血鬼类型的兴趣,
translation.reference: 1994 年，《夜访吸血鬼》被拍成电影并获得了成功，它重新点燃了人们对吸血鬼题材的兴趣，之后的电视剧《吸血鬼日记》和《暮光之城》系列电影相继上映。

translation.en: Although she lived most of her life in California, Rice was a native of New Orleans and set many of her stories there, according to her website biography.
translation.zh: 根据赖斯网站上的个人简介，尽管她大部分时间在加州度过，但她是新奥尔良人，而她的许多故事也都发生新奥尔良。
translation.source: Although she lived most of her life in California, Rice was a native of New Orleans and set many of her stories there, according to her website biography.
translation.medium: 尽管她大部分生活都在加利福尼亚,但根据她的网站传记,赖斯是新奥尔良的本地人,并在那里设置了她的许多故事.
translation.reference: 根据赖斯网站上的个人简介，尽管她大部分时间在加州度过，但她是新奥尔良人，而她的许多故事也都发生新奥尔良。

translation.en: Rice's son, Christopher Rice, said he was at his mother's bedside when she died.
translation.zh: 克里斯托弗·赖斯说，他母亲去世时，他就在她的床边。
translation.source: Rice's son, Christopher Rice, said he was at his mother's bedside when she died.
translation.medium: 赖斯的儿子克里斯托弗·赖斯说,
translation.reference: 克里斯托弗·赖斯说，他母亲去世时，他就在她的床边。

translation.en: Anne Rice will be buried in a private ceremony in New Orleans, with a public memorial planned next year, he said.
translation.zh: 他说，他将为安妮·赖斯举行一个私人葬礼，明年将举行一个公众纪念活动。
translation.source: Anne Rice will be buried in a private ceremony in New Orleans, with a public memorial planned next year, he said.
translation.medium: 他表示, 安妮·赖斯将在新奥尔良举行私人葬礼,
translation.reference: 他说，他将为安妮·赖斯举行一个私人葬礼，明年将举行一个公众纪念活动。

translation.en: Apple Music Documents & Data Storage Size
translation.zh: Apple Music 文档和数据存储大小
translation.source: Apple Music Documents & Data Storage Size
translation.medium: 果音乐文档和数据存储大小
translation.reference: Apple Music 文档和数据存储大小

translation.en: Recently, I made the switch from an iPhone 12 Pro to a 13 Pro Max, and on both iPhones I have noticed a bug that is eating up my internal storage.
translation.zh: 最近，我把 iPhone 12 Pro 换成 13 Pro Max 了，但我发现，这两款 iPhone 上都有一个 bug 在吞噬手机的内部存储空间。
translation.source: Recently, I made the switch from an iPhone 12 Pro to a 13 Pro Max, and on both iPhones I have noticed a bug that is eating up my internal storage.
translation.medium: 最近我从iPhone 12 Pro换成13 Pro Max, 在这两款iPhone上我发现一个bug正在吞我的内存.
translation.reference: 最近，我把 iPhone 12 Pro 换成 13 Pro Max 了，但我发现，这两款 iPhone 上都有一个 bug 在吞噬手机的内部存储空间。

translation.en: Apple Music’s Documents and Data are using about 35GB of internal storage.
translation.zh: Apple Music 文档和数据使用了大约 35GB 的内部存储空间。
translation.source: Apple Music’s Documents and Data are using about 35GB of internal storage.
translation.medium: 果音乐的文档和数据使用了大约35GB的内部存储空间.
translation.reference: Apple Music 文档和数据使用了大约 35GB 的内部存储空间。

translation.en: I have tried remediating this by deleting the app, but since this is a stock app the documents and data are never truly deleted from the iPhone.
translation.zh: 我试着删除这个应用程序来恢复存储空间，但这款应用程序是自带的，文档和数据从未真正从 iPhone 中删除。
translation.source: I have tried remediating this by deleting the app, but since this is a stock app the documents and data are never truly deleted from the iPhone.
translation.medium: 我试图通过删除应用程序来解决这个问题, 但由于这是一个库存应用程序, 文件和数据从来没有真正从iPhone上删除.
translation.reference: 我试着删除这个应用程序来恢复存储空间，但这款应用程序是自带的，文档和数据从未真正从 iPhone 中删除。

translation.en: I thought that once I moved to the new iPhone 13 Pro that the bug would disappear, but that was not the case.
translation.zh: 我原以为，只要换了新的 iPhone 13 Pro，这个 bug 就会消失，但事实并非如此。
translation.source: I thought that once I moved to the new iPhone 13 Pro that the bug would disappear, but that was not the case.
translation.medium: 我认为一旦我转换到新的iPhone 13 Pro, 错误就会消失, 但事实并非如此.
translation.reference: 我原以为，只要换了新的 iPhone 13 Pro，这个 bug 就会消失，但事实并非如此。

translation.en: After installing from an iCloud backup, I checked the Apple Music app and it was still using more then 30GBs for documents and data.
translation.zh: 通过 iCloud 备份安装后，我检查了 Apple Music，它的文档和数据仍然超过 30GB。
translation.source: After installing from an iCloud backup, I checked the Apple Music app and it was still using more then 30GBs for documents and data.
translation.medium: 在从iCloud备份安装后, 我检查了果音乐应用程序, 它仍在使用超过30GB的文档和数据.
translation.reference: 通过 iCloud 备份安装后，我检查了 Apple Music，它的文档和数据仍然超过 30GB。

translation.en: After contacting two Apple Support specialists, one suggested that I wipe my iPhone and start fresh, while another didn’t offer any real suggestions as the issue goes beyond anything they can do.
translation.zh: 我联系了两名苹果支持专家，其中一位建议我擦除 iPhone 后重新安装，而另一位则没有提供任何真正的建议，因为这个问题超出了他们的能力范围。
translation.source: After contacting two Apple Support specialists, one suggested that I wipe my iPhone and start fresh, while another didn’t offer any real suggestions as the issue goes beyond anything they can do.
translation.medium: 另一位则没有提供任何真正的建议, 因为这个问题超出了他们能做的任何事情.
translation.reference: 我联系了两名苹果支持专家，其中一位建议我擦除 iPhone 后重新安装，而另一位则没有提供任何真正的建议，因为这个问题超出了他们的能力范围。

translation.en: I also checked my iPad and it seems AM is only using 15GBs for documents and data on it, but that still is not acceptable.
translation.zh: 我也检查了我的 iPad，Apple Music 的文档和数据似乎只有 15GB，但这也还是太多了。
translation.source: I also checked my iPad and it seems AM is only using 15GBs for documents and data on it, but that still is not acceptable.
translation.medium: 我还检查我的iPad, 似乎AM只使用15GB的文件和数据, 但这仍然是不可接受的.
translation.reference: 我也检查了我的 iPad，Apple Music 的文档和数据似乎只有 15GB，但这也还是太多了。

translation.en: Now I am turning to the community to see how widespread this issue is, and maybe get Apple’s attention on this issue.
translation.zh: 现在我来社区看看这个问题有多普遍，或许能引起苹果公司对这个问题的关注。
translation.source: Now I am turning to the community to see how widespread this issue is, and maybe get Apple’s attention on this issue.
translation.medium: 也许能引起果公司的注意.
translation.reference: 现在我来社区看看这个问题有多普遍，或许能引起苹果公司对这个问题的关注。

translation.en: Have you experienced this as well?
translation.zh: 您也遇到过这样的问题吗？
translation.source: Have you experienced this as well?
translation.medium: 你也曾经经历过这种情况吗?
translation.reference: 您也遇到过这样的问题吗？

translation.en: Norton Security Deluxe includes online access to expert help from certified Norton technicians.
translation.zh: Norton Security Deluxe 包括经认证的诺顿技术人员的在线专家级支持。
translation.source: Norton Security Deluxe includes online access to expert help from certified Norton technicians.
translation.medium: 诺顿安全精品包括在线访问经过认证的诺顿技术人员的专家帮助.
translation.reference: Norton Security Deluxe 包括经认证的诺顿技术人员的在线专家级支持。

translation.en: If at any time you need help, our support agents are ready to assist you 24 hours a day, seven days a week.
translation.zh: 无论何时需要帮助，我们支持代理的 7 X 24 服务都能满足您的需求。
translation.source: If at any time you need help, our support agents are ready to assist you 24 hours a day, seven days a week.
translation.medium: 如果在任何时候你需要帮助, 我们的支持代理人准备帮助你一天24小时, 一周七天.
translation.reference: 无论何时需要帮助，我们支持代理的 7 X 24 服务都能满足您的需求。

translation.en: To be eligible for the Virus Protection Promise, you must purchase, renew, or upgrade your Norton subscription directly from Symantec, or subscribe to the Norton Automatic Renewal Service.
translation.zh: 要获得“病毒防护承诺”，您必须直接从赛门铁克购买、续订或升级诺顿订阅，或订阅诺顿自动续订服务。
translation.source: To be eligible for the Virus Protection Promise, you must purchase, renew, or upgrade your Norton subscription directly from Symantec, or subscribe to the Norton Automatic Renewal Service.
translation.medium: 要获得病毒保护承诺,您必须直接从赛门铁克购买,续订或升级您的Norton订阅,或订阅Norton自动续订服务.
translation.reference: 要获得“病毒防护承诺”，您必须直接从赛门铁克购买、续订或升级诺顿订阅，或订阅诺顿自动续订服务。

translation.en: If a Symantec service representative is unable to remove a virus from your device, then you may receive a full refund on the actual price paid for the Norton subscription, or if a Norton bundle, the total Norton bundle price paid (net of any discounts or refunds received and less any shipping, handling and applicable taxes, except in certain states and countries where shipping, handling and taxes are refundable) and only for the current paid subscription service period for that subscription or subscription bundle.
translation.zh: 如果赛门铁克服务代表无法清除您的设备中的病毒，那么您可以按照在订阅诺顿时实际支付的价格获得全额退款；如果是诺顿捆绑包，则可以按照诺顿总包价格（扣除获得的任何折扣或收到退款，减去任何运输费、处理费和适用的税费，但在可退还运输费、处理费和税费的某些州和国家除外）获得全额退款，但仅限该订阅或订阅捆绑包的当前付费订阅服务期间。
translation.source: If a Symantec service representative is unable to remove a virus from your device, then you may receive a full refund on the actual price paid for the Norton subscription, or if a Norton bundle, the total Norton bundle price paid (net of any discounts or refunds received and less any shipping, handling and applicable taxes, except in certain states and countries where shipping, handling and taxes are refundable) and only for the current paid subscription service period for that subscription or subscription bundle.
translation.medium: 如果赛门铁克的服务代表无法从您的设备中删除病毒,那么您可能会收到 Norton 订阅的实际价格的全部退款,或者如果是 Norton 套餐,则收到的 Norton 套餐总价格 (扣除任何折扣或退款,减去任何运输,处理和适用税款,除非在某些州和国家,运输,处理和税款可退款),并且仅限于该订阅或订阅套餐的当前付费订阅服务期.
translation.reference: 如果赛门铁克服务代表无法清除您的设备中的病毒，那么您可以按照在订阅诺顿时实际支付的价格获得全额退款；如果是诺顿捆绑包，则可以按照诺顿总包价格（扣除获得的任何折扣或收到退款，减去任何运输费、处理费和适用的税费，但在可退还运输费、处理费和税费的某些州和国家除外）获得全额退款，但仅限该订阅或订阅捆绑包的当前付费订阅服务期间。

translation.en: The Norton subscription must be installed and activated on your device prior to the time it is infected by a virus.
translation.zh: 您必须在设备感染病毒之前安装并激活诺顿订阅。
translation.source: The Norton subscription must be installed and activated on your device prior to the time it is infected by a virus.
translation.medium: 在您的设备被病毒感染之前必须安装和激活Norton订阅.
translation.reference: 您必须在设备感染病毒之前安装并激活诺顿订阅。

translation.en: The refund DOES NOT apply to any damages incurred as a result of viruses.
translation.zh: 不能以病毒造成的任何损害为由要求退款。
translation.source: The refund DOES NOT apply to any damages incurred as a result of viruses.
translation.medium: 退款不适用于因病毒造成的任何损失.
translation.reference: 不能以病毒造成的任何损害为由要求退款。

translation.en: See Norton website for more detail.
translation.zh: 有关详细信息，请参见诺顿网站。
translation.source: See Norton website for more detail.
translation.medium: 详情请参阅诺顿网站.
translation.reference: 有关详细信息，请参见诺顿网站。

translation.en: Protect what matters with a top-rated security service
translation.zh: 以卓越的安全服务保护重要的东西
translation.source: Protect what matters with a top-rated security service
translation.medium: 通过一流的安全服务保护重要的事物
translation.reference: 以卓越的安全服务保护重要的东西

translation.en: Your online life and real life are merging into one seamless experience, and you need security that can keep viruses, identity theft, and other digital threats from becoming real-life headaches.
translation.zh: 您的在线生活和现实生活正在无缝融合为一体，您需要安全产品来防御日益严重的病毒、身份盗窃和其他数字威胁。
translation.source: Your online life and real life are merging into one seamless experience, and you need security that can keep viruses, identity theft, and other digital threats from becoming real-life headaches.
translation.medium: 你的网络生活和现实生活正在融合为一个无的体验, 你需要的安全可以防止病毒,身份盗窃和其他数字威胁成为现实生活中的头痛.
translation.reference: 您的在线生活和现实生活正在无缝融合为一体，您需要安全产品来防御日益严重的病毒、身份盗窃和其他数字威胁。

translation.en: We see more, analyse more and stop more online threats
translation.zh: 我们可以发现、分析和阻止更多的网络威胁
translation.source: We see more, analyse more and stop more online threats
translation.medium: 我们看到更多,分析更多,阻止更多的网络威胁
translation.reference: 我们可以发现、分析和阻止更多的网络威胁

translation.en: Why were Skyler and Walt Jr. so annoyed with Walt working on the house in season 2?
translation.zh: 为什么在第二季中，斯凯乐和小沃尔特对沃尔特修葺房屋而生气？
translation.source: Why were Skyler and Walt Jr. so annoyed with Walt working on the house in season 2?
translation.medium: 为什么Skyler和Walt Jr.对沃尔特在第二季修房子这么生气?
translation.reference: 为什么在第二季中，斯凯乐和小沃尔特对沃尔特修葺房屋而生气？

translation.en: Specifically 2.10 "Over"
translation.zh: 特别是第二季第 10 集“Over”
translation.source: Specifically 2.10 "Over"
translation.medium: 具体来说是2.10"过"
translation.reference: 特别是第二季第 10 集“Over”

translation.en: Walt replaces the hot water heater, then replaces boards that were apparently maybe not necessarily rotting.
translation.zh: 沃尔特换了热水器，又换了显然没有腐坏的电路板。
translation.source: Walt replaces the hot water heater, then replaces boards that were apparently maybe not necessarily rotting.
translation.medium: 沃尔特更换了热水器, 然后更换了显然可能不一定会腐烂的板.
translation.reference: 沃尔特换了热水器，又换了显然没有腐坏的电路板。

translation.en: Why does Skyler seem so pissed about this?
translation.zh: 为什么斯凯乐看起来这么生气？
translation.source: Why does Skyler seem so pissed about this?
translation.medium: 为什么斯凯勒这么生气?
translation.reference: 为什么斯凯乐看起来这么生气？

translation.en: Fed up completely, she asks "Are you even going to work today?"
translation.zh: 她忍无可忍，问道:“你今天去上班吗？”
translation.source: Fed up completely, she asks "Are you even going to work today?"
translation.medium: 她问:"你今天要去上班吗?"
translation.reference: 她忍无可忍，问道:“你今天去上班吗？”

translation.en: A week or two prior, she was gung-ho about him resting and recovering the entire time.
translation.zh: 就在一两周前，她还劝他在家多休息，等着身体康复。
translation.source: A week or two prior, she was gung-ho about him resting and recovering the entire time.
translation.medium: 一个或两个星期前, 她是 gung-ho关于他休息和恢复整个时间.
translation.reference: 就在一两周前，她还劝他在家多休息，等着身体康复。

translation.en: I understand she's unhappy in the relationship, but Walter Jr. seems vaguely annoyed and completely puzzled by Walt doing some renovations.
translation.zh: 我理解她在这段婚姻中并不开心，但小沃尔特似乎也有点生气，不能理解沃尔特为什么要修理房子。
translation.source: I understand she's unhappy in the relationship, but Walter Jr. seems vaguely annoyed and completely puzzled by Walt doing some renovations.
translation.medium: 我明白她对这段关系不满意, 但沃尔特小似乎有些烦,
translation.reference: 我理解她在这段婚姻中并不开心，但小沃尔特似乎也有点生气，不能理解沃尔特为什么要修理房子。

translation.en: I'm also aware Skyler is openly flirting with Ted in the hope that someone treats her as a priority for a change whilst carrying a child whereas Walt has made everything about him ever since his 50th birthday.
translation.zh: 我还看到斯凯乐公开与泰德调情，说如果有人想要生孩子，希望能把她作为首选，而沃尔特过了 50 岁生日后就只把心思放在自己身上。
translation.source: I'm also aware Skyler is openly flirting with Ted in the hope that someone treats her as a priority for a change whilst carrying a child whereas Walt has made everything about him ever since his 50th birthday.
translation.medium: 我也知道斯凯勒公开地和泰德调情, 希望有人把她当做优先事项来改变,
translation.reference: 我还看到斯凯乐公开与泰德调情，说如果有人想要生孩子，希望能把她作为首选，而沃尔特过了 50 岁生日后就只把心思放在自己身上。

translation.en: Still, I always find it odd on rewatch that Sky and Jr. seem so incredibly ticked off that Walt is doing something productive at home, not lying or killing people or making drugs.
translation.zh: 不过，我在再次刷剧之后，发现了奇怪的一点，沃尔特在家做的明明是正事，既不撒谎，也不杀人和制毒，斯凯乐和小沃尔特为什么还那么生气呢？
translation.source: Still, I always find it odd on rewatch that Sky and Jr. seem so incredibly ticked off that Walt is doing something productive at home, not lying or killing people or making drugs.
translation.medium: 不过,我总是觉得很奇怪在重新观看天空和Jr似乎如此令人难以置信的ticked 沃尔特在家里做一些富有成效的事情,不是说谎或杀人或制造毒品.
translation.reference: 不过，我在再次刷剧之后，发现了奇怪的一点，沃尔特在家做的明明是正事，既不撒谎，也不杀人和制毒，斯凯乐和小沃尔特为什么还那么生气呢？

translation.en: Just fixing up the house like a homeowner would and should with nothing but spare time.
translation.zh: 他只是把自己当房主修葺了一下房子，因为他只有大把的空闲时间。
translation.source: Just fixing up the house like a homeowner would and should with nothing but spare time.
translation.medium: 只是把房子修好, 像一个房主应该做的, 只有空时间.

translation.source: Can you imagine all those people trying to get out of the parking lot when that touched down?
translation.medium: 你能想象所有这些人试图离开停车场当触及?
translation.reference: 你能想象当飞机着陆时，所有人都试图离开停机坪吗？

translation.en: They'd all have been killed.
translation.zh: 否则他们必死无疑。
translation.source: They'd all have been killed.
translation.medium: 他们都被杀了.
translation.reference: 否则他们必死无疑。

translation.en: BUT if they were like "Keep working!"
translation.zh: 但如果他们说“继续工作！”
translation.source: BUT if they were like "Keep working!"
translation.medium: 但如果他们像"继续工作!"
translation.reference: 但如果他们说“继续工作！”

translation.en: instead of "Take Shelter!",
translation.zh: 而不是“躲起来！”
translation.source: instead of "Take Shelter!",
translation.medium: 而不是"避难吧!"
translation.reference: 而不是“躲起来！”

translation.en: that's different.
translation.zh: 这是不一样的。
translation.source: that's different.
translation.medium: 这有所不同.
translation.reference: 这是不一样的。

translation.en: Does anybody know if they were still working or if they were sheltering in there somewhere?
translation.zh: 有人知道他们应该继续工作，还是躲在哪里吗？
translation.source: Does anybody know if they were still working or if they were sheltering in there somewhere?
translation.medium: 有没有人知道他们是否还在工作,
translation.reference: 有人知道他们应该继续工作，还是躲在哪里吗？

translation.en: Yes that means when I work out I really don’t care how many calories it burns, and I don’t change my numbers or macros because of how much I burned.
translation.zh: 是的，这意味着我在锻炼时不会真正关心消耗了多少卡路里，我不会因为消耗的热量而改变我的数字或巨量营养素。
translation.source: Yes that means when I work out I really don’t care how many calories it burns, and I don’t change my numbers or macros because of how much I burned.
translation.medium: 是的,这意味着当我炼时,我真的不在乎它燃烧了多少卡路里,我不会因为我燃烧了多少卡路里而改变我的数字或宏.
translation.reference: 是的，这意味着我在锻炼时不会真正关心消耗了多少卡路里，我不会因为消耗的热量而改变我的数字或巨量营养素。

translation.en: I (try) to stick to the 1200-1300.
translation.zh: 我（尝试）坚持达到 1200-1300 之间。
translation.source: I (try) to stick to the 1200-1300.
translation.medium: 我 (试图) 坚持在1200-1300之间.
translation.reference: 我（尝试）坚持达到 1200-1300 之间。

translation.en: But if I’m extra hungry, yes I’ll eat something more to fuel my body and accept that weight-loss might be a day slower, or not.
translation.zh: 但如果我特别饿，是的，我会吃更多的东西来给我的身体提供能量，而不在乎减肥的速度是否会变慢。
translation.source: But if I’m extra hungry, yes I’ll eat something more to fuel my body and accept that weight-loss might be a day slower, or not.
translation.medium: 但是如果我特别饥饿, 是的, 我会吃更多的东西来为我的身体提供燃料, 并接受减肥可能会慢一天,
translation.reference: 但如果我特别饿，是的，我会吃更多的东西来给我的身体提供能量，而不在乎减肥的速度是否会变慢。

translation.en: If you’re already doing a 500 calorie cut, an extra piece of steak or even bread after a hard workout is not going to ruin your progress at all.
translation.zh: 如果你已经消耗了 500 卡路里的热量，那么在辛苦锻炼后再吃一块牛排甚至面包，根本不会影响你的锻炼成果。
translation.source: If you’re already doing a 500 calorie cut, an extra piece of steak or even bread after a hard workout is not going to ruin your progress at all.
translation.medium: 如果您已经减少了500卡路里, 经过艰苦的炼后再多吃一块牛排或面包也不会破坏您的进步.
translation.reference: 如果你已经消耗了 500 卡路里的热量，那么在辛苦锻炼后再吃一块牛排甚至面包，根本不会影响你的锻炼成果。

translation.en: It might just narrow your deficit that one day.
translation.zh: 总有一天可以缩小赤字的。
translation.source: It might just narrow your deficit that one day.
translation.medium: 有一天可能会缩小你的赤字.
translation.reference: 总有一天可以缩小赤字的。

translation.en: An extra piece of pizza or bowl of ice cream though?
translation.zh: 再多吃一块披萨或一碗冰淇淋？
translation.source: An extra piece of pizza or bowl of ice cream though?
translation.medium: 一块额外的披萨或碗冰淋虽然?
translation.reference: 再多吃一块披萨或一碗冰淇淋？

translation.en: That’s a no go.
translation.zh: 那不行。
translation.source: That’s a no go.
translation.medium: 这是一个不去.
translation.reference: 那不行。

translation.en: If you always need to eat more because of working out, consider not cutting so many calories in the first place.
translation.zh: 如果你总是因为锻炼而需要吃得更多，那么从一开始就不要想着消耗这么多的卡路里。
translation.source: If you always need to eat more because of working out, consider not cutting so many calories in the first place.
translation.medium: 如果你总是因为炼而需要多吃, 首先考虑不要减少太多的卡路里.
translation.reference: 如果你总是因为锻炼而需要吃得更多，那么从一开始就不要想着消耗这么多的卡路里。

translation.en: Maybe start with 300 deficit.
translation.zh: 也许可以从 300 的热量赤字开始。
translation.source: Maybe start with 300 deficit.
translation.medium: 或许可以从300美元的赤字开始.
translation.reference: 也许可以从 300 的热量赤字开始。

translation.en: Hope this helps!
translation.zh: 希望这对你有帮助！
translation.source: Hope this helps!
translation.medium: 希望这有所帮助!
translation.reference: 希望这对你有帮助！

translation.en: Can you please disconnect your eReader from the computer and try a factory reset?
translation.zh: 您能把您的电子阅读器从电脑上断开并尝试重置吗？
translation.source: Can you please disconnect your eReader from the computer and try a factory reset?
translation.medium: 请将电子书阅读器与计算机断开连接, 并尝试重置工厂设置.
translation.reference: 您能把您的电子阅读器从电脑上断开并尝试重置吗？

translation.en: This will delete the information on your eReader but you can make a back up and transfer the information again afterwards
translation.zh: 这将删除您的电子阅读器上的信息，但您可以先备份，以后再把信息传输回到电子阅读器上
translation.source: This will delete the information on your eReader but you can make a back up and transfer the information again afterwards
translation.medium: 这将删除您的电子阅读器上的信息,但您可以备份并随后再次传输信息
translation.reference: 这将删除您的电子阅读器上的信息，但您可以先备份，以后再把信息传输回到电子阅读器上

translation.en: You can follow these steps:
translation.zh: 您可以执行以下步骤：
translation.source: You can follow these steps:
translation.medium: 你可以采取以下步骤:
translation.reference: 您可以执行以下步骤：

translation.en: To perform a factory reset on your #PRS_ORG#, please follow the steps below:
translation.zh: 要在 #PRS_ORG# 上执行出厂重置，请按以下步骤操作：
translation.source: To perform a factory reset on your #PRS_ORG#, please follow the steps below:
translation.medium: 请按照下面的步骤对您的 #PRS_ORG# 进行工厂重置:
translation.reference: 要在 #PRS_ORG# 上执行出厂重置，请按以下步骤操作：

translation.en: Go to your Home screen.
translation.zh: 进入主屏幕。
translation.source: Go to your Home screen.
translation.medium: 进入主屏幕.
translation.reference: 进入主屏幕。

translation.en: Tap Home at the top of the screen.
translation.zh: 点击屏幕顶部的“主页”。
translation.source: Tap Home at the top of the screen.
translation.medium: 在屏幕顶部点击"首页".
translation.reference: 点击屏幕顶部的“主页”。

translation.en: Tap Settings.
translation.zh: 点击“设置”。
translation.source: Tap Settings.
translation.medium: 点击"设置".
translation.reference: 点击“设置”。

translation.en: Tap Device information.
translation.zh: 点击“设备信息”。
translation.source: Tap Device information.
translation.medium: 点击"设备信息".
translation.reference: 点击“设备信息”。

translation.en: Tap Factory reset under Advanced.
translation.zh: 在“高级”下点击“出厂重置”。
translation.source: Tap Factory reset under Advanced.
translation.medium: 在"先进"下按一下"重置工厂设置".
translation.reference: 在“高级”下点击“出厂重置”。

translation.en: Tap Reset Now.
translation.zh: 点击“立即重置”。
translation.source: Tap Reset Now.
translation.medium: 按一下"现在重置".
translation.reference: 点击“立即重置”。

translation.en: PlanetJupiter finally left my office’s solar system
translation.zh: PlanetJupiter 终于离开了办公室的太阳系
translation.source: PlanetJupiter finally left my office’s solar system
translation.medium: 星球木星终于离开了我的办公室的太阳系
translation.reference: PlanetJupiter 终于离开了办公室的太阳系

translation.en: I posted some years ago about my office nemesis, a woman called PlanetJupiter in my stories.
translation.zh: 几年前，我在我的文章里写过一个叫 PlanetJupiter 的女人，她是我在办公室里的死对头。
translation.source: I posted some years ago about my office nemesis, a woman called PlanetJupiter in my stories.
translation.medium: 我在几年前发表了一篇关于我办公室的敌人文章,
translation.reference: 几年前，我在我的文章里写过一个叫 PlanetJupiter 的女人，她是我在办公室里的死对头。

translation.en: Not much to say here.
translation.zh: 此处不再赘述。
translation.source: Not much to say here.
translation.medium: 这里没有什么可说的.
translation.reference: 此处不再赘述。

translation.en: The last time I saw her before Corona, she had lost some weight and seemed to be paying a bit of attention to food groups when she ate lunch, though she was still using her power wheelchair and being a bit smelly.
translation.zh: 上次我在 Corona 前面见到她时，她瘦了一些，午饭时似乎很注意饮食，不过她仍在使用电动轮椅，身上有点臭。
translation.source: The last time I saw her before Corona, she had lost some weight and seemed to be paying a bit of attention to food groups when she ate lunch, though she was still using her power wheelchair and being a bit smelly.
translation.medium: 最后一次见到她是在冠状病毒前, 她已经减肥了, 似乎在吃午饭时有点关注食物组, 虽然她还在使用电动轮椅, 并且有点臭.
translation.reference: 上次我在 Corona 前面见到她时，她瘦了一些，午饭时似乎很注意饮食，不过她仍在使用电动轮椅，身上有点臭。

translation.en: I asked how she is, like I ask all my co-workers if I see them.
translation.zh: 我问她怎么样了，就像问候所有同事一样。
translation.source: I asked how she is, like I ask all my co-workers if I see them.
translation.medium: 我问她怎么样,就像我问我的所有同事如果我看到他们.
translation.reference: 我问她怎么样了，就像问候所有同事一样。

translation.en: “Not so good, OP, I found out I have diabetes, so I have to eat fewer carbs.”
translation.zh: “不太好，OP，我查出有糖尿病，必须少吃碳水化合物。”
translation.source: “Not so good, OP, I found out I have diabetes, so I have to eat fewer carbs.”
translation.medium: 不太好,OP,我发现我有糖尿病,所以我必须少吃碳水化合物.
translation.reference: “不太好，OP，我查出有糖尿病，必须少吃碳水化合物。”

translation.en: To her slight credit, the lunch had cauliflower rice instead of regular.
translation.zh: 所以，她午餐吃的是花椰菜饭，而不是普通的饭菜。
translation.source: To her slight credit, the lunch had cauliflower rice instead of regular.
translation.medium: 在她微小的信誉中, 午餐有花菜米而不是普通的.
translation.reference: 所以，她午餐吃的是花椰菜饭，而不是普通的饭菜。

translation.en: I am a Midwesterner, and have always been nice to PJ’s face, so I told her I was sorry, that sucked, what about this project we’re both on?
translation.zh: 我是中西部人，当着她的面，我表现得很是友善，所以我对她示以同情，说这糟透了，并问我们一起做的项目怎么办？
translation.source: I am a Midwesterner, and have always been nice to PJ’s face, so I told her I was sorry, that sucked, what about this project we’re both on?
translation.medium: 我是一个中西部人, 总是对PJ的脸很好, 所以我对她说我很抱歉,
translation.reference: 我是中西部人，当着她的面，我表现得很是友善，所以我对她示以同情，说这糟透了，并问我们一起做的项目怎么办？

translation.en: Will she also work late to get it done for the court deadline?
translation.zh: 她也会加班加点，在法庭最后期限前完成工作吗？
translation.source: Will she also work late to get it done for the court deadline?
translation.medium: 她还会在法庭最后期限前工作到晚吗?
translation.reference: 她也会加班加点，在法庭最后期限前完成工作吗？

translation.en: “Sure, OP.
translation.zh: “当然了，OP。
translation.source: “Sure, OP.
translation.medium: 当然可以,OP.
translation.reference: “当然了，OP。

translation.en: I am saving money to move.”
translation.zh: 我正在攒钱搬家。”
translation.source: I am saving money to move.”
translation.medium: 我正在钱搬家.
translation.reference: 我正在攒钱搬家。”

translation.en: This is really rare.
translation.zh: 这可太稀奇了。
translation.source: This is really rare.
translation.medium: 这是非常罕见的.
translation.reference: 这可太稀奇了。

translation.en: My state has the lowest out-migration of any state, ever.
translation.zh: 我所在的州是所有州中移民最少的。
translation.source: My state has the lowest out-migration of any state, ever.
translation.medium: 我的州是有史以来移民率最低的州.
translation.reference: 我所在的州是所有州中移民最少的。

translation.en: Where is she moving?
translation.zh: 她要搬到哪里去？
translation.source: Where is she moving?
translation.medium: 她要搬到哪里?
translation.reference: 她要搬到哪里去？

translation.en: To another Midwest city that works a lot in the beef industry.
translation.zh: 她说要搬到另一个牛肉产业发达的中西部城市。
translation.source: To another Midwest city that works a lot in the beef industry.
translation.medium: 另一个在牛肉行业工作的中西部城市.
translation.reference: 她说要搬到另一个牛肉产业发达的中西部城市。

translation.en: I hope they didn’t mistake her for a steer!
translation.zh: 哦，我希望他们不会把她错当成阉牛！
translation.source: I hope they didn’t mistake her for a steer!
translation.medium: 我希望他们没有把她误认为牛!
translation.reference: 哦，我希望他们不会把她错当成阉牛！

translation.en: It turns out me and others documenting all her slow/bad work, falling asleep at the desk, annoying others, and smelling, has caused her to lose out on positions with all but one of the companies that often hires me, her, and others for contract work.
translation.zh: 事实证明，我和其他人都记得她的工作做得又慢又不好，还会在桌子上睡觉，让人烦躁，身上气味难闻，这些恶习让她屡遭解雇，最后只剩下一个公司经常雇用我、她还有其他人完成合同工作。
translation.source: It turns out me and others documenting all her slow/bad work, falling asleep at the desk, annoying others, and smelling, has caused her to lose out on positions with all but one of the companies that often hires me, her, and others for contract work.
translation.medium: 结果我和其他人记录了她慢慢/糟糕的工作, 在办公桌上睡着, 惹别人,
translation.reference: 事实证明，我和其他人都记得她的工作做得又慢又不好，还会在桌子上睡觉，让人烦躁，身上气味难闻，这些恶习让她屡遭解雇，最后只剩下一个公司经常雇用我、她还有其他人完成合同工作。

translation.en: So she sort of has to move to where family is in that city.
translation.zh: 所以她不得不搬到她的家人所在的城市。
translation.source: So she sort of has to move to where family is in that city.
translation.medium: 所以她不得不搬到那个城市的家人身边.
translation.reference: 所以她不得不搬到她的家人所在的城市。

translation.en: She’ll go blight another workplace, but at least not mine.
translation.zh: 她会毁了另一个工作单位，但至少我的保住了。
translation.source: She’ll go blight another workplace, but at least not mine.
translation.medium: 她会去毁掉另一个工作场所, 但至少不是我的.
translation.reference: 她会毁了另一个工作单位，但至少我的保住了。

translation.en: Not that it matters now, because I got a much better remote position.
translation.zh: 不过现在不重要了，因为我已经找到了一个更好的可以远程工作的职位。
translation.source: Not that it matters now, because I got a much better remote position.
translation.medium: 现在这并不重要, 因为我有更好的远程位置.
translation.reference: 不过现在不重要了，因为我已经找到了一个更好的可以远程工作的职位。

translation.en: Assam Anti-CAA Outfits Pay Tributes To People Who Died During Protests
translation.zh: 阿萨姆反 CAA 组织悼念在抗议运动中死亡的人
translation.source: Assam Anti-CAA Outfits Pay Tributes To People Who Died During Protests
translation.medium: 阿萨姆反CAA组织向抗议活动中遇难的人致敬
translation.reference: 阿萨姆反 CAA 组织悼念在抗议运动中死亡的人

translation.en: Five agitators were killed during the anti-CAA stirs in Assam two years ago.
translation.zh: 两年前，在阿萨姆邦的反 CAA 风波中，五名示威者被杀。
translation.source: Five agitators were killed during the anti-CAA stirs in Assam two years ago.
translation.medium: 五名煽动者在两年前的反CAA骚乱中被杀.
translation.reference: 两年前，在阿萨姆邦的反 CAA 风波中，五名示威者被杀。

translation.en: Several organisations in Assam on Sunday paid tributes to the five agitators who were killed in the anti-CAA stir two years ago, and resolved to resume the movement against the Act.
translation.zh: 周日，阿萨姆邦的几个组织对两年前在反 CAA 运动中被杀的五名示威者表示哀悼，并决心恢复反对该法案的运动。
translation.source: Several organisations in Assam on Sunday paid tributes to the five agitators who were killed in the anti-CAA stir two years ago, and resolved to resume the movement against the Act.
translation.medium: 阿萨姆州的多个组织周日向两年前反CAA骚乱中被杀害的五名煽动者致敬, 并决心恢复反对该法案的运动.
translation.reference: 周日，阿萨姆邦的几个组织对两年前在反 CAA 运动中被杀的五名示威者表示哀悼，并决心恢复反对该法案的运动。

translation.en: Memorial meetings were organised at the residence of Sam Stafford, one of the agitators who died, and a playground in Guwahati, with attendees resolving to once again to intensify the stir against the Citizenship (Amendment) Act.
translation.zh: 追悼会在死者之一山姆·斯塔福德 (Sam Stafford) 的住所和古瓦哈蒂 (Guwahati) 的一个游乐场举行，与会者决心再次升级反对《公民身份（修正案）法案》(Citizenship (Amendment) Act)的运动。
translation.source: Memorial meetings were organised at the residence of Sam Stafford, one of the agitators who died, and a playground in Guwahati, with attendees resolving to once again to intensify the stir against the Citizenship (Amendment) Act.
translation.medium: 在死去的煽动者之一萨姆·斯塔福德 (Sam Stafford) 的住所和古瓦哈蒂的一个游乐场举办了纪念集会,
translation.reference: 追悼会在死者之一山姆·斯塔福德 (Sam Stafford) 的住所和古瓦哈蒂 (Guwahati) 的一个游乐场举行，与会者决心再次升级反对《公民身份（修正案）法案》(Citizenship (Amendment) Act)的运动。

translation.en: The Krishak Mukti Sangram Samiti (KMSS), which was among the first groups to organise protests against CAA after it was passed in Parliament, paid tributes to the agitators at Sam Stafford's Hatigaon residence.
translation.zh: KMSS (Krishak Mukti Sangram Samiti) 是议会通过 CAA 后第一批组织抗议的团体之一，他们在山姆·斯塔福德位于哈蒂冈的住所向这些死者致敬。
translation.source: The Krishak Mukti Sangram Samiti (KMSS), which was among the first groups to organise protests against CAA after it was passed in Parliament, paid tributes to the agitators at Sam Stafford's Hatigaon residence.
translation.medium: 克里希克·穆克蒂·桑格拉姆·萨米特 (Krishak Mukti Sangram Samiti, KMSS) 是第一批在议会通过CAA后组织抗议活动的团体, 在萨姆·斯塔福德 (Sam Stafford) 的Hatigaon住宅向抗议者致敬.
translation.reference: KMSS (Krishak Mukti Sangram Samiti) 是议会通过 CAA 后第一批组织抗议的团体之一，他们在山姆·斯塔福德位于哈蒂冈的住所向这些死者致敬。

translation.en: Sibsagar MLA Akhil Gogoi, who was a Krishak Mukti Sangram Samiti leader during the stir and was jailed for his role in it, while paying floral tributes at the photographs of those who died, said that political parties and "nationalist organisations" must take the lead in resuming the movement.
translation.zh: Sibsagar MLA Akhil Gogoi 在运动期间是 Krishak Mukti Sangram Samiti 的领导人，并因其在其中扮演的角色而被监禁，他在向死者的照片献花时表示，政党和“民族主义组织”必须带头恢复运动。
translation.source: Sibsagar MLA Akhil Gogoi, who was a Krishak Mukti Sangram Samiti leader during the stir and was jailed for his role in it, while paying floral tributes at the photographs of those who died, said that political parties and "nationalist organisations" must take the lead in resuming the movement.
translation.medium: 在那些死去的人的照片上献花致敬时说, 政党和"民族主义组织"必须带头重新启动运动.
translation.reference: Sibsagar MLA Akhil Gogoi 在运动期间是 Krishak Mukti Sangram Samiti 的领导人，并因其在其中扮演的角色而被监禁，他在向死者的照片献花时表示，政党和“民族主义组织”必须带头恢复运动。

translation.en: Commenting on the artiste fraternity that had taken the centerstage in the 2019 stir, he said, "We can't expect them to organise agitations.
translation.zh: 在谈到占据 2019 年运动中心舞台的艺人兄弟会时，他说，“我们不能指望他们组织煽动。
translation.source: Commenting on the artiste fraternity that had taken the centerstage in the 2019 stir, he said, "We can't expect them to organise agitations.
translation.medium: 他说:"我们不能指望他们组织骚乱.
translation.reference: 在谈到占据 2019 年运动中心舞台的艺人兄弟会时，他说，“我们不能指望他们组织煽动。

translation.en: Their help is crucial but they shouldn't be blamed for not reviving the movement."
translation.zh: 他们的帮助至关重要，但他们不应该因为没有恢复运动而受到指责。”
translation.source: Their help is crucial but they shouldn't be blamed for not reviving the movement."
translation.medium: 他们的帮助至关重要,
translation.reference: 他们的帮助至关重要，但他们不应该因为没有恢复运动而受到指责。”

translation.en: All Assam Students' Union (AASU), another key player in the stir, organised a memorial at the Hatigaon Higher Secondary School playground.
translation.zh: 阿萨姆邦学生联合会 (AASU) 是这场运动的另一个关键参与者，它在哈蒂冈高中的操场上组织了一场纪念活动。
translation.source: All Assam Students' Union (AASU), another key player in the stir, organised a memorial at the Hatigaon Higher Secondary School playground.
translation.medium: 所有阿萨姆学生联盟 (AASU) 在哈蒂加昂高等中学操场举办了纪念活动.
translation.reference: 阿萨姆邦学生联合会 (AASU) 是这场运动的另一个关键参与者，它在哈蒂冈高中的操场上组织了一场纪念活动。

translation.en: Speaking on the occasion, AASU chief advisor Samujjal Kumar Bhattacharya said, "It is wrong to say that the anti-CAA movement has died out.
translation.zh: AASU 首席顾问 Samujjal Kumar Bhattacharya 说:“说反 CAA 运动已经消亡是错误的。
translation.source: Speaking on the occasion, AASU chief advisor Samujjal Kumar Bhattacharya said, "It is wrong to say that the anti-CAA movement has died out.
translation.medium: 在此次活动上, 阿苏首席顾问萨穆贾尔·库马尔·巴塔查利亚说:"说反CAA运动已经消亡是错误的.
translation.reference: AASU 首席顾问 Samujjal Kumar Bhattacharya 说:“说反 CAA 运动已经消亡是错误的。

translation.en: It had lost its intensity due to the commencement of examinations (in January 2020) and then the pandemic and lockdowns.
translation.zh: 由于开始检查（2020 年 1 月），然后是疫情和封锁，运动不再那么激烈。
translation.source: It had lost its intensity due to the commencement of examinations (in January 2020) and then the pandemic and lockdowns.
translation.medium: 由于考试开始 (2020年1月),然后是大流行和封锁, 它失去了强度.
translation.reference: 由于开始检查（2020 年 1 月），然后是疫情和封锁，运动不再那么激烈。

translation.en: We will resume the agitation with full intensity once again.
translation.zh: 我们将再次全力鼓动大家。
translation.source: We will resume the agitation with full intensity once again.
translation.medium: 我们将再次以全力展开活动.
translation.reference: 我们将再次全力鼓动大家。

translation.en: We won't let the sacrifices go in vain," he said.
translation.zh: 我们不会让死者白白牺牲。”
translation.source: We won't let the sacrifices go in vain," he said.
translation.medium: 我们不会让这些牺牲徒劳",
translation.reference: 我们不会让死者白白牺牲。”

translation.en: Mr Bhattacharya said the anti-CAA agitation will once again be a pan-Northeast one like in 2019.
translation.zh: Bhattacharya 表示，反 CAA 运动将再次像 2019 年那样，成为泛东北地区的运动。
translation.source: Mr Bhattacharya said the anti-CAA agitation will once again be a pan-Northeast one like in 2019.
translation.medium: 巴塔查亚表示,反CAA运动将像2019年那样再次遍布东北地区.
translation.reference: Bhattacharya 表示，反 CAA 运动将再次像 2019 年那样，成为泛东北地区的运动。

translation.en: Singer-music composer Zubeen Garg, who had taken a leading role in the 2019 protests, also paid his tributes at the programme organised by the AASU.
translation.zh: 在 2019 年抗议活动中发挥主导作用的歌手兼音乐作曲家祖宾·加格 (Zubeen Garg) 也在 AASU 组织的节目中表达了自己的敬意。
translation.source: Singer-music composer Zubeen Garg, who had taken a leading role in the 2019 protests, also paid his tributes at the programme organised by the AASU.
translation.medium: 曾在2019年抗议活动中扮演主导角色的歌手兼音乐作曲家Zubeen Garg也在AASU举办的节目中致敬.
translation.reference: 在 2019 年抗议活动中发挥主导作用的歌手兼音乐作曲家祖宾·加格 (Zubeen Garg) 也在 AASU 组织的节目中表达了自己的敬意。

translation.en: "We won't accept the CAA and that is for sure.
translation.zh: “我们不会接受 CAA，这是肯定的。
translation.source: "We won't accept the CAA and that is for sure.
translation.medium: "我们肯定不会接受CAA.
translation.reference: “我们不会接受 CAA，这是肯定的。

translation.en: The government is trying to confuse us, but we won't allow them to make us accept it," he said.
translation.zh: 政府试图迷惑我们，但我们不会允许他们强迫我们接受。”
translation.source: The government is trying to confuse us, but we won't allow them to make us accept it," he said.
translation.medium: 政府试图让我们感到困惑, 但我们不会让他们迫使我们接受",
translation.reference: 政府试图迷惑我们，但我们不会允许他们强迫我们接受。”

translation.en: Several organisations, including AASU, North East Students' Organisation (NESO) and Assam Jatiya Parishad (AJP), had observed "black day" on December 11 to mark two years of the passage of CAA in Parliament.
translation.zh: 一些组织，包括 AASU、东北学生组织 (NESO) 和阿萨姆 Jatiya Parishad (AJP)，在 12 月 11 日庆祝“黑色日”，以纪念 CAA 在议会通过两周年。
translation.source: Several organisations, including AASU, North East Students' Organisation (NESO) and Assam Jatiya Parishad (AJP), had observed "black day" on December 11 to mark two years of the passage of CAA in Parliament.
translation.medium: 为了纪念CAA在议会通过两周年, 一些组织, 包括AASU,东北学生组织 (NESO) 和阿萨姆贾蒂亚帕里沙德 (AJP) 在12月11日举行了"黑日".
translation.reference: 一些组织，包括 AASU、东北学生组织 (NESO) 和阿萨姆 Jatiya Parishad (AJP)，在 12 月 11 日庆祝“黑色日”，以纪念 CAA 在议会通过两周年。

translation.en: This year's trend for a second Christmas tree in the bedroom sends sales of smaller spruces soaring
translation.zh: 在卧室里也放一棵圣诞树的流行趋势促使今年小云杉的销量飙升
translation.source: This year's trend for a second Christmas tree in the bedroom sends sales of smaller spruces soaring
translation.medium: 今年卧室的第二棵圣诞树的趋势使得较小的树的销量升
translation.reference: 在卧室里也放一棵圣诞树的流行趋势促使今年小云杉的销量飙升

translation.en: Got just the one Christmas tree?
translation.zh: 你还是只准备一棵圣诞树吗？
translation.source: Got just the one Christmas tree?
translation.medium: 只有一个圣诞树?
translation.reference: 你还是只准备一棵圣诞树吗？

translation.en: Then you could be behind the times.
translation.zh: 那你可就落伍了。
translation.source: Then you could be behind the times.
translation.medium: 那么你可能会落后于时代.
translation.reference: 那你可就落伍了。

translation.en: This year's trend is for a second tree in the bedroom, and it has sent sales of smaller spruces soaring.
translation.zh: 今年的流行趋势是在卧室里也放一棵圣诞树，这使得小云杉的销量飙升。
translation.source: This year's trend is for a second tree in the bedroom, and it has sent sales of smaller spruces soaring.
translation.medium: 这使得较小的松树的销量升.
translation.reference: 今年的流行趋势是在卧室里也放一棵圣诞树，这使得小云杉的销量飙升。

translation.en: More than a quarter of British homes now boast two festive firs, experts say - and it could be more than a status symbol.
translation.zh: 专家称，超过四分之一的英国家庭现在会在节日准备两棵冷杉，这可能不仅仅是一种身份象征。
translation.source: More than a quarter of British homes now boast two festive firs, experts say - and it could be more than a status symbol.
translation.medium: 专家说, 超过四分之一的英国家庭现在拥有两个节日松树 - - 这可能不仅仅是一个地位的象征.
translation.reference: 专家称，超过四分之一的英国家庭现在会在节日准备两棵冷杉，这可能不仅仅是一种身份象征。

translation.en: Both the soothing green colour and the pine aroma are said to be good for mental health and sleep cycles - while even fake trees can help evoke a feeling of nostalgia.
translation.zh: 据说，舒缓的绿色和松树的香气都有利于心理健康和睡眠，即使是假树也能帮助唤起怀旧之情。
translation.source: Both the soothing green colour and the pine aroma are said to be good for mental health and sleep cycles - while even fake trees can help evoke a feeling of nostalgia.
translation.medium: 据说绿色和松树的香味对精神健康和睡眠周期都有好处 - - 甚至假树也能唤起怀旧的感觉.
translation.reference: 据说，舒缓的绿色和松树的香气都有利于心理健康和睡眠，即使是假树也能帮助唤起怀旧之情。

translation.en: Other families get two trees so children can decorate one as gaudily as they like, providing a place for any home-made masterpieces, while leaving a more elegantly garlanded fir on more prominent display to impress the neighbours.
translation.zh: 还有的家庭准备两棵树，一棵让孩子们随意装饰，为家里自制的作品提供一个展示之处，留下一棵更优雅的花环冷杉装饰得更加显眼，给邻居留下深刻的印象。
translation.source: Other families get two trees so children can decorate one as gaudily as they like, providing a place for any home-made masterpieces, while leaving a more elegantly garlanded fir on more prominent display to impress the neighbours.
translation.medium: 其他家庭则提供两棵树, 让孩子们可以尽情装饰一棵树,
translation.reference: 还有的家庭准备两棵树，一棵让孩子们随意装饰，为家里自制的作品提供一个展示之处，留下一棵更优雅的花环冷杉装饰得更加显眼，给邻居留下深刻的印象。

translation.en: Among those buying into the trend, which started in the US, are Carole Middleton, mother of the Duchess of Cambridge, who gets a second tree for grandchildren George, Louis and Charlotte at her home in Bucklebury, West Berkshire.
translation.zh: 剑桥公爵夫人的母亲卡罗尔•米德尔顿也加入了这股风潮，她在位于西伯克郡巴克尔伯里的家中为孙子乔治、路易和夏洛特另外买了一棵圣诞树。
translation.source: Among those buying into the trend, which started in the US, are Carole Middleton, mother of the Duchess of Cambridge, who gets a second tree for grandchildren George, Louis and Charlotte at her home in Bucklebury, West Berkshire.
translation.medium: 凯罗尔·米德尔顿 (Carole Middleton) 是剑桥公爵夫人的母亲, 她在西伯克郡巴克伯里 (Bucklebury) 的家中为孙子乔治 (George),路易斯 (Louis) 和夏洛特 (Charlotte) 购买了第二棵树.
translation.reference: 剑桥公爵夫人的母亲卡罗尔•米德尔顿也加入了这股风潮，她在位于西伯克郡巴克尔伯里的家中为孙子乔治、路易和夏洛特另外买了一棵圣诞树。

translation.en: Last week, she posted on Instagram: "Once again this year we plan to have two Christmas trees: one for the children to decorate and one which I do myself."
translation.zh: 上周，她在 Instagram 上发帖说：“今年我们计划再买两棵圣诞树：一棵给孩子们装饰，另一棵我自己动手。”
translation.source: Last week, she posted on Instagram: "Once again this year we plan to have two Christmas trees: one for the children to decorate and one which I do myself."
translation.medium: 上周她在Instagram上发帖说:"今年我们再次计划有两个圣诞树:一个是孩子们装饰的, 一个是我自己做的.
translation.reference: 上周，她在 Instagram 上发帖说：“今年我们计划再买两棵圣诞树：一棵给孩子们装饰，另一棵我自己动手。”

translation.en: British Garden Centres said sales of smaller trees are up 50 per cent this year across its 58 sites.
translation.zh: 英国花园中心表示，今年它的 58 个销售点的小树销量增长了 50%。
translation.source: British Garden Centres said sales of smaller trees are up 50 per cent this year across its 58 sites.
translation.medium: 英国园林中心表示,今年小型树木的销售额在58个地点上了50%.
translation.reference: 英国花园中心表示，今年它的 58 个销售点的小树销量增长了 50%。

translation.en: Director Boyd Douglas-Davies, who is also president of the Horticulture Trades Association, said: "People are trading up from a plant in the bedroom and putting in beautifully decorated trees."
translation.zh: 博伊德·道格拉斯-戴维斯是园艺业协会的主席，他说：“人们热衷于把卧室里的植物换成装饰漂亮的树。”
translation.source: Director Boyd Douglas-Davies, who is also president of the Horticulture Trades Association, said: "People are trading up from a plant in the bedroom and putting in beautifully decorated trees."
translation.medium: 博伊德·道格拉斯·戴维斯 (Boyd Douglas-Davies) 也是园艺行业协会的主席,他说:"人们开始在卧室里种植植物,并把漂亮的树木装饰起来.
translation.reference: 博伊德·道格拉斯-戴维斯是园艺业协会的主席，他说：“人们热衷于把卧室里的植物换成装饰漂亮的树。”

translation.en: Fellow garden centre chain Squire's reports that 30 per cent of their customers plan on having at least two trees - and more than one in ten intend to have three or more.
translation.zh: 另一家园艺中心连锁店 Squire 的报告称，30% 的客户计划至少购买两棵树，超过十分之一的客户打算购买三棵或更多。
translation.source: Fellow garden centre chain Squire's reports that 30 per cent of their customers plan on having at least two trees - and more than one in ten intend to have three or more.
translation.medium: 30%的客户计划至少种植两棵树 - - 而超过十分之一的客户打算种植三棵或更多的树.
translation.reference: 另一家园艺中心连锁店 Squire 的报告称，30% 的客户计划至少购买两棵树，超过十分之一的客户打算购买三棵或更多。

translation.en: Chairman Sarah Squire said: "They give a bedroom a lovely, calming scent that is the perfect aid for a good night's sleep."
translation.zh: 主席莎拉·斯夸尔说：“它们给卧室带来一种好闻的、镇静的气味，能让人晚上睡一个好觉。”
translation.source: Chairman Sarah Squire said: "They give a bedroom a lovely, calming scent that is the perfect aid for a good night's sleep."
translation.medium: 董事长萨拉·斯奎尔说:"它们给卧室带来令人愉快,平静的气味, 非常有助于一个良好的夜晚的睡眠.
translation.reference: 主席莎拉·斯夸尔说：“它们给卧室带来一种好闻的、镇静的气味，能让人晚上睡一个好觉。”

translation.en: Just as bedroom plants have been known to help mental health and purify the air, trees are also said to aid slumber.
translation.zh: 众所周知，卧室里的植物有助于心理健康和净化空气，树木据说也有助于睡眠。
translation.source: Just as bedroom plants have been known to help mental health and purify the air, trees are also said to aid slumber.
translation.medium: 据说树木有助于睡眠, 就像卧室植物有助于心理健康和净化空气一样.
translation.reference: 众所周知，卧室里的植物有助于心理健康和净化空气，树木据说也有助于睡眠。

translation.en: Sleep expert Carl Walsh said: "Our brains collect information from our surroundings and this translates into signals releasing hormones in response.
translation.zh: 睡眠专家卡尔·沃尔什说：“我们的大脑从周围环境收集信息，然后转化为信号，释放激素。
translation.source: Sleep expert Carl Walsh said: "Our brains collect information from our surroundings and this translates into signals releasing hormones in response.
translation.medium: 睡眠专家卡尔·沃尔什说:"我们的大脑从周围环境中收集信息,
translation.reference: 睡眠专家卡尔·沃尔什说：“我们的大脑从周围环境收集信息，然后转化为信号，释放激素。

translation.en: In this instance melatonin and cortisol are the hormones that control your sleep cycle and put your body into a sleepy state."
translation.zh: 在这种情况下，控制睡眠周期的褪黑激素和皮质醇可让你的身体进入昏昏欲睡的状态。”
translation.source: In this instance melatonin and cortisol are the hormones that control your sleep cycle and put your body into a sleepy state."
translation.medium: 在这种情况下,黑激素和皮质醇是控制睡眠周期的激素,
translation.reference: 在这种情况下，控制睡眠周期的褪黑激素和皮质醇可让你的身体进入昏昏欲睡的状态。”

translation.en: He added that a bedroom tree could also transport people back to a more carefree and youthful era.
translation.zh: 他补充说，卧室里的圣诞树还可以让人们回到更无忧无虑、更年轻的时代。
translation.source: He added that a bedroom tree could also transport people back to a more carefree and youthful era.
translation.medium: 他补充说, 卧室树也可以让人们回到一个更无忧和更年轻的时代.
translation.reference: 他补充说，卧室里的圣诞树还可以让人们回到更无忧无虑、更年轻的时代。

translation.en: "Christmas can be a pretty stressful time.
translation.zh: “圣诞节可能是一个压力很大的时候。
translation.source: "Christmas can be a pretty stressful time.
translation.medium: "圣诞节可以是一个相当紧张的时间.
translation.reference: “圣诞节可能是一个压力很大的时候。

translation.en: A bedroom tree takes people back to their childhood when they had no responsibilities and can forget about stressful things.
translation.zh: 卧室里的圣诞树可以让人们忘记压力，回到没有负担的童年时代。
translation.source: A bedroom tree takes people back to their childhood when they had no responsibilities and can forget about stressful things.
translation.medium: 一棵卧室树可以让人们回想起童年时代,
translation.reference: 卧室里的圣诞树可以让人们忘记压力，回到没有负担的童年时代。

translation.en: That is always good for sleep."
translation.zh: 这对睡眠总是有好处的。”
translation.source: That is always good for sleep."
translation.medium: 这对睡眠来说总是很好.
translation.reference: 这对睡眠总是有好处的。”

translation.en: I am afraid I would not be able to confirm the price of the bed until it is available on the website again as it was reduced in our winter sale it is likely this will not be the price of the article when it is added back to the website
translation.zh: 现在我可能没法确定床的价格，恐怕要到网站上显示有货的时候才能知道，不过，之前是冬季促销，补货后可能就不是这个价格了
translation.source: I am afraid I would not be able to confirm the price of the bed until it is available on the website again as it was reduced in our winter sale it is likely this will not be the price of the article when it is added back to the website
translation.medium: 我担心我无法确认床的价格,直到它在网站上再次可用,因为它在我们的冬季拍卖中被降低,很可能这将不会是文章的价格,当它被添加到网站上
translation.reference: 现在我可能没法确定床的价格，恐怕要到网站上显示有货的时候才能知道，不过，之前是冬季促销，补货后可能就不是这个价格了

translation.en: Sorry for the inconveniences
translation.zh: 给您带来不便，非常抱歉
translation.source: Sorry for the inconveniences
translation.medium: 对不便表示歉意
translation.reference: 给您带来不便，非常抱歉

translation.en: Is there anything else I can assist you with?
translation.zh: 还有什么可以帮您的吗？
translation.source: Is there anything else I can assist you with?
translation.medium: 还有什么我可以帮助你吗?
translation.reference: 还有什么可以帮您的吗？

translation.en: This is the first time and I hope the last.
translation.zh: 这是第一次，希望也是最后一次。
translation.source: This is the first time and I hope the last.
translation.medium: 这是第一次,希望也是最后一次.
translation.reference: 这是第一次，希望也是最后一次。

translation.en: Have a wonderful rest of your day and happy new year!
translation.zh: 祝您新年快乐，顺顺利利！
translation.source: Have a wonderful rest of your day and happy new year!
translation.medium: 祝大家有美好的一天,新年快乐!
translation.reference: 祝您新年快乐，顺顺利利！

translation.en: Makeshift Munster crush Wasps in Champions Cup cracker
translation.zh: 临时组织的芒斯特在冠军杯比赛中击败黄蜂队
translation.source: Makeshift Munster crush Wasps in Champions Cup cracker
translation.medium: 临时的蒙斯特镇压黄蜂在冠军杯饼干
translation.reference: 临时组织的芒斯特在冠军杯比赛中击败黄蜂队

translation.en: Munster overran Wasps in a thrillingly chaotic Heineken Champions Cup clash contested by makeshift teams besieged by Covid and injury problems.
translation.zh: 在喜力冠军杯比赛中，芒斯特在混乱中令人激动地击败了黄蜂队，被新冠病毒和伤病困扰的临时球队参加了比赛。
translation.source: Munster overran Wasps in a thrillingly chaotic Heineken Champions Cup clash contested by makeshift teams besieged by Covid and injury problems.
translation.medium: 蒙斯特队在激动人心的混乱海因肯冠军杯比赛中击败了黄蜂队.
translation.reference: 在喜力冠军杯比赛中，芒斯特在混乱中令人激动地击败了黄蜂队，被新冠病毒和伤病困扰的临时球队参加了比赛。

translation.en: A rollercoaster first half ended with Munster leading 13-7 after Wasps skipper Brad Shields had been controversially sent off for a dangerous tackle on Dave Kilcoyne.
translation.zh: 在黄蜂队队长布拉德·希尔兹因对戴夫·基尔科因的危险铲断而被有争议地罚下后，过山车般的上半场以芒斯特 13-7 领先结束。
translation.source: A rollercoaster first half ended with Munster leading 13-7 after Wasps skipper Brad Shields had been controversially sent off for a dangerous tackle on Dave Kilcoyne.
translation.medium: 一个过山车上半场结束了蒙斯特领先13-7后黄蜂船长布拉德盾已经有争议被送出危险的对付戴夫Kilcoyne.
translation.reference: 在黄蜂队队长布拉德·希尔兹因对戴夫·基尔科因的危险铲断而被有争议地罚下后，过山车般的上半场以芒斯特 13-7 领先结束。

translation.en: And with hooker Dan Frost sin-binned on the stroke of half-time, their 13 men were on the ropes and Munster reacted by engineering tries for debutant Patrick Campbell and Andrew Conway.
translation.zh: 随着前场中锋丹·弗罗斯特在中场休息时被罚下，他们的 13 名队员被逼到了绝境，芒斯特的反应是尝试让新人帕特里克·坎贝尔和安德鲁·康威上场。
translation.source: And with hooker Dan Frost sin-binned on the stroke of half-time, their 13 men were on the ropes and Munster reacted by engineering tries for debutant Patrick Campbell and Andrew Conway.
translation.medium: 在半场结束时, 丹·弗罗斯特 (Dan Frost) 陷入了罪恶之中, 他们的13人已经在绳索上, 蒙斯特队对新秀帕特里克·坎贝尔 (Patrick Campbell) 和安德鲁·康威 (Andrew Conway) 进行了工程尝试.
translation.reference: 随着前场中锋丹·弗罗斯特在中场休息时被罚下，他们的 13 名队员被逼到了绝境，芒斯特的反应是尝试让新人帕特里克·坎贝尔和安德鲁·康威上场。

translation.en: Alfie Barbeary's all-action display capped by a captivating try had given Wasps hope but he was unexpectedly replaced at half-time and it became one-way traffic from the moment Campbell showed his class to finish in the 43rd minute.
translation.zh: 阿尔菲·巴伯利充满斗志的表现以及充满魅力的尝试给了黄蜂队希望，但他在中场休息时被意外替换，从坎贝尔表现的那一刻到第 43 分钟结束比赛，比赛就变成了一方的表演。
translation.source: Alfie Barbeary's all-action display capped by a captivating try had given Wasps hope but he was unexpectedly replaced at half-time and it became one-way traffic from the moment Campbell showed his class to finish in the 43rd minute.
translation.medium: 但他在半场意外被取代, 从坎贝尔在第43分钟展示他的班级结束时开始, 这就变成了一条单向的交通.
translation.reference: 阿尔菲·巴伯利充满斗志的表现以及充满魅力的尝试给了黄蜂队希望，但他在中场休息时被意外替换，从坎贝尔表现的那一刻到第 43 分钟结束比赛，比赛就变成了一方的表演。

translation.en: Missing 17 players to injury, Wasps also had to contend with the loss of four more to Covid in the morning, resulting in a hasty reconfiguration of the team.
translation.zh: 黄蜂队 17 名队员因伤缺阵，当天上午又有 4 名队员感染了新冠，球队被迫匆忙进行重新组织。
translation.source: Missing 17 players to injury, Wasps also had to contend with the loss of four more to Covid in the morning, resulting in a hasty reconfiguration of the team.
translation.medium: 缺少17名球员受伤,黄蜂还不得不应对早上四名球员因Covid而丧失,导致球队忙重组.
translation.reference: 黄蜂队 17 名队员因伤缺阵，当天上午又有 4 名队员感染了新冠，球队被迫匆忙进行重新组织。

translation.en: Munster, meanwhile, were missing 34 squad personnel because of quarantine following their recent ill-fated United Rugby Championship trip to South Africa, creating five debutants in the starting XV and another seven on the bench.
translation.zh: 与此同时，芒斯特队在最近命运多舛的南非联合橄榄球锦标赛之旅后，由于隔离而致使 34 名队员缺阵，这使得首发的 15 人中有 5 名队员初次登场，另有 7 名替补队员。
translation.source: Munster, meanwhile, were missing 34 squad personnel because of quarantine following their recent ill-fated United Rugby Championship trip to South Africa, creating five debutants in the starting XV and another seven on the bench.
translation.medium: 与此同时,蒙斯特队因隔离而缺少34名球员,因为他们最近不幸前往南非的联合橄球锦标赛,在首发15人中创造了5名首秀,还有7名替补.
translation.reference: 与此同时，芒斯特队在最近命运多舛的南非联合橄榄球锦标赛之旅后，由于隔离而致使 34 名队员缺阵，这使得首发的 15 人中有 5 名队员初次登场，另有 7 名替补队员。

translation.en: Crucially, however, Ireland stars such as Tadhg Beirne, Peter O'Mahony, Conor Murray and Keith Earls were present to stiffen their ranks.
translation.zh: 然而，至关重要的是，像塔德赫•贝尔尼、彼得•奥马奥尼、康纳•默里和基思•厄尔斯等爱尔兰明星都出席了比赛，为他们的队伍鼓气。
translation.source: Crucially, however, Ireland stars such as Tadhg Beirne, Peter O'Mahony, Conor Murray and Keith Earls were present to stiffen their ranks.
translation.medium: 然而,关键的是,爱尔兰明星如Tadhg Beirne,Peter O'Mahony,Conor Murray和Keith Earls出席了他们的队伍.
translation.reference: 然而，至关重要的是，像塔德赫•贝尔尼、彼得•奥马奥尼、康纳•默里和基思•厄尔斯等爱尔兰明星都出席了比赛，为他们的队伍鼓气。

translation.en: For all the absentees, it was an enjoyable spectacle where it appeared at times anything could happen, at least until Munster showed the extraordinary depth of their playing resources to pull clear.
translation.zh: 对于所有缺席的球员来说，这是一个令人愉快的场面，似乎任何事情都有可能不时地发生，至少在芒斯特展示出他们非凡的板凳深度拉开距离之前是这样的。
translation.source: For all the absentees, it was an enjoyable spectacle where it appeared at times anything could happen, at least until Munster showed the extraordinary depth of their playing resources to pull clear.
translation.medium: 对于所有缺席的球员来说, 这是一个令人愉快的场景,
translation.reference: 对于所有缺席的球员来说，这是一个令人愉快的场面，似乎任何事情都有可能不时地发生，至少在芒斯特展示出他们非凡的板凳深度拉开距离之前是这样的。

translation.en: Wasps' Covid-affected start to the day was compounded when play got underway, with Thomas Young denied a certain try by O'Mahony's excellent covering tackle.
translation.zh: 比赛开始后，黄蜂队受新冠的影响变得更加严重，托马斯·杨拒绝了奥马奥尼出色的掩护拦截。
translation.source: Wasps' Covid-affected start to the day was compounded when play got underway, with Thomas Young denied a certain try by O'Mahony's excellent covering tackle.
translation.medium: 当比赛开始时,黄蜂的Covid受影响的开始变得更加复杂,Thomas Young被O'Mahony优秀的覆盖 tackle 拒绝了一次尝试.
translation.reference: 比赛开始后，黄蜂队受新冠的影响变得更加严重，托马斯·杨拒绝了奥马奥尼出色的掩护拦截。

translation.en: And while Joey Carbery sent a penalty between the uprights to draw first blood for Munster, Jimmy Gopperth struck the crossbar to continue the two-time champions' unfortunate opening.
translation.zh: 当乔伊·卡伯里在两根立柱之间罚出点球，让芒斯特出师告捷时，吉米·戈伯斯击中横梁，延续了两届冠军球队不幸的开局。
translation.source: And while Joey Carbery sent a penalty between the uprights to draw first blood for Munster, Jimmy Gopperth struck the crossbar to continue the two-time champions' unfortunate opening.
translation.medium: 吉米·戈珀斯击中横杆, 继续两届冠军的不幸开局.
translation.reference: 当乔伊·卡伯里在两根立柱之间罚出点球，让芒斯特出师告捷时，吉米·戈伯斯击中横梁，延续了两届冠军球队不幸的开局。

translation.en: But their scrum was offering a foothold in the game and it took feverish defence to keep their maul at bay until they produced the first of two turnovers in quick succession.
translation.zh: 但他们的争球为他们在比赛中提供了一个立足点，他们需要疯狂防守来阻止他们的惨败，直到他们第一次连续两次迅速造成失误。
translation.source: But their scrum was offering a foothold in the game and it took feverish defence to keep their maul at bay until they produced the first of two turnovers in quick succession.
translation.medium: 但他们的争在比赛中提供了立足点, 需要狂热的防守来保持他们的攻击,
translation.reference: 但他们的争球为他们在比赛中提供了一个立足点，他们需要疯狂防守来阻止他们的惨败，直到他们第一次连续两次迅速造成失误。

translation.en: Munster were fighting for every ball in defiance of their absentees and their victory prospects received a dramatic boost when Shields was shown his dubious red card, with referee Romain Poite saying his shoulder had caught Kilcoyne's neck.
translation.zh: 芒斯特不顾主力的缺席，为每一个球而战，当希尔兹因为主裁判罗曼·波伊特说他的肩膀卡住了基尔科因的脖子而被出示可疑的红牌时，他们的胜利前景得到了戏剧性的加强。
translation.source: Munster were fighting for every ball in defiance of their absentees and their victory prospects received a dramatic boost when Shields was shown his dubious red card, with referee Romain Poite saying his shoulder had caught Kilcoyne's neck.
translation.medium: 蒙斯特正在为每一球而战, 尽管他们缺席, 他们的胜利前景得到了戏剧性的推动, 当盾牌被显示他的可疑红牌, 裁判罗曼·波伊特说他的肩膀抓住了基尔科恩的子.
translation.reference: 芒斯特不顾主力的缺席，为每一个球而战，当希尔兹因为主裁判罗曼·波伊特说他的肩膀卡住了基尔科因的脖子而被出示可疑的红牌时，他们的胜利前景得到了戏剧性的加强。

translation.en: Carbery directed a simple penalty at the post and while he was on target soon after, a dramatic twist followed as Wasps plundered a stunning try through Barbeary.
translation.zh: 卡贝里在门柱上简单地罚了一个点球，当他很快瞄准目标时，一个戏剧性的转折发生了，黄蜂队通过巴巴里完成了一次漂亮的尝试。
translation.source: Carbery directed a simple penalty at the post and while he was on target soon after, a dramatic twist followed as Wasps plundered a stunning try through Barbeary.
translation.medium: 卡贝里指挥一个简单的处罚在职位上,而他很快就在目标上,一个戏剧性的转折随着黄蜂掠夺了一个惊人的尝试通过巴贝里.
translation.reference: 卡贝里在门柱上简单地罚了一个点球，当他很快瞄准目标时，一个戏剧性的转折发生了，黄蜂队通过巴巴里完成了一次漂亮的尝试。

translation.en: It concluded an exhilarating spell of end-to-end rugby in which the rivals took it in turns to attack from deep and, having been at the heart of the home advances, Barbeary delivered the telling blow.
translation.zh: 这场比赛结束了一段令人兴奋的连续橄榄球比赛，在这场比赛中，对手们轮流纵深进攻，作为主场进攻的核心，巴巴里发出了有力的一击。
translation.source: It concluded an exhilarating spell of end-to-end rugby in which the rivals took it in turns to attack from deep and, having been at the heart of the home advances, Barbeary delivered the telling blow.
translation.medium: 竞争对手轮流从深处进攻, 在主场进攻的核心, 巴比里给出了明确的打击.
translation.reference: 这场比赛结束了一段令人兴奋的连续橄榄球比赛，在这场比赛中，对手们轮流纵深进攻，作为主场进攻的核心，巴巴里发出了有力的一击。

translation.en: A kind bounce off Murray's kick presented Earls with the simplest of tries as Munster hit back and then Frost departed for the sin-bin as the home side were reduced to 13.
translation.zh: 穆雷的一脚射门给了厄尔斯一个最简单的带球触地得分，芒斯特回击，然后弗罗斯特被罚下场，主队人数减少到 13 人。
translation.source: A kind bounce off Murray's kick presented Earls with the simplest of tries as Munster hit back and then Frost departed for the sin-bin as the home side were reduced to 13.
translation.medium: 穆雷的球给了厄尔斯最简单的尝试, 蒙斯特回击, 然后弗罗斯特离开罪恶垃圾桶, 当主场被减少到13人时.
translation.reference: 穆雷的一脚射门给了厄尔斯一个最简单的带球触地得分，芒斯特回击，然后弗罗斯特被罚下场，主队人数减少到 13 人。

translation.en: It did not take long for the advantage in personnel to be felt as Beirne started a breakout try that ended with full-back Campbell producing a brilliant finish.
translation.zh: 没过多久，在人员上的优势就显现出来了，贝尔尼开始了一次突破性的带球触地得分，以后卫坎贝尔的精彩进球结束。
translation.source: It did not take long for the advantage in personnel to be felt as Beirne started a breakout try that ended with full-back Campbell producing a brilliant finish.
translation.medium: 贝尔恩开始一个突破尝试,最终与后卫坎贝尔产生了的终结.
translation.reference: 没过多久，在人员上的优势就显现出来了，贝尔尼开始了一次突破性的带球触地得分，以后卫坎贝尔的精彩进球结束。

translation.en: And Munster were out of sight in the 49th minute when a loose pass during a promising counter-attack fell for Conway to scoop up and complete a simple run-in.
translation.zh: 第 49 分钟，芒斯特出现视线盲区，在一次充满希望的反击中传球失误，康威完成了一次简单的跑进。
translation.source: And Munster were out of sight in the 49th minute when a loose pass during a promising counter-attack fell for Conway to scoop up and complete a simple run-in.
translation.medium: 蒙斯特队在第49分钟失守, 在一个有前途的反击中,
translation.reference: 第 49 分钟，芒斯特出现视线盲区，在一次充满希望的反击中传球失误，康威完成了一次简单的跑进。

translation.en: Hooker Scott Buckley, man of the match on his Munster debut, was the next over from a lineout move and that was the game won, although Michael Le Bourgeois picked a quality line to improve Wasps' final score.
translation.zh: 在芒斯特的处子秀上，本场最佳球员前场中锋斯科特·巴克利是下一名外线球员，这是比赛的胜利，尽管迈克尔·勒·布里克选择了一条高质量的线路来提高黄蜂队的最后得分。
translation.source: Hooker Scott Buckley, man of the match on his Munster debut, was the next over from a lineout move and that was the game won, although Michael Le Bourgeois picked a quality line to improve Wasps' final score.
translation.medium: 胡克斯科特·巴克利,在他的曼斯特首秀比赛的最佳球员,是下一个从线路移动中获得的比赛,这就是比赛的胜利,尽管迈克尔·勒布尔乔伊斯选择了一条优质的线路来提高黄蜂的最终得分.
translation.reference: 在芒斯特的处子秀上，本场最佳球员前场中锋斯科特·巴克利是下一名外线球员，这是比赛的胜利，尽管迈克尔·勒·布里克选择了一条高质量的线路来提高黄蜂队的最后得分。

translation.en: France reacts to rival offer of US frigates to Greece
translation.zh: 法国对美国向希腊提供护卫舰的竞争性报价做出反应
translation.source: France reacts to rival offer of US frigates to Greece
translation.medium: 法国对竞争对手向希腊提供美国护卫舰的报价作出反应
translation.reference: 法国对美国向希腊提供护卫舰的竞争性报价做出反应

translation.en: The defense ministries of France and Greece have both confirmed that a competing offer from the US will have no impact on an already "signed" and "final" multibillion deal to purchase French Belharra frigates.
translation.zh: 法国和希腊国防部都确认，美国的竞争性报价将不会影响已经“签署”和“最终”数十亿美元的希腊购买法国贝尔哈拉护卫舰的协议。
translation.source: The defense ministries of France and Greece have both confirmed that a competing offer from the US will have no impact on an already "signed" and "final" multibillion deal to purchase French Belharra frigates.
translation.medium: 法国和希腊的国防部都证实, 美国的竞争性报价将不会对已经"签署"和"最终"的数十亿美元的法国贝尔哈拉护卫舰购买协议产生影响.
translation.reference: 法国和希腊国防部都确认，美国的竞争性报价将不会影响已经“签署”和“最终”数十亿美元的希腊购买法国贝尔哈拉护卫舰的协议。

translation.en: France's Ministry of Armed Forces stated on Saturday that a defense contract with Athens had already been "initialled a few days ago," before the US State Department announced its approval of a potential sale of American frigates.
translation.zh: 法国武装部队周六表示，在美国国务院宣布批准出售美国护卫舰之前，法国与希腊的防务合同已经“草签了几天”。
translation.source: France's Ministry of Armed Forces stated on Saturday that a defense contract with Athens had already been "initialled a few days ago," before the US State Department announced its approval of a potential sale of American frigates.
translation.medium: 在美国国务院宣布批准潜在出售美国护卫舰之前, 法国武装部队部周六表示, 与雅典签订的国防合同已经"在几天前起草".
translation.reference: 法国武装部队周六表示，在美国国务院宣布批准出售美国护卫舰之前，法国与希腊的防务合同已经“草签了几天”。

translation.en: Since we have been in discussion with the Greeks, the American offer is no longer on the table...
translation.zh: 从我们与希腊人开始讨论之后，美国的报价就不在谈判桌上了。
translation.source: Since we have been in discussion with the Greeks, the American offer is no longer on the table...
translation.medium: 由于我们已经与希腊人进行了讨论, 美国的提议不再在桌面上...
translation.reference: 从我们与希腊人开始讨论之后，美国的报价就不在谈判桌上了。

translation.en: We also signed the contract with the Greeks.
translation.zh: 我们也和希腊人签订了合同。
translation.source: We also signed the contract with the Greeks.
translation.medium: 我们还与希腊人签署了合同.
translation.reference: 我们也和希腊人签订了合同。

translation.en: Greece's Defense Ministry also confirmed that the deal with Paris was "final," since it had been negotiated at the "highest level possible" and "personally announced" by the Greek PM Kyriakos Mitsotakis.
translation.zh: 希腊国防部也证实，与巴黎的协议是“最终的”，因为它是在“可能的最高级别”进行谈判，并由希腊总理克里亚科斯·米佐塔基斯 (Kyriakos Mitsotakis)“亲自宣布”的。
translation.source: Greece's Defense Ministry also confirmed that the deal with Paris was "final," since it had been negotiated at the "highest level possible" and "personally announced" by the Greek PM Kyriakos Mitsotakis.
translation.medium: 希腊国防部也证实与巴黎达成的协议是"最终的",
translation.reference: 希腊国防部也证实，与巴黎的协议是“最终的”，因为它是在“可能的最高级别”进行谈判，并由希腊总理克里亚科斯·米佐塔基斯 (Kyriakos Mitsotakis)“亲自宣布”的。

translation.en: The finalized contracts are allegedly expected to be ratified by the Greek Parliament "soon."
translation.zh: 据称，最终敲定的合同预计将“很快”得到希腊议会的批准。
translation.source: The finalized contracts are allegedly expected to be ratified by the Greek Parliament "soon."
translation.medium: 据报道, 希腊议会将"很快"批准最终签订的合同.
translation.reference: 据称，最终敲定的合同预计将“很快”得到希腊议会的批准。

translation.en: The US Defense Security Cooperation Agency said on Friday it had approved the sale for $6.9 billion of four Lockheed Martin combat frigates, and a separate $2.5 billion program to upgrade Greece's MEKO class frigates.
translation.zh: 美国国防安全合作局周五表示，它已经批准以 69 亿美元的价格出售四艘洛克希德·马丁公司的战斗护卫舰，以及另一项价值 25 亿美元的计划来升级希腊的 MEKO 级护卫舰。
translation.source: The US Defense Security Cooperation Agency said on Friday it had approved the sale for $6.9 billion of four Lockheed Martin combat frigates, and a separate $2.5 billion program to upgrade Greece's MEKO class frigates.
translation.medium: 美国国防安全合作机构周五表示已批准以69亿美元的价格出售洛克希德·马丁公司的四艘战斗护卫舰,
translation.reference: 美国国防安全合作局周五表示，它已经批准以 69 亿美元的价格出售四艘洛克希德·马丁公司的战斗护卫舰，以及另一项价值 25 亿美元的计划来升级希腊的 MEKO 级护卫舰。

translation.en: The announcement triggered some concerns over the Athens-Paris agreement, especially after a long-existing submarine construction "deal of the century" between France and Australia was abruptly tanked by a bombshell AUKUS pact in September, without any prior warning.
translation.zh: 这一声明引发了对雅典-巴黎协议的一些担忧，特别是在法国和澳大利亚之间的长期潜艇建造“世纪合同”于 9 月在事先没有收到任何预警，突然因为爆炸性的 AUKUS 协议而遭到毁约的情况下。
translation.source: The announcement triggered some concerns over the Athens-Paris agreement, especially after a long-existing submarine construction "deal of the century" between France and Australia was abruptly tanked by a bombshell AUKUS pact in September, without any prior warning.
translation.medium: 尤其是在法国和澳大利亚之间长期存在的潜艇建设"世纪协议"在9月份突然被炸弹AUKUS协议破坏后, 没有任何事先警告.
translation.reference: 这一声明引发了对雅典-巴黎协议的一些担忧，特别是在法国和澳大利亚之间的长期潜艇建造“世纪合同”于 9 月在事先没有收到任何预警，突然因为爆炸性的 AUKUS 协议而遭到毁约的情况下。

translation.en: Outraged Paris accused Washington and Canberra of a "stab in the back," while just two weeks later Macron took the stage with the Greek PM to personally announce the sale of at least three French warships to Athens for around $3.5 billion, saying it was time to "stop being naive" while touting the new deal as a sign of "Europe's strategic autonomy and sovereignty."
translation.zh: 愤怒的巴黎指责华盛顿和堪培拉“在背后捅刀子”，而仅仅两周后，马克龙与希腊总理一起登台，亲自宣布向雅典出售至少三艘法国军舰，价格约为 35 亿美元，声称是时候“停止天真”了，同时把新协议吹捧为“欧洲战略自治和主权”的标志。
translation.source: Outraged Paris accused Washington and Canberra of a "stab in the back," while just two weeks later Macron took the stage with the Greek PM to personally announce the sale of at least three French warships to Athens for around $3.5 billion, saying it was time to "stop being naive" while touting the new deal as a sign of "Europe's strategic autonomy and sovereignty."
translation.medium: 愤怒的巴黎指责华盛顿和堪培拉"背中刺", 而仅仅两周后, 马克龙与希腊总理一起上台, 亲自宣布将至少三艘法国军舰以35亿美元的价格出售给雅典,
translation.reference: 愤怒的巴黎指责华盛顿和堪培拉“在背后捅刀子”，而仅仅两周后，马克龙与希腊总理一起登台，亲自宣布向雅典出售至少三艘法国军舰，价格约为 35 亿美元，声称是时候“停止天真”了，同时把新协议吹捧为“欧洲战略自治和主权”的标志。

translation.en: This time around, according to the French military, the US "had warned us that this announcement was going to come out" and that Americans allegedly had "no inclination to go further" with an actual sale of their frigates.
translation.zh: 据法国军方称，这一次，美国“警告我们，将会公布这一声明”，而且据称美国“无意继续”出售他们的护卫舰。
translation.source: This time around, according to the French military, the US "had warned us that this announcement was going to come out" and that Americans allegedly had "no inclination to go further" with an actual sale of their frigates.
translation.medium: 据法国军方称, 这次美国"已经警告我们,
translation.reference: 据法国军方称，这一次，美国“警告我们，将会公布这一声明”，而且据称美国“无意继续”出售他们的护卫舰。

translation.en: Customer gets mad at me because I didn't know he needed help
translation.zh: 顾客生我的气，因为我不知道他需要帮助
translation.source: Customer gets mad at me because I didn't know he needed help
translation.medium: 客户对我很生气,因为我不知道他需要帮助.
translation.reference: 顾客生我的气，因为我不知道他需要帮助

translation.en: I work at a grocery store shopping for pickup/delivery orders.
translation.zh: 我在杂货店工作，负责给提货单/配送单拣货。
translation.source: I work at a grocery store shopping for pickup/delivery orders.
translation.medium: 我在一家杂货店工作,
translation.reference: 我在杂货店工作，负责给提货单/配送单拣货。

translation.en: I often have customers ask where an item is and they ask in the form of a greeting + question, or just a question.
translation.zh: 经常有顾客问我商品在哪里，他们的问话方式是“问候+问题”，或者只是问问题。
translation.source: I often have customers ask where an item is and they ask in the form of a greeting + question, or just a question.
translation.medium: 客户经常问我某个商品在哪里,
translation.reference: 经常有顾客问我商品在哪里，他们的问话方式是“问候+问题”，或者只是问问题。

translation.en: I also have customers that just say hello/good morning/etc.
translation.zh: 我也会对顾客说你好/早上好等等。
translation.source: I also have customers that just say hello/good morning/etc.
translation.medium: 我也有一些客户只是说"你好"或"早安"等等.
translation.reference: 我也会对顾客说你好/早上好等等。

translation.en: I passed by a customer who said hello, and I said hello back, then waited a few seconds to see if he had a question.
translation.zh: 有一次，我从一位顾客身边走过，他向我问好，我便回之以问候，然后等了几秒钟，看他是否要问什么。
translation.source: I passed by a customer who said hello, and I said hello back, then waited a few seconds to see if he had a question.
translation.medium: 然后等了几秒钟, 想知道他有没有问题.
translation.reference: 有一次，我从一位顾客身边走过，他向我问好，我便回之以问候，然后等了几秒钟，看他是否要问什么。

translation.en: He didn't say anything else, so I moved on and continued shopping.
translation.zh: 但是他什么也没说，所以我走开了。
translation.source: He didn't say anything else, so I moved on and continued shopping.
translation.medium: 他没有再说什么,所以我继续购物.
translation.reference: 但是他什么也没说，所以我走开了。

translation.en: He then said "hello?" again, in a rude tone, and asked if I worked here angrily.
translation.zh: 然后他又用带着怨气的语气说了一声“你好？”，生气地问我是不是这里的工作人员。
translation.source: He then said "hello?" again, in a rude tone, and asked if I worked here angrily.
translation.medium: 然后他又用粗鲁的语气说"你好?"
translation.reference: 然后他又用带着怨气的语气说了一声“你好？”，生气地问我是不是这里的工作人员。

translation.en: I said I did, and he asked where an item was, again in a rude tone.
translation.zh: 我说是的，他就问我某样商品在哪里，语气还是那样不高兴。
translation.source: I said I did, and he asked where an item was, again in a rude tone.
translation.medium: 他又用粗鲁的语气问我一个物品在哪里.
translation.reference: 我说是的，他就问我某样商品在哪里，语气还是那样不高兴。

translation.en: I pointed where I believed it would be located, and said that I thought it should be there but it looks like we were out of it.
translation.zh: 我指了一个位置，我觉得应该是那里，但实际上不是。
translation.source: I pointed where I believed it would be located, and said that I thought it should be there but it looks like we were out of it.
translation.medium: 我指出它应该在哪里,并说我认为它应该在那里,
translation.reference: 我指了一个位置，我觉得应该是那里，但实际上不是。

translation.en: He then just said "forget it" angrily and walked away.
translation.zh: 然后，他就说了一句“算了”，就走了。
translation.source: He then just said "forget it" angrily and walked away.
translation.medium: 然后他愤怒地说"忘了",然后走了.
translation.reference: 然后，他就说了一句“算了”，就走了。

translation.en: How was I supposed to have known he needed help?
translation.zh: 我怎么知道他需要我的帮助呢？
translation.source: How was I supposed to have known he needed help?
